original: cha abhiññā na ijjhanti, tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena na samādhisampadā atthīti.
analyzed: cha abhiññāḥ na ijjhanti tassa ukkaṭṭha pariccheda vasena na samādhi sampadā atthi iti

original: Satipi vijjānaṃ abhiññekadesabhāve sīlasampattisamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā gahitā.
analyzed: sati api vijjānam abhiññeka desa bhāve sīla sampatti samudāgatāḥ eva tissaḥ vijjā gahitā

original: Yathā hi paññāsampattisamudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva
analyzed: yathā hi paññā sampatti samudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissaya sampannassa maggena iva

original: ijjhanti, maggakkhaṇe eva tāsaṃ paṭilabhitabbato, evaṃ sīlasampattisamudāgatā tisso
analyzed: ijjhanti magga kkhaṇe eva tāsam paṭilabhitabbataḥ evam sīla sampatti samudāgatā tisso

original: vijjā samādhisampattisamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhantīti
analyzed: vijjā samādhi sampatti samudāgatā ca cha abhiññāḥ upanissaya sampannassa maggena iva ijjhanti iti

original: maggādhigameneva tāsaṃ adhigamo veditabbo. Paccekabuddhānaṃ, sammāsambuddhānañca
analyzed: magga adhigamena iva tāsam adhigamaḥ veditabbaḥ paccekabuddhānam sammāsambuddhānam ca

original: paccekabodhisammāsambodhisamadhigamasadisā hi imesaṃ ariyānaṃ ime visesādhigamāti.
analyzed: pacceka bodhi sammāsambodhi samadhigama sadisāḥ hi imesam ariyānam ime visesa adhigamā ti

original: Vinayasuttābhidhammesu sammāpaṭipattiyā tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayatāpi yathāvuttavidhinā veditabbā.
analyzed: vinaya sutta abhidhammesu sammā paṭipattiyā tevijja tā ādīnam upanissaya tā api yathā vutta vidhinā veditabbā

original: Sampannasīlassa kāmasevanābhāvato sīlena paṭhamantavivajjanaṃ vuttaṃ. Yebhuyyena
analyzed: sampanna sīlassa kāma sevana abhāvataḥ sīlena paṭhama anta vivajjanam vuttam yebhuyyena

original: hi sattā kāmahetu pāṇātipātādivasenāpi asuddhapayogā honti. Jhānasukhalābhino kāyakilamathassa
analyzed: hi sattā kāma hetu pāṇātipāta ādi vasena api asuddha payogāḥ honti jhāna sukha lābhinaḥ kāya kilamathassa

original: sambhavo eva natthīti samādhinā dutiyantavivajjanaṃ vuttaṃ jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyattā.
analyzed: sambhavaḥ eva natthi iti samādhinā dutiya anta vivajjanam vuttam jhāna samuṭṭhāna paṇīta rūpa phuṭaka āyattā

original: Paññāyāti maggapaññāya. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi ekaṃsato ariyamaggova majjhimā paṭipatti
analyzed: paññāya ti magga paññāya ukkaṭṭha niddesena hi ekaṃsataḥ ariya maggaḥ uva majjhimā paṭipatti

original: nāma. Evaṃ santepi lokiyapaññāvasenapi antadvayavivajjanaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
analyzed: nāma evam sante pi lokiya paññā vasena api anta dvaya vivajjanam vibhāvetabbam

original: Sīlaṃ taṃsamaṅgino kāmasugatīsuyeva nibbattāpanato catūhi apāyehi vimuttiyā kāraṇanti
analyzed: sīlam tad samaṅginaḥ kāma sugatīsu yeva nibbattāpanataḥ catūhi apāyehi vimuttiyāḥ kāraṇan ti

original: āha “sīlena apāyasamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito hotī”ti. Na hi pāṇātipātādipaṭivirati
analyzed: āha sīlena pakāsitaḥ hoti iti na hi pāṇātipāta ādi paṭivirati

original: duggatiparikilesaṃ āvahati. Samādhi taṃsamaṅgino mahaggatabhūmiyaṃyeva nibbattāpanena
analyzed: duggati parikilesam āvahati samādhi tad samaṅginaḥ mahaggata bhūmiyaṃ yā iva nibbattāpanena

original: sakalakāmabhavato vimocetīti vuttaṃ “samādhinā kāmadhātusamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito
analyzed: sakala kāma bhavataḥ vimoceti iti vuttam samādhinā kāmadhātu samatikkaman upāyaḥ pakāsito

original: hotī”ti. Na hi kāmāvacarakammassa anubalappadāyīnaṃ kāmacchandādīnaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti na hi kāmāvacara kammassa anubala ppadāyīnam kāmacchanda ādīnam vikkhambhakam

original: jhānaṃ kāmadhātuparikilesāvahaṃ hoti. Na cettha upacārajjhānaṃ nidassetabbaṃ, appanāsamādhissa
analyzed: jhānam kāmadhātu parikilesa āvaham hoti na ca ittha upacāra jhānam nidassetabbam appanā samādhissa

original: adhippetattā. Nāpi “sīleneva atikkamitabbassa apāyabhavassa samādhinā atikkamitabbatā”ti
analyzed: adhippeta ttā na api sīlena iva atikkamitabbassa apāya bhavassa samādhinā atikkamitabba tā ti

original: vacanokāso. Sugatibhavampi atikkamantassa duggatisamatikkamane kā kathāti. Sabbabhavasamatikkamanupāyoti
analyzed: vacana ukāsaḥ sugati bhavam pi atikkamantassa duggati samatikkamane kā kathā ati sabba bhava samatikkaman upāyaḥ ti

original: kāmabhavādīnaṃ navannampi bhavānaṃ samatikkamanupāyo sīlasamādhīhi atikkantāpi bhavā
analyzed: kāma bhava ādīnam sīla samādhīhi atikkantā api

original: anatikkantā eva, kāraṇassa apahīnattā. Paññāya panassa suppahīnattā te samatikkantā eva.
analyzed: an atikkantāḥ eva kāraṇassa apahīna ttā paññāya panassa su pahīna ttā te samatikkantāḥ eva

original: Tadaṅgappahānavasenāti dīpālokeneva tamassa puññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena
analyzed: tad aṅga ppahāna vasena ati dīpa ālokena iva tamassa puñña kiriya vatthu gatena tena tena kusalaṅgena

original: tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānavasena. Samādhinā vikkhambhanappahānavasenāti upacārappanābhedena
analyzed: tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahāna vasena samādhinā vikkhambhana ppahāna vasena ati upacāra ppanā bhedena

original: samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahāreneva jalatale sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ
analyzed: samādhinā pavatti nivāraṇena ghaṭa pahārena iva jala tale sevālassa tesam tesam nīvaraṇa ādi dhammānam

original: pahānavasena. Paññāyāti ariyamaggapaññāya. Samucchedappahānavasenāti catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ
analyzed: pahāna vasena paññāya ati ariya magga paññāya samuccheda ppahāna vasena ati catunnam ariya maggānam

original: bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā vuttassa
analyzed: bhāvita ttā taṃ taṃ maggavataḥ attano santāne diṭṭhi gatānam pahānāya iti ādinā vuttassa

original: samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattisaṅkhātasamucchindanappahānavasena.
analyzed: samudaya pakkhiyassa kilesa gaṇassa accantam appavatti saṅkhāta samucchindana ppahāna vasena

original: Kilesānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhoti saṃkilesadhammānaṃ, kammakilesānaṃ vā yo kāyavacīdvāresu
analyzed: kilesānam vītikkama paṭipakkho ti saṃkilesa dhammānam kamma kilesānam vā yaḥ kāya vacī dvāresu

original: vītikkamo ajjhācāro, tassa paṭipakkho sīlena pakāsito hoti, avītikkamasabhāvattā
analyzed: vītikkamaḥ ajjhācāraḥ tassa paṭipakkhaḥ sīlena pakāsitaḥ hoti a vītikkama sabhāva ttā

original: sīlassa. Okāsādānavasena kilesānaṃ citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: sīlassa okāsa ādāna vasena kilesānam citte kusala ppavattim pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānam pariyuṭṭhānam

original: Taṃ samādhi vikkhambhetīti āha “samādhinā pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī”ti,
analyzed: tam samādhi vikkhambheti iti āha samādhinā pariyuṭṭhāna paṭipakkhaḥ pakāsitaḥ hoti iti

original: samādhissa pariyuṭṭhānappahāyakattā. Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanato kāraṇalābhe
analyzed: samādhissa pariyuṭṭhāna pahāyaka ttā appahīna bhāvena santāne anu anu sayanataḥ kāraṇa lābhe

original: uppattirahā anusayā, te pana anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhā uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo
analyzed: uppatti rahāḥ anusayā te pana anurūpam kāraṇam laddhāḥ uppajjana arahā kāma rāga ādayaḥ

original: satta kilesā veditabbā. Te ariyamaggapaññāya sabbaso pahīyantīti āha “paññāya anusayapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī”ti.
analyzed: satta kilesā veditabbā te ariya magga paññāya sabbaso pahīyanti iti āha paññāya anusaya paṭipakkho pakāsito hoti iti

original: Kāyaduccaritādi duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kilesehi vā dūsitaṃ caritanti duccaritaṃ, tameva
analyzed: kāya duccarita ādi duṭṭhu caritam kilesehi vā dūsitam duccaritam tam eva

original: yattha uppannaṃ, taṃ santānaṃ saṃkileseti vibādhati, upatāpeti cāti saṃkileso, tassa
analyzed: yattha uppannam tam santānam saṃkileseti vibādhati upatāpeti ca ati saṃkilesaḥ tassa

original: visodhanaṃ sīlena tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa. Taṇhāsaṃkilesassa
analyzed: visodhanam sīlena tad aṅga vasena pahānam vītikkama paṭipakkha ttā sīlassa taṇhā saṃkilesassa

original: visodhanaṃ vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkhattā samādhissa, taṇhāya
analyzed: visodhanam vikkhambhana vasena pahānam pariyuṭṭhāna paṭipakkha ttā samādhissa taṇhāya

original: cassa ujuvipaccanikabhāvato. Diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa visodhanaṃ samucchedavasena pahānaṃ
analyzed: cassa uju vipaccanika bhāvataḥ diṭṭhi saṃkilesassa visodhanam samuccheda vasena pahānam

original: anusayapaṭipakkhattā paññāya, diṭṭhigatānañca ayāthāvagāhīnaṃ yāthāvagāhiniyā paññāya
analyzed: anusaya paṭipakkha ttā paññāya diṭṭhi gatānam ca a yāthāvagāhīnam yāthāvagāhiniyā paññāya

original: ujuvipaccanikabhāvato.
analyzed: uju vi paccanika bhāvataḥ

original: Kāraṇanti upanissayapaccayo. Sīlesu paripūrakārīti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtattā
analyzed: kāraṇam ti upanissaya paccayo sīlesu paripūra kārī ti magga brahmacariyassa ādi bhūta ttā

original: ādibrahmacariyakānaṃ pārājikasaṅghādisesasaṅkhātānaṃ mahāsīlasikkhāpadānaṃ avītikkamanato
analyzed: ādibrahmacariyakānam pārājika saṅgha ādisesa saṅkhātānam mahā sīla sikkhāpadānam a vītikkamanataḥ

original: khuddānukhuddakānaṃ āpajjane sahasāva tehi vuṭṭhānena sīlesu yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ paripūraṃ
analyzed: khuddānukhuddakānam āpajjane sahasā va tehi vuṭṭhānena sīlesu yam kattabbam tat paripūram

original: samatthaṃ karotīti sīlesu paripūrakārī. Tathā sakadāgāmīti “sīlesu paripūrakārī”ti
analyzed: samattham karoti iti sīlesu paripūra kārī tathā sakadāgāmī iti sīlesu paripūra kārī iti

original: etaṃ upasaṃharati tathā-saddena. Ete hi dve ariyā samādhipāripanthikānaṃ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ
analyzed: etam upasaṃharati tathāsaddena ete hi dve ariyā samādhi pāripanthikānam kāma rāga byāpādānam

original: paññāpāripanthikassa saccapaṭicchādakamohassa sabbaso asamūhatattā samādhiṃ, paññañca
analyzed: paññāpāripanthikassa sacca paṭicchādaka mohassa sabbasas a samūha tattā samādhim paññam ca

original: bhāventāpi samādhipaññāsu yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti
analyzed: bhāventā api samādhi paññāsu yam kattabbam tam mattasaḥ pamāṇena padesa mattam eva karonti iti

original: samādhismiṃ, paññāya ca mattaso kārino “sīlesu paripūrakārino”icceva vuccanti. Anāgāmī
analyzed: samādhismim paññāya ca kārino sīlesu paripūra kārino icca iva vuccanti anāgāmī

original: pana kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ samucchinnattā samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī. Arahā sabbaso sammohassa
analyzed: pana kāma rāga byāpādānam samucchinna ttā samādhismim paripūra kārī arahā sabbaso sammohassa

original: susamūhatattā paññāya paripūrakārī.
analyzed: su samūha tattā paññāya paripūra kārī

original: Vuttaṃ hetaṃ bhagavatā –
analyzed: vuttam ha itam bhagavatā

original: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ mattaso kārī, paññāya
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlesu paripūra kārī hoti samādhismim kārī paññāya

original: mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni, tāni āpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
analyzed: mattasaḥ kārī saḥ yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni tāni āpajjati pi vuṭṭhāti pi

original: Taṃ kissa hetu? Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā. Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni
analyzed: tat kissa hetu na hi mā ittha bhikkhave abhabba tā vuttā yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni

original: ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni, tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti ṭhitasīlo ca,
analyzed: ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariya sāruppāni tattha dhuva sīlo ca hoti ṭhita sīlo ca

original: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti
analyzed: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu so tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā sotāpannaḥ hoti

original: avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu…pe…
analyzed: a vinipāta dhammaḥ niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu

original: so tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti. Sakideva
analyzed: so tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā rāga dosa mohānam tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti sakideva

original: imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī
analyzed: imam lokam āgantvā dukkhassantam karoti idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlesu paripūra kārī

original: hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: hoti samādhismim paripūra kārī paññāya kārī so yāni sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ…pe… anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā. Idha pana, bhikkhave,
analyzed: so pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ pe an āvatti dhammo tasmā idha pana bhikkhave

original: bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya paripūrakārī.
analyzed: bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti samādhismim paripūrakārī paññāya paripūrakārī

original: So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So āsavānaṃ khayā…pe…
analyzed: so yāni tāni sikkhati sikkhāpadesu saḥ āsavānam khaya āpe

original: upasampajja viharatī”ti.
analyzed: upasampajja viharati iti

original: “Katha”nti pucchitvā sikkhādike vibhajitvā vuttamevatthaṃ nigametuṃ “eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: katham ti pucchitvā sikkhā ādike vibhajitvā vuttam eva attham nigametum eva ntiādi vuttaṃ

original: Tattha aññe cāti tayo vivekā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni, tīṇi indriyānīti
analyzed: tattha aññe ca ati tayo vivekā tīṇi kusala mūlāni tīṇi vimokkha mukhāni tīṇi indriyāni iti

original: evamādayo, sikkhattikādīhi aññe ca guṇattikā. Evarūpāti yādisakā sikkhattikādayo
analyzed: evamādayo sikkhattika ādīhi aññe ca guṇattikāḥ evarūpā ati yādisakā sikkhattika ādayo

original: idha sīlādīhi pakāsitā honti, edisā.
analyzed: idha sīla ādīhi pakāsitāḥ honti edisā

original: Ettha hi vivaṭṭasannissitassa sīlassa idhādhippetattā sīlena kāyaviveko pakāsito
analyzed: ettha hi vivaṭṭa sannissitassa sīlassa idha adhippeta ttā sīlena kāya viveko pakāsito

original: hoti, samādhinā cittaviveko, paññāya upadhiviveko. Tathā sīlena adoso kusalamūlaṃ
analyzed: hoti samādhinā citta viveko paññāya upadhi viveko tathā sīlena adoso kusala mūlam

original: pakāsitaṃ hoti, titikkhappadhānatāya, aparūpaghātasabhāvatāya ca sīlassa. Samādhinā
analyzed: pakāsitam hoti titikkha ppadhāna tāya aparūpa ghāta sabhāva tāya ca sīlassa samādhinā

original: alobho kusalamūlaṃ, lobhapaṭipakkhato, alobhapadhānatāya ca samādhissa. Paññāya pana
analyzed: alobho kusala mūlam lobha paṭipakkhato alobha padhāna tāya ca samādhissa paññāya pana

original: amohoyeva. Sīlena ca animittavimokkhamukhaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. Adosappadhānaṃ hi sīlasampadaṃ
analyzed: sīlena ca animitta vimokkha mukham pakāsitam hoti a dosa padhānam hi sīla sampadam

original: nissāya dose ādīnavadassino aniccānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, aniccānupassanā ca
analyzed: nissāya dose ādīnava dassinaḥ anicca anupassanā sukhena iva ijjhati anicca anupassanā ca

original: animittavimokkhamukhaṃ. Samādhinā appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ. Paññāya suññatavimokkhamukhaṃ.
analyzed: animitta vimokkha mukham samādhinā appaṇihita vimokkha mukham paññāya suññata vimokkha mukham

original: Alobhappadhānaṃ hi kāmanissaraṇaṃ samādhisampadaṃ nissāya kāmesu ādīnavadassino dukkhānupassanā
analyzed: alobha ppadhānam hi kāma nissaraṇam samādhi sampadam nissāya kāmesu ādīnava dassinaḥ dukkha anupassanā

original: sukheneva ijjhati, dukkhānupassanā ca appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ. Paññāsampadaṃ nissāya
analyzed: sukhena iva ijjhati dukkha anupassanā ca appaṇihita vimokkha mukham paññā sampadam nissāya

original: anattānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, anattānupassanā ca suññatavimokkhamukhaṃ. Tathā
analyzed: anatta anupassanā sukhena iva ijjhati anatta anupassanā ca suññata vimokkha mukham tathā

original: sīlena anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. Taṃ hi sīlesu paripūrakārino aṭṭhamakassa
analyzed: sīlena anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam pakāsitam hoti tam hi sīlesu paripūra kārino aṭṭhamakassa

original: indriyaṃ. Samādhinā aññindriyaṃ. Taṃ hi ukkaṃsagataṃ samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino anāgāmino,
analyzed: indriyam samādhinā aññindriyam tam hi ukkaṃsa gatam samādhismim paripūra kārinaḥ anāgāminaḥ

original: aggamaggaṭṭhassa ca indriyaṃ. Paññāya aññātāvindriyaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. Taduppattiyā
analyzed: ca indriyam paññāya aññātāvindriyam pakāsitam hoti tad uppattiyā

original: hi arahā paññāya paripūrakārīti. Iminā nayena aññe ca evarūpā guṇattikā sīlādīhi pakāsetabbā.

original: Sīlasarūpādikathāvaṇṇanā

original: Pāṇātipātādīhīti ettha pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tassa saraseneva

original: Attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nītanti paṇītaṃ. Ubhinnameva vemajjhe bhavaṃ majjhimaṃ.

original: 12. Hīnādhimuttivasena chandādīnampi hīnatā. Paṇītādhimuttivasena paṇītatā. Tadubhayavemajjhatāvasena

original: Attano vimokkhatthāya pavattitanti sāvakapaccekabodhisattasīlamāha. Sabbasattānaṃ

original: vimokkhatthāyāti sabbasattānaṃ saṃsārabandhanato vimocanatthāya. Pāramitāsīlaṃ mahābodhisattasīlaṃ.

original: Yā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā mahābodhiṃ ārabbha pavattā paramukkaṃsagatasoceyyasallekhā

original: Ananurūpanti asāruppaṃ. Attā eva garu adhipati etassāti attagaru, lajjādhiko. Attādhipatito

original: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlavaṇṇanā

original: asiñcicca āpannaggahaṇena acittakāpattiyo gahitāti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ,

original: garukāpattīsupi kāsañci acittakabhāvasabbhāvato, adhiṭṭhānāvikammassa, desanāvikammasseva
analyzed: garuka āpattīsu pi kāsañci acittaka bhāva sabbhāvataḥ adhiṭṭhāna avikammassa desanā vikammassa iva

original: vā sabbalahukassa vajjassa idhādhippetattā. Tenāha “yāni tāni vajjāni appamattakāni
analyzed: vā sabba lahukassa vajjassa idha adhippeta ttā tena āha yāni tāni vajjāni appamattakāni

original: oramattakāni lahukāni lahusammatānī”tiādi. Ādisaddena pātimokkhasaṃvaravisuddhatthaṃ
analyzed: ora mattakāni lahukāni lahu sammatāni itiādi ādi saddena pātimokkha saṃvara visuddha attham

original: anatikkamanīyānaṃ anāpattigamanīyānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Bhayadassanasīloti paramāṇumattaṃ
analyzed: an atikkamanīyānam an āpatti gamanīyānam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo bhaya dassana sīlaḥ ti paramāṇumattam

original: vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatasadisaṃ katvā dassanasabhāvo,
analyzed: vajjam aṭṭha saṭṭhi yojana sata sahassa ubbedha sineru pabbata sadisam katvā dassana sabhāvaḥ

original: sabbalahukaṃ vā dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā dassanasabhāvo. Yaṃ kiñcīti
analyzed: sabba lahukam vā dubbhāsita mattam pārājika sadisam katvā dassana sabhāvaḥ yam kiñci iti

original: mūlapaññattianupaññattisabbatthapaññattipadesapaññattiādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ
analyzed: mūla paññatti anupaññatti sabbattha paññatti padesa paññatti ādi bhedam yam kiñci sikkhitabbam

original: paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ. Sammā ādāyāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ, sabbaso ca ādiyitvā.
analyzed: paṭipajjitabbam pūretabbam sīlam sammā ādāya ati sammat eva sakkaccam sabbaso ca ādiyitvā

original: Ayaṃ pana ācāragocarasampadā kiṃ pātimokkhasīle pariyāpannā, udāhu apariyāpannāti?
analyzed: ayam pana ācāra gocara sampadā kim pātimokkha sīle pariyāpannā udāhu a pariyāpannā ti

original: Pariyāpannā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā puna vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ettha cā”tiādi.
analyzed: pariyāpannā yadi evam kasmai puna vuttā iti codanam sandhāya āha ettha ca atiādi

original: Indriyasaṃvarasīlavaṇṇanā
15. Indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa sambhārabhūtaṃ, tasmiṃ satiyeva
analyzed: indriya saṃvara sīlam pātimokkha saṃvara sīlassa sambhāra bhūtam tasmim satiyā iva

original: icchitabbanti vuttaṃ “soti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhito bhikkhū”ti. Sampādite hi etasmiṃ
analyzed: icchitabbanti vuttam saḥ ti pātimokkha saṃvara sīle ṭhitaḥ bhikkhu iti sampādite hi etasmin

original: pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ suguttaṃ surakkhitameva hoti, susaṃvihitakaṇṭakavati viya
analyzed: pātimokkha saṃvara sīlam su guttam su rakkhitam eva hoti su saṃvihita kaṇṭakavati viya

original: sassanti. Kāraṇavasenāti asādhāraṇakāraṇassa vasena. Asādhāraṇakāraṇavasena hi phalaṃ
analyzed: sassanti kāraṇa vasena ati asādhāraṇa kāraṇassa vasena asādhāraṇa kāraṇa vasena hi phalam

original: apadisīyati, yathā yavaṅkuro bherisaddoti. Nissayavohārena vā etaṃ nissitavacanaṃ,
analyzed: apadisīyati yathā yavaṅkuraḥ bheri saddo ti nissaya vohārena vā etam nissita vacanam

original: yathā mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontīti. Rūpanti rūpāyatanaṃ. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti ettha
analyzed: yathā mañcāḥ ukkuṭṭhim karonti iti rūpanti rūpa āyatanam cakkhunā rūpam disvā ati ettha

original: yadi cakkhu rūpaṃ passeyya, aññaviññāṇasamaṅginopi passeyyuṃ, na cetaṃ atthi, kasmā?
analyzed: yadi cakkhu rūpam passeyya añña viññāṇa samaṅginaḥ api passeyyum na ca itam atthi kasmā

original: Acetanattā cakkhussa. Tenāha “cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati acittakattā”ti. Atha viññāṇaṃ
analyzed: acetana ttā cakkhussa tena āha cakkhu rūpam na passati acittaka ttā ati atha viññāṇam

original: rūpaṃ passeyya, tirokuṭṭādigatampi naṃ passeyya appaṭighabhāvato, idampi natthi sabbassa
analyzed: rūpam passeyya tiro kuṭṭa ādi gatam pi nam passeyya appaṭigha bhāvataḥ idam pi natthi sabbassa

original: viññāṇassa dassanābhāvato. Tenāha “cittaṃ na passati acakkhukattā”ti. Tattha yathā
analyzed: viññāṇassa dassana abhāvato tena āha cittam na passati acakkhuka ttā ti tattha yathā

original: cakkhusannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ passati, na yaṃ kiñci. Tañca kenaci kuṭṭādinā antarite
analyzed: cakkhu sannissitam viññāṇam passati na yam kiñci tat ca kenacid kuṭṭa ādinā antarite

original: na uppajjati, yattha ālokassa vibandho. Yattha pana na vibandho phalikagabbhapaṭalādike,
analyzed: na uppajjati yattha ālokassa vibandhaḥ yattha pana na vibandhaḥ phalika gabbha paṭala ādike

original: tattha antaritepi uppajjateva. Evaṃ viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ cakkhu passati, na yaṃ kiñcīti
analyzed: tattha antarite api uppajjatā iva evam viññāṇa adhiṭṭhitam cakkhu passati na yam kiñci iti

original: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ cakkhuṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti.
analyzed: viññāṇa adhiṭṭhitam cakkhum sandhāya itam vuttam cakkhunā rūpam disvā ti

original: Dvārārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭeti dvārassa ārammaṇena saṅghaṭṭe sati, cakkhussa rūpārammaṇe
analyzed: dvāra ārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭa iti dvārassa ārammaṇena saṅghaṭṭe sati cakkhussa rūpa ārammaṇe

original: āpāthagateti adhippāyo. Pasādavatthukena cittenāti cakkhupasādavatthukena tannissāya
analyzed: āpātha gatā iti adhippāyaḥ pasāda vatthukena cittena ati cakkhu pasāda vatthukena tat nissāya

original: pavattena viññāṇena, yaṃ “cakkhuviññāṇa”nti vuccati. Passatīti oloketi. Cakkhupasādasannissaye
analyzed: pavattena viññāṇena yam cakkhu viññāṇanti vuccati passati iti oloketi cakkhu pasāda sannissaye

original: hi viññāṇe ālokānuggahitaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sannissayaguṇena obhāsente taṃsamaṅgipuggalo
analyzed: hi viññāṇe āloka anuggahitam rūpa ārammaṇam sannissaya guṇena obhāsente tad samaṅgi puggalo

original: “rūpaṃ passatī”ti vuccati. Obhāsanañcettha ārammaṇassa yathāsabhāvato vibhāvanaṃ,
analyzed: rūpam passati iti vuccati obhāsanam ca ittha ārammaṇassa yathā sabhāvataḥ vibhāvanam

original: yaṃ “paccakkhato gahaṇa”nti vuccati. Usunā lakkhassa vedhe sijjhante tassa sambhārabhūtena
analyzed: yam paccakkhataḥ gahaṇanti vuccati usunā lakkhassa vedhe sijjhante tassa sambhāra bhūtena

original: dhanunā vijjhatīti vacanaṃ viya viññāṇena rūpadassane sijjhante cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatīti
analyzed: dhanunā vijjhati iti vacanam viya viññāṇena rūpa dassane sijjhante cakkhunā rūpam passati iti

original: īdisī sasambhārakathā nāmesā hoti. Sasambhārā kathā sasambhārakathā, dassanassa kāraṇasahitāti
analyzed: īdisī sa sambhāra kathā nāma isā hoti sa sambhārā kathā sa sambhāra kathā dassanassa kāraṇa sahitā ati

original: attho. Sasambhārassa vā dassanassa kathā sasambhārakathā. Tasmāti yasmā kevalena
analyzed: attho sa sambhārassa vā dassanassa kathā sa sambhāra kathā tasmā ati yasmā kevalena

original: cakkhunā, kevalena vā viññāṇena rūpadassanaṃ natthi, tasmā.
analyzed: cakkhunā kevalena vā viññāṇena rūpa dassanam na atthi tasmā

original: Itthipurisanimittaṃ vāti ettha itthisantānanissitarūpamukhena gayhamānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ
analyzed: itthi purisa nimittam vā ati ettha itthi santāna nissita rūpa mukhena gayhamānam saṇṭhānam

original: thanamaṃsāvisadatā nimmassumukhatā kesabandhanavatthaggahaṇaṃ avisadaṭṭhānagamanādi
analyzed: thana maṃsa avisada tā nimmassu mukha tā kesa bandhana vattha ggahaṇam avisada ṭṭhāna gamana ādi

original: ca sabbaṃ “itthī”ti sañjānanassa kāraṇabhāvato itthinimittaṃ. Vuttavipariyāyato purisanimittaṃ
analyzed: ca sabbam itthi iti sañjānanassa kāraṇa bhāvataḥ itthi nimittam vutta vipariyāyato purisa nimittam

original: veditabbaṃ. Subhanimittādikaṃ vāti ettha rāguppattihetubhūto iṭṭhākāro subhanimittaṃ.
analyzed: veditabbam subha nimitta ādikam vā ati ettha rāga uppatti hetu bhūtaḥ iṭṭha ākāraḥ subha nimittam

original: Ādi-saddena paṭighanimittādīnaṃ saṅgaho. So pana dosuppattiādihetubhūto aniṭṭhādiākāro
analyzed: ādi saddena paṭigha nimitta ādīnam saṅgahaḥ saḥ pana dosuppatti ādi hetu bhūtaḥ aniṭṭha ādi ākāro

original: veditabbo. Kāmañcettha pāḷiyaṃ abhijjhādomanassāva sarūpato āgatā, upekkhānimittassāpi
analyzed: veditabbo kāmam ca ittha pāḷiyam abhijjhā domanassā ava sarūpataḥ āgatāḥ upekkhā nimittassa api

original: pana saṅgaho icchitabbo, asamapekkhanena uppajjanakamohassāpi asaṃvarabhāvato. Tathā
analyzed: pana saṅgahaḥ icchitabbaḥ asamapekkhanena uppajjanaka mohassa api asaṃvara bhāvato tathā

original: hi vakkhati “muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā”ti. Upekkhānimittanti cettha aññāṇupekkhāya
analyzed: hi vakkhati muṭṭha saccam vā aññāṇam vā ati upekkhā nimittan ti ca ittha aññāṇa upekkhāya

original: vatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tañcassa asamapekkhanavasena veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ saṅkhepato
analyzed: vatthu bhūtam ārammaṇam tat ca assa a samapekkhana vasena veditabbam evam saṅkhepato

original: rāgadosamohānaṃ kāraṇaṃ “subhanimittādika”nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “kilesavatthubhūtaṃ
analyzed: rāga dosa mohānam kāraṇam subha nimitta ādikam ti vuttam tena āha kilesa vatthu bhūtam

original: nimitta”nti. Diṭṭhamatteyeva saṇṭhātīti “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti sutte
analyzed: nimittam ti diṭṭha mattā iya iva saṇṭhāti iti diṭṭhe diṭṭha mattam bhavissati iti sutte

original: vuttanayena vaṇṇāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena, vīthicittehi ca gahitamatteyeva tiṭṭhati,
analyzed: vutta nayena vaṇṇa āyatane cakkhu viññāṇena vīthi cittehi ca tiṭṭhati

original: na tato paraṃ kiñci subhādiākāraṃ parikappeti. Pākaṭabhāvakaraṇatoti paribyattabhāvakaraṇato
analyzed: na tatas param kiñci subha ādi ākāram parikappeti pākaṭa bhāva karaṇato ti paribyatta bhāva karaṇato

original: vibhūtabhāvakaraṇato. Visabhāgavatthuno hi hatthādiavayavesu subhādito parikappentassa
analyzed: vibhūta bhāva karaṇataḥ visa bhāga vatthunaḥ hi hattha ādi avayavesu subha āditaḥ parikappentassa

original: aparāparaṃ tattha uppajjamānā kilesā paribyattā hontīti te tesaṃ anubyañjanā nāma.
analyzed: apara aparam tattha uppajjamānā kilesā paribyattāḥ honti iti te tesam anubyañjanāḥ nāma

original: Te pana yasmā tathā tathā sanniviṭṭhānaṃ bhūtupādāyarūpānaṃ sannivesākāro. Na hi
analyzed: te pana yasmai tathā tathā sanniviṭṭhānam sannivesa ākāraḥ na hi

original: taṃ muñcitvā paramatthato hatthādi nāma koci atthi. Tasmā vuttaṃ “hatthapāda…pe…
analyzed: tam muñcitvā paramatthataḥ hattha ādi nāma koci atthi tasmā vuttam hattha pādape

original: ākāraṃ na gaṇhātī”ti. Kiṃ pana gaṇhātīti āha “yaṃ tattha bhūtaṃ, tadeva gaṇhātī”ti.
analyzed: ākāram na gaṇhāti iti kim pana gaṇhāti iti āha yam tattha bhūtam tat eva gaṇhāti iti

original: Yaṃ tasmiṃ sarīre vijjamānaṃ kesalomādi bhūtupādāyamattaṃ vā, tadeva yāthāvato gaṇhāti.
analyzed: yam tasmin sarīre vijjamānam kesa loma ādi bhūtu pādāya mattam vā tat eva yāthāvataḥ gaṇhāti

original: Tattha asubhākāragahaṇassa nidassanaṃ dassento “cetiyapabbatavāsī”tiādinā mahātissattheravatthuṃ āhari.
analyzed: tattha asubha ākāra gahaṇassa nidassanam dassento cetiya pabbata vāsī iti ādinā mahā tissa tthera vatthum āhari

original: Tattha sumaṇḍitapasādhitāti suṭṭhu maṇḍitā pasādhitā ca. Ābharaṇādīhi āhārimehi maṇḍanaṃ.
analyzed: tattha su maṇḍita pasādhitā ti suṭṭhu maṇḍitā pasādhitā ca ābharaṇa ādīhi maṇḍanam

original: Sarīrassa ucchādanādivasena paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ pasādhananti vadanti, ābharaṇehi, pana
analyzed: sarīrassa ucchādana ādi vasena paṭisaṅkharaṇam vadanti ābharaṇehi pana

original: vatthālaṅkārādīhi ca alaṅkaraṇaṃ pasādhanaṃ. Ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ maṇḍanaṃ. Vipallatthacittāti
analyzed: vattha alaṅkāra ādīhi ca alaṅkaraṇam pasādhanam ūna ṭṭhāna pūraṇam maṇḍanam vipallattha citta ati

original: rāgavasena viparītacittā. Olokentoti thero kammaṭṭhānamanasikāreneva gacchanto saddakaṇṭakattā
analyzed: rāga vasena viparīta cittā olokento ti thero kammaṭṭhāna manasikārena iva gacchanto sadda kaṇṭaka ttā

original: pubbabhāgamanasikārassa hasitasaddānusārena “kimeta”nti olokento. Asubhasaññanti
analyzed: pubba bhāga manasikārassa hasita sadda anusārena kim etat ti olokento asubha saññanti

original: aṭṭhikasaññaṃ. Aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānaṃ hi thero tadā pariharati. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti thero
analyzed: aṭṭhika saññam aṭṭhika kammaṭṭhānam hi thero tadā pariharati arahattam pāpuṇi iti thero

original: kira tassā hasantiyā dantaṭṭhidassaneneva pubbabhāgabhāvanāya subhāvitattā paṭibhāganimittaṃ,
analyzed: kira tassāḥ hasantiyāḥ danta ṭṭhi dassanena iva pubbabhāga bhāvanāya su bhāvita ttā paṭibhāga nimittam

original: sātisayañca upacārajjhānaṃ labhitvā yathāṭhitova tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ adhigantvā
analyzed: sa atisayam ca upacāra jhānam labhitvā yathā ṭhitaḥ uva tattha paṭhama jhānam adhigantvā

original: taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaparamparāya āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. Pubbasaññaṃ
analyzed: tam pādakam katvā vipassanam vaḍḍhetvā magga paramparāya āsava kkhayam pāpuṇi pubba saññam

original: anussarīti pubbakaṃ yathāraddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ anuyuñjiyamānaṃ aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: anussarīti pubbakam yathā āraddham kālena kālam anuyuñjiyamānam aṭṭhika kammaṭṭhānam

original: anussari samannāhari. Anumagganti anupathaṃ tassā padānupadaṃ. Therassa kira bhāvanāya
analyzed: anussari samannāhari anumagganti anupatham tassā pada anupadam therassa kira bhāvanāya

original: paguṇabhāvato dantaṭṭhidassaneneva tassā sakalasarīraṃ aṭṭhikasaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: paguṇa bhāvataḥ danta ṭṭhi dassanena iva tassā sakala sarīram aṭṭhika saṅghāta bhāvena upaṭṭhāsi

original: Na taṃ “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā sañjāni. Tenāha “nābhijānāmi…pe… mahāpathe”ti.
analyzed: na tam itthī iti vā puriso ti vā tena āha na abhijānāmi pe mahāpatha iti

original: “Yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetū”ti vatvā puna “tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriya asaṃvarassa hetu uti vatvā puna tassa cakkhu indriyassa sati kavāṭena

original: pidahanatthāyā”ti vuttaṃ, na asaṃvarassāti. Yadidaṃ yaṃ cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu
analyzed: pidahana tthāya ati vuttam na asaṃvarassa ati yat idam yam cakkhu indriya asaṃvarassa hetu

original: abhijjhādianvāssavanaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ asaṃvutacakkhundriyasseva hetu pavattaṃ dassitanti
analyzed: dassitam tam asaṃvuta cakkhu indriyassa iva hetu pavattam dassitanti

original: katvā vuttaṃ. Cakkhudvārikassa hi abhijjhādianvāssavanassa taṃdvārikaviññāṇassa viya
analyzed: katvā vuttam cakkhu dvārikassa hi abhijjhā ādi anvāssavanassa taṃdvārika viññāṇassa viya

original: cakkhundriyaṃ padhānakāraṇaṃ. Cakkhundriyassa asaṃvutatte sati te anvāssavantīti
analyzed: cakkhu indriyam padhāna kāraṇam cakkhu indriyassa a saṃvuta tte sati te anvāssavanti iti

original: asaṃvariyamānacakkhundriyahetuko so asaṃvaro tathā vuttoti. Yatvādhikaraṇanti hi
analyzed: a saṃvariyamāna cakkhu indriya hetuko so asaṃvaro tathā vutto ti yatvā adhikaraṇam ti hi

original: yassa cakkhundriyassa kāraṇāti attho. Kīdisassa ca kāraṇāti? Asaṃvutassa, kiñca asaṃvutaṃ?
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyassa kāraṇā ati atthaḥ kīdisassa ca kāraṇā ati asaṃvutassa kiñca asaṃvutam

original: Yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu abhijjhādayo anvāssavanti, tassa saṃvarāyāti ayamettha yojanā.
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriya asaṃvarassa hetu abhijjhā ādayaḥ anvāssavanti tassa saṃvarāya ati ayam ettha yojanā

original: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vātiādi puna avacanatthaṃ idheva sabbaṃ vuttanti
analyzed: java nakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyam vā ati ādi puna avacana attham idha iva sabbam vuttan ti

original: chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbaṃ. Na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavam veditabbam na hi pañca dvāre kāya vacī duccarita saṅkhātam

original: dussīlyaṃ atthi, tasmā dussīlyāsaṃvaro manodvāravasena, sesāsaṃvaro chadvāravasena
analyzed: dussīlyaṃ atthi tasmai dussīlya a saṃvaraḥ manaḥ dvāra vasena sesa a saṃvaraḥ cha dvāra vasena

original: yojetabbo. Muṭṭhasaccādīnaṃ hi satipaṭipakkhākusaladhammādibhāvato siyā pañcadvāre
analyzed: yojetabbaḥ muṭṭha sacca ādīnam hi sati paṭipakkha akusala dhamma ādi bhāvato siyā pañca dvāre

original: uppatti, na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti, pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ

original: aviññattijanakattā. Dussīlyādayo cettha pañca asaṃvarā sīlasaṃvarādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ

original: Yathā kinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro “cakkhundriye asaṃvaro”ti vuccati,
analyzed: yathā kinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamānaḥ asaṃvaro cakkhu indriye asaṃvaro ti vuccati

original: taṃ nidassanaṃ kinti attho. Yathātiādinā nagaradvāre asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ
analyzed: tat nidassanam kim ti atthaḥ yathā āti ādinā nagara dvāre asaṃvare sati

original: gharādīnaṃ asaṃvutatā viya javane asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ dvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutatāti
analyzed: a saṃvuta tā javane a saṃvare sati dvāra ādīnam a saṃvuta tā ati

original: evaṃ aññāsaṃvare aññāsaṃvutatā sāmaññameva nidasseti, na pubbāparasāmaññaṃ, antobahisāmaññaṃ

original: vuttaṃ, itarañca antonagare gharādisamānaṃ. Paccayabhāvena hi purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle

analyzed: santanti vuccati bāhiram viya katvā iti ca paramatthataḥ javanassa bāhira bhāve

original: itarassa ca abbhantarabhāve asatipi “pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho

original: eva chadanaṃ hoti. Aṭṭālakākārena karīyatītipi vadanti. Māḷo vaṭṭākārena katasenāsanaṃ.

original: Uddaṇḍo eko paṭissayaviseso. Yo “bhaṇḍasālā, udosita”ntipi vuccati. Upaṭṭhānasālā sannipatanaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: uddaṇḍaḥ ekaḥ paṭissaya viseso yaḥ bhaṇḍasālā udositanti pi vuccati upaṭṭhānasālā sannipatana ṭṭhānam

original: Kucchitarajabhūtāya pāpicchatāya niratthakaṃ kāyavacīvipphandaniggaṇhanaṃ korajaṃ,
analyzed: kucchita raja bhūtāya pāpa icchatāya niratthakam kāya vacī vipphanda niggaṇhanam korajam

original: taṃ etassa atthīti korajiko, kohaññena saṃyatakāyo, ativiya, abhiṇhaṃ vā korajiko
analyzed: tam etassa atthi iti korajikaḥ kohaññena saṃyata kāyaḥ ativiya abhiṇham vā korajikaḥ

original: korajikakorajiko. Atiparisaṅkitoti keci. Ativiya kuho kuhakakuhako, sātisayavimhāpakoti
analyzed: korajika korajikaḥ ati parisaṅkitaḥ iti keci kuho kuhaka kuhakaḥ sa atisaya vimhāpakaḥ iti

original: attho. Ativiya lapo lapanako lapakalapako. Mukhasambhāvikoti korajikakorajikādibhāvena
analyzed: attho ativiya lapaḥ lapanakaḥ lapaka lapakaḥ mukha sambhāvikaḥ iti korajika korajika ādi bhāvena

original: pavattavacanehi attano mukhamattena aññehi sambhāviko. So evarūpo evarūpatāya eva
analyzed: pavatta vacanehi attanaḥ mukha mattena aññehi sambhāviko so evarūpaḥ evarūpa tāya eva

original: attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā “ayaṃ samaṇo”tiādīni katheti. Gambhīrantiādi tassā kathāya

original: uttarimanussadhammapaṭibaddhatāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: uttari manussa dhamma paṭibaddha tāya vuttam

original: Sambhāvanādhippāyakatenāti “kathaṃ nu kho maṃ jano ‘ariyo’ti vā ‘visesalābhī’ti vā
analyzed: sambhāvanā adhippāya katena ati katham nu kho mam janaḥ ariyaḥ iti vā visesa lābhī iti vā

original: sambhāveyyā”ti iminā adhippāyena katena. Gamanaṃ saṇṭhapetīti visesalābhīnaṃ gamanaṃ

original: viya attano gamanaṃ sakkaccaṃ ṭhapeti, sato sampajānova gacchanto viya hoti. Paṇidhāyāti
analyzed: viya attanaḥ gamanam sakkaccam ṭhapeti sataḥ sampajānā uva gacchantaḥ viya hoti paṇidhāya ati

analyzed: āpāthake janassa pākaṭa ṭhāne jhāyī iriyāpatha saṅkhātanti iriyāpatha saṇṭhapana saṅkhātam

original: Paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātenāti ayoniso uppāditānaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭisevananti evaṃ kathitena,
analyzed: paccaya paṭisevana saṅkhātena ati ayonisas uppāditānam paccayānam paṭisevanan ti evam kathitena

original: Puṭṭhassāti “ko tisso, ko rājapūjito”ti puṭṭhassa. Uddhaṃ katvāti ukkhipitvā vibhavasampattiādinā paggahetvā.

original: Unnahanāti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ bandhanā paliveṭhanā. Dve kira bhikkhū ekaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā

original: “ayaṃ, bhante, kassa kumārikā”ti? “Amhākaṃ upaṭṭhāyikāya telakandarikāya dhītā, imissā

original: ukkācesi. Imaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “telakandarikavatthu cettha vattabba”nti.
analyzed: imam sandhāya vuttam telakandarika vatthu ca ittha vattabbanti

original: Dhammānurūpā vāti mattāvacanānurūpaṃ vā. Mattāvacanaṃ hi “dhammo”ti vuccati. Yathāha
analyzed: dhamma anurūpā vā ati mattā vacana anurūpam vā mattā vacanam hi dhammo ti vuccati yathā āha

analyzed: su bhāsitam uttamam āhu santaḥ dhammam bhaṇe na adhammam tam tena bahum

original: vippalapanamāha, saccato vā aññā subhāsitā vācā “dhammo”ti veditabbo. Muggasūpasadisakammo

original: pāribhaṭyaṃ, tadeva pāribhaṭyatā.
analyzed: pāribhaṭyam tat eva pāribhaṭya tā

original: Nimittena caranto, jīvanto vā nimittako, tassa bhāvo nemittikatā. Attano icchāya
analyzed: nimittena carantaḥ jīvantaḥ vā nimittakaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ nemittika tā attanaḥ icchāya

original: pakāsanaṃ obhāso. Ko pana soti? “Ajja bhikkhūnaṃ paccayā dullabhā jātā”tiādikā paccayapaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
analyzed: pakāsanam obhāso kaḥ pana so ti ajja bhikkhūnam paccayā dullabhā jātā ati ādikā paccaya paṭisaṃyutta kathā

original: Icchitavatthussa samīpe kathanaṃ sāmantajappā.
analyzed: icchita vatthussa samīpe kathanam sāmantajappā

original: Akkosanabhayenāpi dadeyyāti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanaṃ. Tathā vambhanādayo.
analyzed: akkosana bhayena api dadeyyāti dasahi akkosa vatthūhi akkosanam tathā vambhana ādayaḥ

analyzed: patiṭṭhāpanam paresam piṭṭhi maṃsa khādana sīlo para piṭṭhi maṃsiko tassa bhāvo para piṭṭhi maṃsika tā

original: Nikattuṃ appena lābhena bahukaṃ vañcetvā gahetuṃ icchanaṃ nijigīsanaṃ, tassa bhāvo nijigīsanatā. Tasseva icchanassa pavattiākāro, taṃsahajātaṃ vā gavesanakammaṃ.

original: Aṅganti hatthapādādiaṅgāni uddissa pavattaṃ vijjaṃ. Nimittanti nimittasatthaṃ. Uppātanti

analyzed: sati idam nāma phalam hoti iti jānanakasattham palāsaggi ādīsu iminā nāma agginā hute

analyzed: paccaya sannissita sīla vaṇṇanā

analyzed: ayam sayam abhiññāti ādīsu viya yakāra lopena niddesaḥ yonisaḥ ti

original: avekkhitvā, ñāṇena passitvāti attho, evaṃ paṭisaṅkhāyāti tadeva payojanaṃ pati pati

analyzed: saṅkhāya jānitvā ti atthaḥ ñāṇa pariyāyaḥ hi idha saṅkhā saddo ti ettha ca paṭisaṅkhā

original: yoniso”tiādi kāmaṃ paccayaparibhogakālena vuccati, dhātuvasena pana paṭikūlavasena
analyzed: kāmam paccaya paribhoga kālena vuccati dhātu vasena pana paṭikūla vasena

analyzed: vā paccavekkhaṇāya paccaya sannissita sīlam sujjhati iti apare bhijjati iti keci eke

analyzed: pana paṭhamam eva pariyattanti vadanti vīmaṃsitabbam cīvaranti eka vacanam ekattamattam

original: vācakanti adhippāyena “antaravāsakādīsu yaṃ kiñcī”ti vuttaṃ, jātisaddatāya pana tassa
analyzed: vācakanti adhippāyena antaravāsaka ādīsu yam kiñci iti vuttam jāti sadda tāya pana tassa

original: pāḷiyaṃ ekavacananti yattakāni cīvarāni yoginā pariharitabbāni, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ekajjhaṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam eka vacanam ti yattakāni cīvarāni yoginā pariharitabbāni tesam sabbesam ekajjham

original: gahaṇanti sakkā viññātuṃ, yaṃ kiñcīti vā anavasesapariyādānametaṃ, na aniyamavacanaṃ.
analyzed: gahaṇanti sakkā viññātum yam kiñci iti vā anavasesa pariyādānam etam na aniyama vacanam

original: “Nivāseti vā pārupati vā”ti vikappanaṃ pana paṭisevanapariyāyassa paribhogassa vibhāgadassananti
analyzed: nivāseti vā vā ati vikappanam pana paṭisevana pariyāyassa paribhogassa vibhāga dassanam ti

original: taṃ paññapetvā sayananisīdana-cīvarakuṭikaraṇādivasenāpi paribhogassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: tam paññapetvā sayana nisīdana cīvara kuṭi karaṇa ādi vasena api paribhogassa saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Payojanānaṃ mariyādā payojanāvadhi, tassa paricchindanavasena yo niyamo, tassa vacanaṃ
analyzed: mariyādā payojana avadhi tassa paricchindana vasena yaḥ niyamo tassa vacanam

original: payojanā…pe… vacanaṃ. Idāni taṃ niyamaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ “ettakameva hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vacanam idāni tam niyamam vivaritvā dassetum ettakam eva hi itiādi vuttam

original: Tattha avadhāraṇena līḷāvibhūsāvilambanānaṭambarādivasena vatthaparibhogaṃ nisedheti.
analyzed: tattha avadhāraṇena vattha paribhogam nisedha iti

original: Tenāha “na ito bhiyyo”ti. Līḷāvasena hi ekacce sattā vatthāni paridahanti ceva upasaṃviyanti
analyzed: tena āha na itas bhiyyas iti līḷā vasena hi ekacce sattāḥ vatthāni paridahanti ca iva upasaṃviyanti

original: ca. Yathā taṃ yobbane ṭhitā nāgarikamanussā. Ekacce vibhūsanavasena, yathā taṃ rūpūpajīviniādayo.
analyzed: ca yathā tam yobbane ṭhitāḥ nāgarika manussāḥ ekacce vibhūsana vasena yathā tam rūpūpajīvini ādayaḥ

original: Vilambanavasena vilambakā. Naṭambaravasena bhojādayo. Ajjhattadhātukkhobho sītarogādiuppādako.
analyzed: vilambana vasena vilambakāḥ naṭambara vasena bhoja ādayaḥ ajjhatta dhātu kkhobho sīta roga ādi uppādako

original: Utupariṇāmanavasenāti utuno parivattanavasena visabhāgasītautusamuṭṭhānena. Vā-saddena
analyzed: utu pariṇāmana vasena ati utuno parivattana vasena visa bhāga sītā otu samuṭṭhānena vā saddena

original: hemantādīsu himapātādivasena pavattassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na uppādeti sītanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: hemanta ādīsu hima pāta ādi vasena pavattassa saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo na uppādeti sītanti adhippāyaḥ

original: Yadatthaṃ pana taṃ vinodanaṃ, taṃ matthakappattaṃ dassetuṃ “sītabbhāhate”tiādi vuttaṃ.

original: Sabbatthāti “uṇhassa paṭighātāyā”tiādīsu sabbesu sesapayojanesu. Yadipi sūriyasantāpopi
analyzed: sabbattha āti uṇhassa paṭighātāya atiādīsu sabbesu sesa payojanesu yadi api sūriya santāpaḥ api

original: uṇhova, tassa pana ātapaggahaṇena gahitattā “aggisantāpassā”ti vuttaṃ. Ekacco dāvaggisantāpo
analyzed: uṇhaḥ uva tassa pana ātapa gahaṇena gahita ttā aggi santāpassa ati vuttam ekaccaḥ dau aggi santāpaḥ

original: kāyaṃ cīvarena paṭicchādetvā sakkā vinodetunti āha “tassa vanadāhādīsu sambhavo veditabbo”ti.
analyzed: kāyam cīvarena paṭicchādetvā sakkā vinodetunti āha tassa vana dāha ādīsu sambhavaḥ veditabbaḥ ti

original: Ḍaṃsāti piṅgalamakkhikā. Te pana yasmā ḍaṃsanasīlā, tasmā vuttaṃ “ḍaṃsanamakkhikā”ti.
analyzed: ḍaṃsā ati piṅgala makkhikā te pana yasmā ḍaṃsana sīlā tasmā vuttam ḍaṃsanamakkhikā ati

original: Sappādayoti sappasatapadiuṇṇanābhisarabūvicchikādayo. Phuṭṭhasamphassoti phuṭṭhavisamāha.
analyzed: sappa ādayo ti sappa sata padi uṇṇa nābhi sarabū vicchika ādayo phuṭṭha samphasso ti phuṭṭha visamāha

original: Tividhā hi sappā – daṭṭhavisā phuṭṭhavisā diṭṭhavisā. Tesu purimakā dve eva gahitā.

original: Satapadiādīnampi tādisānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ. Niyatapayojanaṃ ekantikaṃ, sabbakālikañca

original: viyāti attho. Tasmāti “sīlavato”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati.
analyzed: viyā ti attho tasmāti sīlavato ti ādinā vuttam evattham kāraṇa bhāvena paccāmasati

original: Cīvaraṃ kāyato mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge purebhatta…pe… pacchimayāmesu paccavekkhitabbanti
analyzed: cīvaram kāyataḥ mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge purebhattape pacchima yāmesu paccavekkhitabbanti

original: sambandho. Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekadivase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tathā a sakkontena yathā vutta kāla visesa vasena eka divase catukkhattum tikkhattum

original: dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Sace aruṇaṃ uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne
analyzed: dvi khattum vā paccavekkhitabbam sace aruṇam uggacchati iṇa paribhogaṭṭhāne

original: tiṭṭhati. Hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttaṃ, taṃ yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya…pe…
analyzed: tiṭṭhati hiyyas yam mayā cīvaram paribhuttam tam yāvat eva sītassa

original: hirikopīnapaṭicchādanatthaṃ. Hiyyo yo mayā piṇḍapāto paribhutto, so “neva davāyā”tiādinā
analyzed: hiri kopīna paṭicchādana ttham hiyyaḥ yaḥ mayā piṇḍapātaḥ paribhuttaḥ saḥ na iva davāya ati ādinā

original: sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ na kareyyāti vadanti, taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Senāsanampi
analyzed: sace atīta paribhoga paccavekkhaṇam na kareyya ati vadanti tam vīmaṃsitabbam senāsanam pi

original: paribhoge paribhogeti pavese pavese. Satipaccayatāti satiyā paccayabhāvo paṭiggahaṇassa,
analyzed: paribhoge paribhoge iti pavese pavese sati paccaya tā ati satiyā paccaya bhāvaḥ paṭiggahaṇassa

original: paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati, paccavekkhitvāva paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
analyzed: paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇa satiyā paccaya bhāvaḥ yujjati paccavekkhitvā ava paṭiggahetabbam

original: paribhuñjitabbañcāti attho. Tenevāha “satiṃ katvā”tiādi. Evaṃ santepīti yadipi dvīsupi
analyzed: paribhuñjitabbam ca ati atthaḥ tena iva āha satim katvā atiādi evam sante pi iti yadi pi dvīsupi

original: ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā, evaṃ santepi. Apare panāhu – sati paccayatāti sati bhesajjaparibhogassa
analyzed: ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā evam sante pi apare pana āhu sati paccaya tā ati sati bhesajja paribhogassa

original: paccayabhāve, sati paccayeti attho. Evaṃ santepīti paccaye satipīti. Taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.
analyzed: paccaya bhāve sati paccaya iti atthaḥ evam sante api iti paccaye sati api iti tam tesam matimattam

original: Tathā hi paccayasannissitasīlaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya visujjhati, na paccayassa bhāvamattena.
analyzed: tathā hi paccaya sannissita sīlam paccavekkhaṇāya visujjhati na paccayassa bhāva mattena

original: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi visuddhiyo
analyzed: evam paccaya sannissita sīlassa visuddhim dassetvā tena iva pasaṅgena sabbā api visuddhiyaḥ

original: dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha. Tattha sujjhati etāyāti suddhi, yathādhammaṃ
analyzed: dassetum catubbidhā hi suddhi iti ādim āha tattha sujjhati etāya ati suddhi yathādhammam

original: desanāva suddhi desanāsuddhi. Vuṭṭhānassāpi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: desanā va suddhi desanā suddhi vuṭṭhānassa api ca ittha desanāya eva saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Chinnamūlāpattīnaṃ pana abhikkhutāpaṭiññāva desanā. Adhiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho saṃvarova
analyzed: chinna mūla āpattīnam pana abhikkhu tā paṭiññā ava desanā adhiṭṭhāna visiṭṭhaḥ saṃvaraḥ va

original: suddhi saṃvarasuddhi. Dhammena samena paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
analyzed: suddhi saṃvara suddhi dhammena samena paccayānam pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhi suddhi

original: Catūsupi paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi. Esa tāva
analyzed: catūsu pi paccayesu vutta vidhinā

original: suddhīsu samāsanayo. Suddhimantesu pana desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi. Sesesupi
analyzed: suddhīsu samāsanayo suddhimantesu pana desanā suddhi etassa ati desanā suddhi sesesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Suddhi-saddo pana vuttanayova. Evanti saṃvarabhedaṃ sandhāyāha. Pahāyāti
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ suddhi saddo pana vutta nayaḥ va evanti saṃvara bhedam sandhāya āha pahāya iti

original: vajjetvā, akatvāti attho.
analyzed: vajjetvā a katvā iti attho

original: Dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti dāyādā. Ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato,
analyzed: dātabba ṭṭhena dāyam tam ādiyanti iti dāyādāḥ an anuññātesu sabbena sabbam paribhoga abhāvato

original: anuññātesu eva ca paribhogasambhavato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato
analyzed: anuññātesu eva ca paribhoga sambhavataḥ bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabba paccayāḥ bhagavataḥ

original: santakā. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu anukampā
analyzed: santakāḥ dhamma dāyādāḥ me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisa dāyādāḥ atthi me tumhesu anukampā

original: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ no āmisadāyādā”’ti evaṃ pavattaṃ dhammadāyādasuttañca
analyzed: kinti me sāvakāḥ dhamma dāyādāḥ bhaveyyum no āmisa dāyādā ti evam pavattam dhamma dāyāda suttam ca

original: ettha etasmiṃ atthe sādhakaṃ.
analyzed: ettha etasmin atthe sādhakam

original: Avītarāgānaṃ taṇhāparavasatāya paccayaparibhoge sāmibhāvo natthi, tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ
analyzed: avīta rāgānam taṇhā paravasa tāya paccaya paribhoge sāmibhāvaḥ natthi tad abhāvena vīta rāgānam

analyzed: tattha sāmi bhāvaḥ yathāruci paribhoga sambhavato tathā hi te appaṭikūlam api appaṭikūla ākārena

original: appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena, tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhanākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti,
analyzed: a paṭikūlam pi paṭikūla ākārena tat ubhayam pi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhana ākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti

original: dāyakānañca manorathaṃ paripūrenti. Tenāha “te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino
analyzed: dāyakān añca manoratham paripūrenti tena āha te hi taṇhāya dāsabyam sāminaḥ

original: hutvā paribhuñjantī”ti.
analyzed: hutvā paribhuñjanti iti

original: Sabbesanti ariyānaṃ, puthujjanānañca. Kathaṃ puthujjanānaṃ ime paribhogā sambhavanti?
analyzed: sabbesanti ariyānam puthujjanānam ca katham puthujjanānam ime paribhogā sambhavanti

original: Upacāravasena. Yo hi puthujjanassāpi sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ
analyzed: upacāra vasena yaḥ hi puthujjanassa api sallekha paṭipattiyam ṭhitassa paccaya gedham

original: pahāya tattha tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo, so sāmiparibhogo viya hoti.
analyzed: pahāya tattha tattha an upalittena cittena paribhogo so sāmi paribhogaḥ viya hoti

original: Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti, dāyakānaṃ manorathassa
analyzed: sīlavataḥ pana paccavekkhita paribhogaḥ dāyajja paribhogaḥ viya hoti dāyakānam manorathassa

original: avirādhanato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa
analyzed: a virādhanataḥ tathā hi vuttam vā saṅgaham gacchati iti kalyāṇa puthujjanassa

original: paribhoge vattabbameva natthi, tassa sekkhasaṅgahato. Sekkhasuttaṃ hetassatthassa
analyzed: paribhoge vattabbam eva na atthi tassa sekkha saṅgahato sekkha suttam ha itassa atthassa

original: sādhakaṃ. Tenāha “sīlavāpi hī”tiādi. Paccanīkattāti yathā iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitadesaṃ

original: gantuṃ na labhati, evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā
analyzed: gantum na labhati evam iṇa paribhoga yuttaḥ lokataḥ nissaritum na labhati iti tad paṭipakkha ttā

original: sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti āha “āṇaṇyaparibhogo vā”ti. Etena
analyzed: sīlavataḥ paccavekkhita paribhogo āṇaṇya paribhogo ti āha āṇaṇya paribhogaḥ vā ati etena

original: nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti dasseti. Imāya sikkhāyāti
analyzed: catu paribhoga vinimutto visum yeva ayam paribhogaḥ ti dasseti imāya sikkhāya ati

original: sīlasaṅkhātāya sikkhāya. Kiccakārīti paṭiññānurūpaṃ paṭipajjanato yuttapattakārī.
analyzed: sīla saṅkhātāya sikkhāya kicca kārī iti paṭiññā anurūpam paṭipajjanataḥ yutta patta kārī

original: Idāni tameva kiccakāritaṃ suttapadena vibhāvetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: idāni tam eva kicca kāritam sutta padena vibhāvetum vuttam pi cetan ti ādi vuttam tattha

original: vihāranti patissayaṃ. Sayanāsananti mañcādiṃ. Ubhayenapi senāsanameva vuttaṃ. Āpanti
analyzed: vihāranti pati ssayam sayanāsananti mañca ādim ubhayena api senāsanam eva vuttam āpanti

original: udakaṃ. Saṅghāṭirajūpavāhananti paṃsumalādino saṅghāṭigatarajassa dhovanaṃ. Sutvāna
analyzed: udakam saṅghāṭi rajū upavāhananti paṃsu mala ādinaḥ saṅghāṭi gata rajassa dhovanam sutvāna

analyzed: dhammam sugatena desitanti cīvara ādīsu paṭisaṅkhā yonisas cīvaram paṭisevati sītassa

original: paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā. Saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvakoti
analyzed: paṭighātāya ati ādinā nayena bhagavatā desitam dhammam sutvā saṅkhāya seve vara paññasāvako ti

analyzed: catubbidham paccayam saṅkhāya yāvat eva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā ati ādinā nayena paccavekkhitvā

original: Seve sevituṃ sakkuṇeyya uttamapaññassa bhagavato sāvako sekho vā puthujjano vā.
analyzed: seve sevitum sakkuṇeyyaḥ uttama paññassa bhagavato sāvako sekhaḥ vā puthujjanaḥ vā

original: Yasmā ca saṅkhāya sevī varapaññasāvako, tasmā hi piṇḍe…pe… pokkhare vāribindu, tathā
analyzed: ca saṅkhāya sevī vara paññasāvako tasmā hi piṇḍepe pokkhare vāri bindu tathā

original: Anuggahāti anukampāya bahumhi upanīte mattaṃ so jaññā jāneyya satataṃ sabbakālaṃ

analyzed: sarīrassa yāpanāya amucchito ti taṇhā mucchāya amucchitaḥ gedham taṇham an āpannaḥ

original: Attano mātulassa saṅgharakkhitattherasseva nāmassa gahitattā bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero.

original: Sālikūranti sālibhattaṃ. Sunibbutanti susītalaṃ. Asaññatoti apaccavekkhaṇaṃ sandhāyāha.

original: Sabbāsavaparikkhīṇoti parikkhīṇasabbāsavo.
analyzed: sabba āsava parikkhīṇoti parikkhīṇa sabba āsavaḥ

original: Paṭhamasīlapañcakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: paṭhama sīla pañcaka vaṇṇanā

original: 20. Pariyanto etesaṃ atthīti pariyantāni, pariyantāni sikkhāpadāni yesaṃ te pariyantasikkhāpadā,
analyzed: pariyantaḥ etesam atthi iti pariyantāni pariyantāni sikkhāpadāni yesam te pariyanta sikkhāpadā

original: tadaññesaṃ upasampannānaṃ. Sāmaññajotanāpi hi visese tiṭṭhati. Kusaladhamme yuttānanti
analyzed: tad aññesam upasampannānam sāmañña jotanā api hi visese tiṭṭhati kusala dhamme yuttānam ti

original: vipassanācāre yuttapayuttānaṃ. Sekkhadhammā pariyantā paramā mariyādā etassāti sekkhapariyanto.
analyzed: vipassanā ācāre yutta payuttānam sekkha dhammā pariyantā paramā mariyādā etassa ati sekkha pariyantaḥ

original: Nāmarūpaparicchedato, kusaladhammasamādānato vā pana paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhū, tāva
analyzed: nāma rūpa paricchedato kusala dhamma samādānato vā pana paṭṭhāya yāva tāva

original: pavattakusaladhammappabandho sekkhadhamme āhacca ṭhito sekkhapariyanto. Sekkhadhammānaṃ
analyzed: pavatta kusala dhamma ppabandhaḥ sekkha dhamme āhacca ṭhitaḥ sekkha pariyantaḥ sekkha dhammānam

original: vā heṭṭhimantabhūtā sikkhitabbā lokiyā tisso sikkhā sekkhapariyanto, tasmiṃ sekkhapariyante.

original: aparāmasanīyato pārisuddhivantaṃ sīlaṃ aparāmaṭṭhapārisuddhisīlaṃ. Kilesānaṃ sabbaso

original: paṭippassaddhiyā pārisuddhivantaṃ sīlaṃ paṭippassaddhipārisuddhisīlaṃ.
analyzed: paṭippassaddhiyā pārisuddhivantam sīlam paṭippassaddhi pārisuddhi sīlam

original: Anupasampannānaṃ asekkhānaṃ, sekkhānaṃ, kalyāṇaputhujjanānañca sīlaṃ mahānubhāvatāya
analyzed: an upasampannānam asekkhānam sekkhānam kalyāṇa puthujjanānam ca sīlam mahā anubhāva tāya

analyzed: ānubhāvataḥ a pariyantam eva iti āha gaṇana vasena sa pariyanta ttā iti kāya vācānam saṃvaraṇataḥ

original: vinayanato ca saṃvaravinayā. Peyyālamukhena niddiṭṭhāti tattha tattha satthārā desitavitthāranayena

analyzed: yathāvutta gaṇanataḥ niddiṭṭhā sikkhā ati sīla saṅkhātā sikkhā vinaya saṃvare ti vinaya piṭake

original: Gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi upasampannānaṃ sīlanti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

original: Yaṃ kiñci hi upasampannena sikkhitabbaṃ sīlaṃ nāma, tattha kassacipi anavasesato
analyzed: yam kiñci hi upasampannena sikkhitabbam sīlam nāma tattha kassaci pi anavasesato

original: anavasesavasena. Samādānabhāvanti samādānasabbhāvaṃ. Lābha…pe… vasena adiṭṭhapariyantabhāvo
analyzed: anavasesa vasena samādāna bhāvanti samādāna sabbhāvam lābha pe vasena a diṭṭha pariyanta bhāvo

original: lābhādihetu sīlassa avītikkamo.
analyzed: lābha ādi hetu sīlassa a vītikkamaḥ

original: Dhanaṃ caje aṅgavarassa hetu pāripanthikacorādīhi upadduto. Aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno
analyzed: dhanam caje aṅga varassa hetu pāripanthika cora ādīhi upaddutaḥ aṅgam caje jīvitam rakkhamāno

original: sutasomamahābodhisattādayo viya. Tenāha “imaṃ sappurisānussatiṃ avijahanto”ti. Jighacchāparissamena
analyzed: sutasoma mahābodhisatta ādayaḥ viya tena āha imam sappurisa anussatim a vijahantaḥ iti jighacchā parissamena

original: jīvitasaṃsaye satipi. Sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkammāti assāmikesu ambaphalesu bhūmiyaṃ patitesu
analyzed: jīvita saṃsaye sati pi sikkhāpadam a vītikkamma ati assāmikesu amba phalesu bhūmiyam patitesu

original: samīpeyeva santesupi paṭiggāhakābhāvena aparibhuñjanto paṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamitvā.
analyzed: samīpeya iva santesu pi paṭiggāhaka abhāvena a paribhuñjantaḥ paṭiggahaṇa sikkhāpadam a vītikkamitvā

original: Sīlavantassāti sīlavantabhāvassa kāraṇā, sīlavantassa vā tuyhaṃ etādisaṃ aṃsena vāhaṇādikaṃ
analyzed: sīlavantassa ati sīlavanta bhāvassa kāraṇā sīlavantassa vā tuyham etādisam aṃsena vāhaṇa ādikam

original: kiccaṃ karoti, kāraṇā sīlassāti adhippāyo. Sudhotajātimaṇi viyāti catūsu pāsāṇesu
analyzed: kiccam karoti kāraṇā sīlassa ati adhippāyaḥ sudhota jāti maṇi viyāti catūsu pāsāṇesu

original: sammadeva dhotajātimaṇi viya. Mahāsaṅgharakkhitabhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitattherānaṃ
analyzed: sammat eva dhota jāti maṇi viya mahā saṅgharakkhita bhāgineyya saṅgharakkhita ttherānam

original: viyāti mahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa, tasseva bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitattherassa viya
analyzed: viyā ati mahā saṅgharakkhita therassa tassa iva bhāgineyya saṅgharakkhita therassa viya

original: ca. “Kimatthaṃ mayaṃ idhāgatā”ti mahājanassa vippaṭisāro bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ca kimattham mayam idha āgatā ati mahājanassa vippaṭisāraḥ bhavissati iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Accharikāyāti aṅguliphoṭanena. Asatiyāti satisammosena. Aññāṇapakatanti aññāṇena
analyzed: accharikāya ati aṅguli phoṭanena asatiyā ati sati sammosena aññāṇa pakatanti aññāṇena

original: aparajjhitvā kataṃ, ajānitvā katanti attho.
analyzed: aparajjhitvā katam a jānitvā katanti attho

original: Appassutopi ce hotīti suttageyyādisutarahito hoti ce. Sīlesu asamāhitoti pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlesupi
analyzed: appassutaḥ pi ce hoti iti sutta geyya ādi suta rahitaḥ hoti ce sīlesu asamāhito ti pātimokkha saṃvara ādi sīlesu pi

original: na sammā patiṭṭhito hoti ce. Nāssa sampajjate sutanti assa sīlarahitassa puggalassa
analyzed: na sammā patiṭṭhitaḥ hoti ce na assa sampajjate sutanti assa sīla rahitassa puggalassa

original: sutaṃ attano, paresañca katthaci bhavasampattiāvahaṃ na hoti. “Dussīloyaṃ purisapuggalo”ti
analyzed: sutam attano paresam ca katthaci bhava sampatti āvaham na hoti dussīlaḥ yam purisa puggalo ti

original: hi sikkhākāmā na tassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanti. Bahussutopi ceti ettha ce-ti nipātamattaṃ.
analyzed: hi sikkhā kāmāḥ na tassa santikam upasaṅkamanti bahu sutaḥ api ca iti ettha ca iti nipāta mattam

original: Pasaṃsitoti pasaṃsito eva nāma.
analyzed: pasaṃsitā iti pasaṃsitaḥ eva nāma

original: Rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhagahaṇena taṇhāparāmāsābhāvamāha. Tathārūpanti rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: rāga vasena aparāmaṭṭha gahaṇena taṇhā parāmāsa abhāvam āha tathārūpam ti rāga vasena aparāmaṭṭham

original: Bhinditvāti hanitvā. Saññapessāmīti saññattiṃ karissāmi, appakaṃ velaṃ maṃ vissejjetunti
analyzed: bhinditvā ati hanitvā saññapessāmi iti saññattim karissāmi appakam velam mama vissejjetunti

original: adhippāyo. Aṭṭiyāmīti jigucchāmi. Harāyāmīti lajjāmi.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ aṭṭiyāmi iti jigucchāmi harāyāmi iti lajjāmi

original: Palipannoti sīdanto, sammakkhito vā. Sīleneva saddhiṃ marissāmīti sīlaṃ avināsento
analyzed: palipannaḥ ti sīdantaḥ sammakkhitaḥ vā sīlena iva saddhim marissāmi iti sīlam a vināsentaḥ

original: tena saheva marissāmi, na idāni kadācipi taṃ pariccajissāmi. Sati hi bhavādāne sīlena
analyzed: tena saha iva marissāmi na idāni kadācipi tam pariccajissāmi sati hi bhava ādāne sīlena

original: viyogo siyā, bhavameva nādiyissāmīti adhippāyo. Rogaṃ sammasantoti rogabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ
analyzed: viyogaḥ siyā bhavam eva na ādiyissāmi iti adhippāyaḥ rogam sammasantaḥ ti roga bhūtam vedanam

original: vedanāmukhena sesārūpadhamme, rūpadhamme ca pariggahetvā vipassanto.
analyzed: vedanā mukhena sesa arūpa dhamme rūpa dhamme ca pariggahetvā vipassanto

original: Ruppatoti vikāraṃ āpādiyamānasarīrassa. Parisussatīti samantato sussati. Yathā kiṃ?
analyzed: ruppataḥ ti vikāram āpādiyamāna sarīrassa parisussati iti samantataḥ sussati yathā kim

original: Pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ sūriyātapasantatte paṃsuni ṭhapitaṃ sirīsādipupphaṃ
analyzed: puppham yathā paṃsuni ātape katam sūriya ātapa santatte paṃsuni ṭhapitam sirīsa ādi puppham

original: viyāti attho. Ajaññanti amanuññaṃ jigucchanīyaṃ. Jaññasaṅkhātanti bālehi “jañña”nti
analyzed: viyā ti atthaḥ a jaññanti amanuññam jigucchanīyam jañña saṅkhātanti bālehi jaññanti

original: evaṃ kittitaṃ. Jaññarūpaṃ apassatoti yathābhūtaṃ appassato aviddasuno “jañña”nti
analyzed: evam kittitam jañña rūpam a passataḥ ti yathābhūtam a passataḥ a viddasunaḥ jaññanti

original: pasaṃsitaṃ. Dhiratthumanti dhi atthu imaṃ, dhi-saddayogena sabbattha upayogavacanaṃ,
analyzed: pasaṃsitam dhi ratthumanti dhi atthu imam dhi sadda yogena sabbattha upayoga vacanam

original: imassa pūtikāyassa dhikāro hotūti attho. Duggandhiyanti duggandhikaṃ duggandhavantaṃ.
analyzed: imassa pūti kāyassa dhikāraḥ hotu uti attho duggandhiyanti duggandhikam duggandhavantam

original: Yattha yathāvutte pūtikāye rāgahetu pamattā pamādaṃ āpannā. Pajāti sattā. Hāpenti
analyzed: yattha yathā vutte pūti kāye rāga hetu pamattā pamādam āpannā pajāti sattāḥ hāpenti

original: maggaṃ sugatūpapattiyāti sugatūpapattiyā maggaṃ, sīlampi hāpenti, pageva jhānādinti
analyzed: maggam sugata upapattiyā ati sugata upapattiyā maggam sīlam pi hāpenti pagā iva jhāna ādinti

original: adhippāyo. Kevalaṃ “arahanto”ti vattabbā sāvakakhīṇāsavā, itare pana paccekabuddhā
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ kevalam arahanto ti vattabbā sāvaka khīṇa āsavāḥ itare pana paccekabuddhā

original: sammāsambuddhāti saha visesanenāti āha “arahantādīna”nti. Sabbadarathappaṭippassaddhiyāti
analyzed: sammāsambuddhā iti saha visesanena ati āha arahanta ādīnam ti sabbadaratha ppaṭippassaddhiyā ti

original: sabbakilesadarathappaṭippassaddhiyā.
analyzed: sabba kilesa daratha paṭippassaddhiyā

original: Dutiyasīlapañcakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dutiya sīla pañcaka vaṇṇanā

original: Pāṇātipātādīnanti ādi-saddena adinnādānādīnaṃ aggamaggavajjhakilesapariyosānānaṃ
analyzed: pāṇa atipāta ādīnam ti ādi saddena adinnādāna ādīnam agga magga vajjha kilesa pariyosānānam

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Pahānādīti ādi-saddena veramaṇiādīnaṃ catunnaṃ. Kesuci potthakesu
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo pahāna ādi iti ādi saddena veramaṇi ādīnam catunnam kesuci potthakesu

original: “pahānavasenā”ti likhanti, sā pamādalekhā. Pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīlanti hirottappakaruṇālobhādipamukhena
analyzed: pahāna vasena ati likhanti sā pamāda lekhā pāṇātipātassa pahānam hira uttappa karuṇā lobha ādi pamukhena

original: yena kusalacittuppādena pāṇātipāto pahīyati, taṃ pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīlanaṭṭhena
analyzed: yena kusala cittuppādena pāṇātipāto pahīyati tam pāṇātipātassa pahānam sīlana ṭṭhena

original: sīlaṃ. Tathā pāṇātipātā virati veramaṇī sīlaṃ. Pāṇātipātassa paṭipakkhacetanā cetanā
analyzed: sīlam tathā pāṇātipātā virati veramaṇī sīlam pāṇātipātassa paṭipakkha cetanā cetanā

original: sīlaṃ. Pāṇātipātassa saṃvaraṇaṃ pavesadvārapidhānaṃ saṃvaro sīlaṃ. Pāṇātipātassa
analyzed: sīlam pāṇātipātassa saṃvaraṇam pavesa dvāra pidhānam saṃvaraḥ sīlam pāṇātipātassa

original: avītikkamanaṃ avītikkamo sīlaṃ. Adinnādānassātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Abhijjhādīnaṃ
analyzed: avītikkamanam avītikkamaḥ sīlam adinna ādānassa ati ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ abhijjhā ādīnam

original: pana anabhijjhādivasena pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Veramaṇī cetanā taṃsampayuttā saṃvarāvītikkamā tappamukhā dhammā.
analyzed: pana anabhijjhā ādi vasena pahānam veditabbam veramaṇī cetanā tad sampayuttā saṃvara avītikkamā tad pamukhāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Evaṃ dasakusalakammapathavasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
analyzed: evam dasa kusala kammapatha vasena pahāna sīla ādīni dassetvā idāni sa upāyānam aṭṭhannam

original: samāpattīnaṃ, aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ, ariyamaggānañca vasena tāni dassetuṃ
analyzed: samāpattīnam mahāvipassanānam ariya maggānam ca vasena tāni dassetuṃ

original: “nekkhammenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha nekkhammenāti alobhappadhānena kusalacittuppādena.
analyzed: nekkhammena ati ādi āraddham tattha nekkhammena ati alobha ppadhānena kusala cittuppādena

original: Kusalā hi dhammā kāmapaṭipakkhā idha “nekkhamma”nti adhippetā. Tenāha “kāmacchandassa
analyzed: kusalāḥ hi dhammāḥ kāma paṭipakkhāḥ idha nekkhamman ti adhippetā tena āha kāmacchandassa

original: pahānaṃ sīla”ntiādi. Tattha pahānasīlādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Visesameva
analyzed: pahānam sīlam tiādi tattha pahāna sīla ādīni heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbāni visesam eva

original: vakkhāma. Abyāpādenāti mettāya. Ālokasaññāyāti vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitaālokasañjānanena.
analyzed: vakkhāma a byāpādena ati mettāya āloka saññāya ati vibhūtam katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhita āloka sañjānanena

original: Avikkhepenāti samādhinā. Dhammavavatthānenāti kusalādidhammānaṃ yāthāvanicchayena.
analyzed: avikkhepena ati samādhinā dhamma vavatthānena ati kusala ādi dhammānam yāthāva nicchayena

original: Sapaccayanāmarūpavavatthānenātipi vadanti.
analyzed: vadanti

original: Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttāya paṭhamajjhānādhigamassa
analyzed: evam kāmacchanda ādi nīvaraṇa ppahānena abhijjham loke pahāya ati ādinā vuttāya paṭhama jhāna adhigamassa

original: upāyabhūtāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṃ
analyzed: upāya bhūtāya pubbabhāga paṭipadāya vasena pahāna sīla ādīni dassetvā idāni sa upāyānam

original: aṭṭhasamāpattiādīnaṃ vasena dassetuṃ “ñāṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nāmarūpapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭha samāpatti ādīnam vasena dassetum ñāṇena atiādi vuttam nāma rūpa pariggaha kaṅkhā vitaraṇānam

original: hi vibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāya ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti.
analyzed: hi vibandha bhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñāta pariññāya ṭhitassa anicca saññā ādayo sijjhanti

original: Tathā jhānasamāpattīsu abhiratinimittena pāmojjena. Tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya
analyzed: tathā jhāna samāpattīsu abhirati nimittena pāmojjena tattha an abhiratiyā vinoditāya

original: jhānādīnaṃ samadhigamoti samāpattivipassanānaṃ arativinodanaavijjāpadālanādinā upāyoti
analyzed: jhāna ādīnam samadhigamaḥ ti samāpatti vipassanānam arati vinodana avijjā padālana ādinā upāyaḥ ti

original: vuttaṃ “ñāṇena avijjāya, pāmojjena aratiyā”ti. Uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya
analyzed: vuttam ñāṇena avijjāya pāmojjena aratiyā ti uppaṭi pāṭi niddesaḥ pana nīvaraṇa sabhāvāya

original: avijjāya heṭṭhānīvaraṇesupi saṅgahadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: avijjāya heṭṭhā nīvaraṇesu pi saṅgaha dassana ttham ti daṭṭhabbam

original: “Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇāna”ntiādīsu kathaṃ jhānānaṃ sīlabhāvo, kathaṃ vā tattha
analyzed: paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇa ananti ādīsu katham jhānānam sīla bhāvo katham vā tattha

original: viratiyā sambhavo. Suvisuddhakāyakammādikassa hi cittasamādānavasena imāni jhānāni
analyzed: viratiyā sambhavaḥ su visuddha kāya kamma ādikassa hi citta samādāna vasena imāni jhānāni

original: pavattanti, na parittakusalāni viya kāyakammādivisodhanavasena, nāpi maggaphaladhammā
analyzed: pavattanti na paritta kusalāni viya kāya kamma ādi visodhana vasena na api magga phala dhammā

original: viya duccaritadurājīvasamucchedapaṭippassambhanavasenāti? Saccametaṃ. Mahaggatadhammesu
analyzed: viya duccarita durājīva samuccheda paṭippassambhana vasena ati saccam etam mahaggata dhammesu

original: nippariyāyena natthi sīlanaṭṭho, kuto viramaṇaṭṭho. Pariyāyena panetaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: nippariyāyena na atthi sīlana ṭṭho kutas viramaṇa ṭṭho pariyāyena pana etam vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Ko pana so pariyāyo? Yadaggena mahaggatā kusaladhammā paṭipakkhe pajahanti, tadaggena
analyzed: kaḥ pana saḥ pariyāyaḥ yad aggena mahaggatāḥ kusala dhammāḥ paṭipakkhe pajahanti tad aggena

original: tato oratā. Te ca yathā cittaṃ nārohanti, evaṃ saṃvutā nāma honti. Pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhāto
analyzed: tatas oratā te ca yathā cittam na ārohanti evam saṃvutāḥ nāma honti pariyuṭṭhāna saṅkhātaḥ

original: manodvāre vītikkamo natthi etesūti avītikkamāti ca vuccanti, cetanā pana taṃsampayuttāti.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre vītikkamaḥ natthi etesu iti avītikkamā ati ca vuccanti cetanā pana tad sampayuttā ti

original: Soyamattho parato āgamissati. Evañca katvā vitakkādipahānavacanampi samatthitaṃ hoti.
analyzed: saḥ yam atthaḥ paratas āgamissati evam ca katvā vitakka ādi pahāna vacanam pi samatthitam hoti

original: Na hi nippariyāyato sīlaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ pahāyakaṃ yujjati, na cettha akusalavitakkādayo
analyzed: na hi nippariyāyataḥ sīlam kusala dhammānam pahāyakam yujjati na ca ittha akusala vitakka ādayaḥ

original: adhippetā. Kiñcāpi paṭhamajjhānūpacāreyeva dukkhassa, catutthajjhānūpacāre ca sukhassa
analyzed: adhippetā kiñcā api paṭhama jhānu upacāreyeva dukkhassa catuttha jhānu upacāre ca sukhassa

original: pahānaṃ hoti, atisayapahānaṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ “catutthena jhānena sukhadukkhānaṃ
analyzed: pahānam hoti atisaya pahānam pana sandhāya vuttam catutthena jhānena sukha dukkhānam

original: pahāna”nti. “Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ āruppakathāyaṃ āgamissati.
analyzed: pahānam ti ākāsa anañcāyatana samāpattiyā ati ādīsu yat vattabbam tat āruppa kathāyam āgamissati

original: Aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā. Tebhūmikadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
analyzed: aniccassa aniccanti vā anupassanā anicca anupassanā tebhūmika dhammānam anicca taṃ

original: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññāyāti “saṅkhatadhammā niccā sassatā”ti
analyzed: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya itam nāmam nicca saññāya ati saṅkhata dhammā niccā sassatā ati

original: evaṃ pavattāya micchāsaññāya, saññāggahaṇeneva diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam pavattāya micchāsaññāya saññā ggahaṇena iva diṭṭhi cittānam pi gahaṇam daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Esa nayo ito parāsupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya
analyzed: esa nayaḥ itas parāsu pi nibbida anupassanāya ati saṅkhāresu nibbindana ākārena pavattāya

original: anupassanāya. Nandiyāti sappītikataṇhāya. Virāgānupassanāyāti virajjanākārena pavattāya
analyzed: anupassanāya nandiyā ati sappītika taṇhāya virāga anupassanāya ati virajjana ākārena pavattāya

original: anupassanāya. Rāgassāti saṅkhāresu rāgassa. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa
analyzed: anupassanāya rāgassa ati saṅkhāresu rāgassa nirodha anupassanāya ati saṅkhārānam nirodhassa

original: anupassanāya. Yathā vā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti,
analyzed: anupassanāya yathā vā saṅkhārāḥ nirujjhantiyā iva āyatim punabbhava vasena na uppajjanti

original: evaṃ anupassanā nirodhānupassanā. Tenevāha “nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti no samudetī”ti.
analyzed: evam anupassanā nirodha anupassanā tena iva āha nirodha anupassanāya nirodheti no samudeti iti

original: Muñcitukāmatāya hi ayaṃ balappattā. Saṅkhārānaṃ paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā
analyzed: muñcitu kāma tāya hi ayam bala ppattā saṅkhārānam paṭinissajjana ākārena pavattā anupassanā

original: paṭinissaggānupassanā. Paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā hi ayaṃ. Ādānassāti niccādivasena gahaṇassa.
analyzed: paṭinissagga anupassanā paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā hi ayam ādānassa ati nicca ādi vasena gahaṇassa

original: Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇavasena ekattagahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā, tassā ghanasaññāya. Āyūhanassāti
analyzed: santati samūha kicca ārammaṇa vasena ekatta gahaṇam ghana saññā tassā ghana saññāya āyūhanassa ati

original: abhisaṅkharaṇassa. Saṅkhārānaṃ avatthādivisesāpatti vipariṇāmo. Dhuvasaññāyāti thirabhāvagahaṇassa.
analyzed: abhisaṅkharaṇassa saṅkhārānaṃ avattha ādi visesa āpatti vipariṇāmaḥ dhuva saññāya ati thira bhāva gahaṇassa

original: Sañjagghatīti kilesavasena mahāhasitaṃ hasati. Saṃkīḷatīti kāyasaṃsaggavasena kīḷati.

original: Saṃkelāyatīti sabbaso mātugāmaṃ kelāyanto viharati. Cakkhunāti attano cakkhunā. Cakkhunti
analyzed: saṃkelāyati iti sabbasas mātugāmam kelāyantaḥ viharati cakkhunā ati attanaḥ cakkhunā cakkhunti

original: mātugāmassa cakkhuṃ. Upanijjhāyatīti upecca nijjhāyati oloketi. Tirokuṭṭāti kuṭṭassa
analyzed: mātugāmassa cakkhum upanijjhāyati iti upecca nijjhāyati oloketi kuṭṭassa

original: parato. Tathā tiropākārā. Mattikāmayā bhitti kuṭṭaṃ, iṭṭhakāmayā pākāroti vadanti.

original: Yā kāci vā bhitti porisato diyaḍḍharatanuccappamāṇā kuṭṭaṃ, kuṭṭato adhiko pākāro.

original: Assāti brahmacārīpaṭiññassa. Pubbeti vatasamādānato pubbe. Kāmaguṇehīti kāmakoṭṭhāsehi.
analyzed: assa ati brahmacārī paṭiññassa pubbe iti vata samādānataḥ pubbe kāma guṇehi iti kāma koṭṭhāsehi

original: Samappitanti suṭṭhu appitaṃ sahitaṃ. Samaṅgībhūtanti samannāgataṃ. Paricārayamānanti

original: kīḷantaṃ, upaṭṭhahiyamānaṃ vā. Paṇidhāyāti patthetvā. Sīlenātiādīsu yamaniyamādisamādānavasena

original: sīlaṃ. Avītikkamavasena vataṃ. Ubhayampi sīlaṃ. Dukkaracariyavasena pavattitaṃ vataṃ.

original: vataṃ. Sabbathāpi dukkaracariyā tapo. Methunavirati brahmacariyaṃ.

original: Sabbasoti anavasesato, sabbesaṃ vā. Abhedenāti avītikkamena. Aparāya ca pāpadhammānaṃ

original: Idāni “akhaṇḍādibhāvo panā”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yāni hī”tiādimāha.

original: gahaṇabhāvena, pavattibāhullatoti attho. Asukhāsevanāti kasirabhāvanā.

original: upacārādhigamato pubbe asappāyasevitāya dukkhā paṭipadā. Pacchā asappāyasevitāya
analyzed: upacāra adhigamataḥ pubbe a sappāya sevitāya dukkhā paṭipadā pacchā a sappāya sevitāya

original: orabhāge. Aparabhāgeti tato uddhaṃ. Tassa vomissakatāti yo pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā
analyzed: ora bhāge apara bhāge iti tatas uddham tassa yaḥ pubba bhāge asappāyam sevitvā

analyzed: dandha abhiññā hoti evam paṭhama catutthānam vomissaka tāya dutiya tatiyā ti atthaḥ a kata palibodha upacchedassa

original: ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti, visadatāya khippā abhiññā.

original: Tattha kilesā kāmacchandādayo, indriyāni saddhādīni.

analyzed: dassetum yaḥ puggalaḥ tiādi vuttam appaguṇo ti na su bhāvitaḥ vasībhāvam tena āha

original: attanomatiko, attano matiṃ paggayha vattā na hotīti attho.
analyzed: attanomatikaḥ attanaḥ matim paggayha vattā na hoti iti attho

analyzed: rūpa gatam viya cittam ca līnam hoti dassane manda byāpāra tāya tena āha

original: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Saddhāya pana balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otari. Taṃ
analyzed: vipassanam paṭṭhapesi saddhāya pana balava bhāvataḥ vipassanā vīthim na otari tam

original: ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamataṃ paṭipādento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā
analyzed: ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamatam paṭipādento kammaṭṭhānam sodhetvā adāsi so satthārā

original: dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ
analyzed: dinna nayena vipassanam ussukkāpetvā magga paṭipāṭiyā arahattam pāpuṇi tena vuttam

original: “vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassana”nti.
analyzed: ca ittha

original: Itarakiccabhedanti upaṭṭhānādikiccavisesaṃ. Passaddhādīti ādi-saddena samādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgānaṃ

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ hāpetabbanti yathā saddhi indriyassa balava bhāvaḥ dhamma sabhāva paccavekkhaṇena

original: hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati, samādhipakkhiyattā
analyzed: hāyati evam vīriya indriyassa adhimatta tā passaddhi ādi bhāvanāya hāyati samādhi pakkhiya tā

original: tassā. Tathā hi sā samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā
analyzed: tassā tathā hi sā samādhi indriyassa adhimatta tam kosajja pātataḥ rakkhantī vīriya ādi bhāvanā

original: viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato hāpeti. Tena
analyzed: viya vīriya indriyassa adhimatta tam uddhacca pātataḥ rakkhantī ekaṃsataḥ hāpeti tena

original: vuttaṃ “passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabba”nti.
analyzed: vuttam passaddha ādi bhāvanāya hāpetabbanti

original: Soṇattherassa vatthūti sukumārassa soṇattherassa vatthu. So hi āyasmā satthu santike
analyzed: soṇa ttherassa vatthu iti sukumārassa soṇa ttherassa vatthu so hi āyasmā satthu santike

analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam gahetvā sītavane viharantaḥ mama sarīram sukhumālam na ca sakkā sukhena iva

analyzed: sukham adhigantum kāyam kilametvā api samaṇa dhammo kātabbo ti ṭhāna caṅkamam eva adhiṭṭhāya

original: padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ

original: gantvā vīṇovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā
analyzed: gantvā vīṇā vādena ovaditvā vīriya sama tā yojana vidhim dassento kammaṭṭhānam sodhetvā

original: gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
analyzed: gijjhakūṭam gataḥ theraḥ api satthārā dinna nayena vīriya samatam yojentaḥ vipassanam

original: arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabba”nti.
analyzed: arahatte patiṭṭhāsi tena vuttam soṇa therassa vatthu dassetabbanti

original: Sesesupīti satisamādhipaññindriyesupi. Ekassāti ekekassa. Sāmaññaniddesovāyaṃ daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sesesu pi iti sati samādhi paññindriyesu pi ekassa ati ekekassa sāmañña niddesaḥ uva ayam daṭṭhabbo

original: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ paccekaṃ adhimattatāya pana hāpanavasena samataṃ dassetvā

original: idāni tattha yesaṃ visesato asādhāraṇato, sādhāraṇato ca samatā icchitabbā, taṃ dassetuṃ

original: “visesato panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etthāti etesu pañcasu indriyesu. Samatanti saddhāpaññānaṃ

original: aññamaññaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvaṃ. Tathā samādhivīriyānaṃ. Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ

original: visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānativattanaṃ visesato icchitabbameva,
analyzed: visum dhuriya dhamma bhūtānam kiccataḥ aññamañña anativattanam visesataḥ icchitabbam eva

original: yato nesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjatīti, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjauddhaccapakkhikānaṃ
analyzed: yatas na esam samadhura tāya appanā sampajjati iti evam samādhi vīriyānam kosajja auddhacca pakkhikānam

original: samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ antadvayapātābhāvena
