original: sammadeva appanā ijjhati.
analyzed: sammadeva appanāḥ ijjhati

original: “Balavasaddho hī”tiādi nidassanavasena vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yo balavatiyā saddhāya
analyzed: hi itiādi nidassana vasena vuttam tassa atthaḥ yaḥ balavatiyā saddhāya

original: samannāgato avisadañāṇo, so muddhappasanno hoti, na aveccappasanno. Tathā hi so avatthusmiṃ
analyzed: samannāgataḥ a visada ñāṇo so muddha ppasannaḥ hoti na avecca ppasanno tathā hi so avatthusmim

original: pasīdati seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā. Kerāṭikapakkhanti sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ bhajati. Saddhāhīnāya
analyzed: pasīdati sā iyyathā api titthiya sāvakā kerāṭika pakkhanti sāṭheyya pakkham bhajati saddhā hīnāya

original: paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ
analyzed: paññāya atidhāvantaḥ deyya vatthu pariccāgena vinā cittuppāda mattena api dāna mayam puññam

original: hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetupaṭirūpakehi vañcito. Evaṃbhūto pana sukkhatakkaviluttacitto
analyzed: hoti itiādīni parikappeti hetu paṭirūpakehi vañcitaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ pana sukkha takka vilutta citto

original: paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati, saññattiṃ na gacchati. Tenāha “bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya
analyzed: paṇḍitānam vacanam na ādiyati saññattim na gacchati tena āha bhesajja samuṭṭhitaḥ viya

original: rogo atekiccho hotī”ti. Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaviraho na atthāvaho
analyzed: rogaḥ atekicchaḥ hoti iti yathā ca ittha saddhā paññānam aññamañña virahaḥ na attha āvahaḥ

original: anatthāvaho ca, evamidhāpi samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaviraho na avikkhepāvaho vikkhepāvaho
analyzed: anattha āvahaḥ ca evam idha api samādhi vīriyānam aññamañña virahaḥ na avikkhepa āvahaḥ vikkhepa āvahaḥ

original: cāti veditabbaṃ. Kosajjaṃ abhibhavati, tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Uddhaccaṃ
analyzed: ca ati veditabbam kosajjam abhibhavati tena appanam na pāpuṇāti iti adhippāyaḥ uddhaccam

original: abhibhavatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tadubhayanti taṃ saddhāpaññādvayaṃ, samādhivīriyadvayañca.
analyzed: abhibhavati iti ettha api tat ubhayam ti tam saddhā paññā dvayam samādhi vīriya dvayam ca

original: Samaṃ kātabbanti samarasaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: samam kātabbanti sama rasam kātabbam

original: Samādhikammikassāti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. Evanti evaṃ sante, saddhāya tesaṃ balavabhāve
analyzed: samādhi kammikassa ati samatha kammaṭṭhānikassa evam ti evam sante saddhāya tesam balava bhāve

original: satīti attho. Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavī”ti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattīti
analyzed: satī iti attho saddahanto ti pathavī pathavī iti manasikaraṇa mattena katham jhāna uppatti iti

original: acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento.
analyzed: a cintetvā addhā sammāsambuddhena vutta vidhi ijjhissati iti saddahantaḥ saddham janentaḥ

original: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena okappento pakkhandanto.
analyzed: okappentaḥ ti ārammaṇam an upavisitvā viya adhimuccana vasena okappentaḥ pakkhandantaḥ

original: Ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati samādhipadhānattā jhānassa. Ubhinnanti samādhipaññānaṃ,
analyzed: ekagga tā balavatī vaṭṭati samādhi padhāna ttā jhānassa samādhi paññānam

original: samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti, samabhāvenāpīti
analyzed: samādhi kammikassa samādhinaḥ adhimatta tā api icchitabbā ati āha samatāya api iti sama bhāvena api iti

original: attho. Appanāti idhādhippetaappanā. Tathā hi “hotiyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati, lokuttarappanā
analyzed: atthaḥ appanā ti idha adhippeta appanā tathā hi hotiyā iva ati sa āsaṅkam vadati lokuttara ppanā

original: pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha – “samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
analyzed: pana tesam sama bhāvena iva icchitā yathā āha samatha vipassanam yuga naddham bhāveti iti

original: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ, samādhivīriyānañca samatā icchitā, kathaṃ satīti āha
analyzed: yadi visesato saddhā paññānam samādhi vīriyānam ca sama tā icchitā katham satī iti āha

original: “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti. Sabbatthāti līnuddhaccapakkhesu pañcasu
analyzed: sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭati iti sabbattha ati līn uddhacca pakkhesu pañcasu

original: indriyesu. Uddhaccapakkhiye gaṇhanto “saddhāvīriyapaññāna”nti āha. Aññathāpīti ca
analyzed: indriyesu uddhacca pakkhiye gaṇhanto saddhā vīriya paññānan ti āha aññathā api iti ca

original: gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi “kosajjapakkhena samādhinā” icceva vuttaṃ, na “passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī”ti.
analyzed: gahetabbā siyā tathā hi kosajja pakkhena samādhinā icca eva vuttam na passaddhi samādhi upekkhāhi iti

original: Sā sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto sabbakammiko. Tena kāraṇena sabbattha icchitabbatthena.
analyzed: sā sati sabbesu rāja kammesu niyuttaḥ sabba kammikaḥ tena kāraṇena sabbattha icchitabbatthena

original: Āha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā sabbatthikā, sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena
analyzed: āha aṭṭhakathā ayam sabbattha niyuttā sabbatthikā sabbena vā līn uddhacca pakkhiyena

original: bojjhaṅgaggahaṇena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā, sabbatthiyāva sabbatthikā. Cittanti kusalacittaṃ.
analyzed: bojjhaṅga ggahaṇena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā sabbatthiyā ava sabbatthikā cittam ti kusala cittam

original: Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇam parāyaṇam appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya

original: Tenāha “ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā”tiādi.
analyzed: tena āha ārakkha paccupaṭṭhāna atiādi

original: 63. Cittekaggatānimittassāti cittekaggatāya nimittassa, cittekaggatāsaṅkhātassa ca
analyzed: citta ekagga tā nimittassa ati citta ekagga tāya nimittassa citta ekagga tā saṅkhātassa ca

original: nimittassa. Cittassa hi samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā samathanimittaṃ rakkhantoyeva
analyzed: nimittassa cittassa hi samāhita ākāram sat lakkhetvā samatha nimittam rakkhantaḥ yeva

original: kasiṇanimittaṃ rakkhati. Tasmā pathavīkasiṇādikassāti ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ paṭibhāganimittasseva,
analyzed: kasiṇa nimittam rakkhati tasmā pathavī kasiṇa ādikassa āti ādi saddena na kevalam paṭibhāga nimittassa iva

original: atha kho samathanimittassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tanti rakkhaṇakosallaṃ. Idha appanākosallakathāyaṃ

original: 64. Atisithilavīriyatādīhīti ādi-saddena pamodanasaṃvejanavipariyāye saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: ati sithila vīriya tā ādīhi iti ādi saddena pamodana saṃvejana vipariyāye saṅgaṇhāti

original: Līnanti saṅkucitaṃ kosajjapakkhapatitaṃ. Cittanti bhāvanācittaṃ. Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo

analyzed: bhāveti iti ettha tayā iti padam ānetvā sambandhitabbam yathā pana te bhāvetabbā

original: taṃ sayameva vakkhati.
analyzed: tam sayam eva vakkhati

original: Parittanti appakaṃ. Ujjāletukāmoti padīpetukāmo. Udakavātaṃ dadeyyāti udakamissaṃ
analyzed: parittam ti appakam ujjāletu kāmaḥ iti padīpetu kāmaḥ udaka vātam dadeyyāti udaka missam

original: vātaṃ upaneyya. Akāloti nakālo, ayuttakālo vā. Satiādidhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā
analyzed: vātam upaneyya akālo ti na kālaḥ ayutta kālaḥ vā sati ādi dhamma sāmaggi saṅkhātāya bodhiyā

original: bujjhati etāyāti katvā, taṃsamaṅgino vā bujjhatīti bodhino yogino aṅganti bojjhaṅgo,
analyzed: bujjhati katvā taṃsamaṅginaḥ vā bujjhati iti bodhinaḥ yoginaḥ aṅganti bojjhaṅgaḥ

original: pasattho, sundaro vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo. Kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā passaddhiyeva
analyzed: pasattho sundaraḥ vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo kāya citta daratha vūpasama lakkhaṇā passaddhiyā iva

original: sambojjhaṅgo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, tassa passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa. Samādhisambojjhaṅgādīsupi
analyzed: sambojjhaṅgo passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo tassa passaddhi sambojjhaṅgassa samādhi sambojjhaṅga ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – samādhissa tāva padatthalakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā āgatāneva.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ samādhissa tāva padattha lakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā āgatāna eva

original: Upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā. Sā panāyaṃ atthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva idha bojjhaṅgupekkhā
analyzed: upapattito ikkhati iti upekkhā sā pana ayam atthato idha bojjhaṅgu pekkhā

original: veditabbā. Dusamuṭṭhāpayanti samuṭṭhāpetuṃ uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ. Dhammānaṃ, dhammesu
analyzed: veditabbā du samuṭṭhāpayanti samuṭṭhāpetum uppādetum a sakkuṇeyyam dhammānam dhammesu

original: vā vicayo dhammavicayo, paññāti attho. Vīrassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā, vidhinā vā īretabbaṃ
analyzed: vā vicayaḥ dhamma vicayo paññā ati atthaḥ vīrassa bhāvaḥ kammam vā vidhinā vā īretabbam

original: pavattetabbanti vīriyaṃ, ussāho. Pīṇeti kāyaṃ, cittaṃ ca santappetīti pīti.
analyzed: pavattetabbanti vīriyam ussāhaḥ pīṇeti kāyam cittam ca santappeti iti pīti

original: Yaṃ yaṃ sakaṃ yathāsakaṃ, attano attanoti attho. Āhāravasenāti paccayavasena. Bhāvanāti
analyzed: yam yam sakam yathāsakam attanaḥ attanaḥ iti atthaḥ āhāra vasena ati paccaya vasena bhāvanā ati

original: uppādanā, vaḍḍhanā ca. Kusalākusalāti kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalā, tappaṭipakkhato
analyzed: uppādanā vaḍḍhanā ca kusala akusalā ati kosalla sambhūta ṭṭhena kusalā tad paṭipakkhato

original: akusalā. Ye akusalā, te sāvajjā. Ye kusalā, te anavajjā. Akusalā hīnā, itare paṇītā.
analyzed: akusalāḥ ye akusalā te sāvajjāḥ ye kusalā te anavajjāḥ akusalāḥ hīnāḥ itare paṇītā

original: Kusalāpi vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā hīnā, itare paṇītā. Kaṇhāti kāḷakā cittassa
analyzed: vā hīnehi chanda ādīhi āraddhāḥ hīnāḥ itare paṇītā cittassa

original: apabhassarabhāvakaraṇā, sukkāti odātā cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto
analyzed: a pabhassara bhāva karaṇā cittassa pabhassara bhāva karaṇā kaṇha abhijāti hetuto

original: vā kaṇhā, sukkābhijātihetuto sukkā. Te eva sappaṭibhāgā. Kaṇhā hi ujuvipaccanīkatāya
analyzed: vā kaṇhā sukka abhijāti hetuto sukkā te eva sa paṭibhāgā kaṇhā hi uju vipaccanīka tāya

original: sukkehi sappaṭibhāgā. Tathā sukkāpi itarehi. Atha vā kaṇhā ca sukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā
analyzed: sukkehi sappaṭibhāgā tathā sukkā api itarehi atha vā kaṇhā ca sukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā

original: ca kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā. Sukhā hi vedanā dukkhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgā, dukkhā
analyzed: ca kaṇha sukka sappaṭibhāgā sukhā hi vedanā dukkhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgā dukkhā

original: ca vedanā sukhāya sappaṭibhāgāti. Anuppannassāti anibbattassa. Uppādāyāti uppādanatthāya.
analyzed: ca vedanā sukhāya sappaṭibhāgā ati anuppannassa ati anibbattassa uppādāya ati uppādana tthāya

original: Uppannassāti nibbattassa. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti punappunabhāvāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya.

original: evaṃ bhāvanā amohappadhānā visesato appanāvahā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
analyzed: evam bhāvanā amoha padhānā visesataḥ appanā āvahā tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti

original: tadā bhāvanācittassa anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa abhiruciṃ na janeti, tena
analyzed: tadā bhāvanā cittassa an abhisaṅkhataḥ viya āhāraḥ purisassa abhirucim na janeti tena

original: taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Yadā ca bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā,
analyzed: tam nirassādam hoti yadā ca bhāvanā pubbena aparam visesa āvahā na hoti sammad eva a vīthi paṭipattiyā

original: tadā upasamasukhassa alābhena cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha “paññāpayogamandatāyā”tiādi.
analyzed: tadā upasama sukhassa alābhena cittam nirassādam hoti tat ubhayam sandhāya āha paññā apayoga manda tāya atiādi

original: Nanti cittaṃ. Jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ, duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva
analyzed: cittam jāti jarā byādhi maraṇāni yathāraham sugatiyam duggatiyam ca honti iti tad aññam eva

original: pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādiaññamaññavibādhanādihetukaṃ apāyadukkhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: pañcavidha bandhana ādi khuppipāsā ādi aññamañña vibādhana ādi hetukam apāya dukkham daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte, anāgate
analyzed: tayā idam sabbam tesam tesam sattānam paccuppanna bhava nissitam gahitam ti atīte anāgate

original: ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni. Ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca
analyzed: ca kāle vaṭṭa mūlaka dukkhāni visum gahitāni ye pana sattāḥ āhāra upajīvino tattha ca

original: uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvitadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu
analyzed: uṭṭhāna phala upajīvino tesam aññehi asādhāraṇam jīvita dukkham aṭṭhamam saṃvega vatthu

original: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Assāti cittassa. Alīnantiādīsu kosajjapakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya alīnaṃ.
analyzed: assa ti cittassa alīna nti ādīsu kosajja pakkhiyānam dhammānam anadhimatta tāya alīnam

original: Uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya anuddhataṃ. Paññāpayogasampattiyā,
analyzed: uddhacca pakkhikānam dhammānam anadhimatta tāya anuddhatam paññā apayoga sampattiyā

original: upasamasukhādhigamena ca anirassādaṃ. Pubbenāparaṃ savisesaṃ tato eva ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ,
analyzed: upasama sukha adhigamena ca a nirassādam pubbena aparam sa visesam tatas eva ārammaṇe sama ppavattam

original: samathavīthipaṭipannañca. Tattha alīnatāya paggahe, anuddhatatāya niggahe, anirassādatāya
analyzed: samatha vīthi paṭipannam ca tattha a līna tāya paggahe an uddhata tāya niggahe a nirassāda tāya

original: sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ āpajjati. Alīnānuddhatatāya hi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ anirassādatāya
analyzed: sampahaṃsane na byāpāram āpajjati alīna anuddhata tāya hi ārammaṇe sama ppavattam a nirassāda tāya

original: samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ. Samappavattiyā vā alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā
analyzed: samatha vīthi paṭipannam sama pavattiyā vā alīnam anuddhatam samatha vīthi paṭipattiyā

original: anirassādanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: a nirassādanti daṭṭhabbam

original: Nekkhammapaṭipadanti jhānapaṭipattiṃ. Samādhiadhimuttatāti samādhinibbattane jhānādhigame
analyzed: nekkhamma paṭipadanti jhāna paṭipattim samādhi adhimutta tā ati samādhi nibbattane jhāna adhigame

original: yuttappayuttatā. Sā pana yasmā samādhiṃ garuṃ katvā tattha ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena
analyzed: sā pana yasmā samādhim garum katvā tattha ninna poṇa pabbhāra bhāvena

original: pavattiyā hoti, tasmā “samādhigarū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pavattiyā hoti tasmā samādhi garu utiādi vuttam

original: 67. Paṭiladdhe nimittasmiṃ evaṃ hi sampādayato appanākosallaṃ imaṃ appanā sampavattatīti
analyzed: paṭiladdhe nimittasmin evam hi sampādayataḥ appanā kosallam imam appanā sampavattati iti

original: sambandho. Sāti appanā. Hitvā hīti hi-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā ṭhānametaṃ na vijjati,
analyzed: sambandhaḥ sā ati appanā hitvā hi iti hi saddaḥ hetu atthaḥ yasmā ṭhānam etam na vijjati

original: tasmā cittappavattiākāraṃ bhāvanācittassa līnuddhatādivasena pavattiākāraṃ sallakkhayaṃ
analyzed: tasmā citta ppavatti ākāram bhāvanā cittassa līn uddhata ādi vasena pavatti ākāram sat lakkhayam

original: upadhārento. Samataṃ vīriyasseva vīriyassa samādhinā samarasataṃyeva yojayetha. Kathaṃ
analyzed: upadhārentaḥ samatam vīriyassa iva vīriyassa samādhinā yojayetha katham

original: pana yojayethāti āha “īsakampī”tiādi. Tattha layanti līnabhāvaṃ, saṅkocanti attho.
analyzed: pana yojayetha iti āha īsakampi itiādi tattha layanti līna bhāvam saṅkocanti attho

original: Yantanti gacchantaṃ, paggaṇhetheva samabhāvāyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “accāraddhaṃ nisedhetvā
analyzed: yantanti gacchantam paggaṇhetha iva sama bhāvāya ati adhippāyaḥ tena āha acca āraddham nisedhetvā

original: samameva pavattaye”ti. Kathaṃ pana samameva pavattayeti āha “reṇumhī”tiādi. Yathāti
analyzed: samam eva pavattayā iti katham pana samam eva pavattayā iti āha yathā iti

original: reṇuādīsu yathā madhukarādīnaṃ pavatti upamābhāvena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sammavaṇṇitā, evaṃ
analyzed: reṇu ādīsu yathā madhukara ādīnam upamā bhāvena aṭṭhakathā ayam samma vaṇṇitā evam

original: līnuddhatabhāvehi mocayitvā vīriyasamatāyojanena nimittābhimukhaṃ mānasaṃ paṭipādaye
analyzed: mocayitvā vīriya samatā yojanena nimitta abhimukham mānasam paṭipādaye

original: paṭibhāganimittābhimukhaṃ bhāvanācittaṃ sampādeyyāti attho.
analyzed: paṭibhāga nimitta abhimukham bhāvanā cittam sampādeyya attho

original: Nimittābhimukhapaṭipādanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: nimitta abhimukha paṭipādana vaṇṇanā

original: 68. Tatrāti tasmiṃ “reṇumhī”tiādinā vuttagāthādvaye. Atthadīpanā upamūpameyyatthavibhāvanā.
analyzed: tatra ati tasmin reṇumhi iti ādinā vutta gāthā dvaye attha dīpanā

original: Achekoti akusalo. Pakkhandoti dhāvituṃ āraddho. Vikasanakkhaṇeyeva sarasaṃ kusumaparāgaṃ
analyzed: achekaḥ iti akusalaḥ pakkhandaḥ ti dhāvitum āraddhaḥ vikasana khaṇeya iva sarasam kusuma parāgam

original: hoti, pacchā vātādīhi paripatati, virasaṃ vā hoti. Tasmā nivattane reṇu khīyatīti
analyzed: hoti pacchā vāta ādīhi paripatati virasam vā hoti tasmā nivattane reṇu khīyati iti

original: āha “khīṇe reṇumhi sampāpuṇātī”ti. Puppharāsinti rukkhasākhāsu nissitaṃ pupphasañcayaṃ.
analyzed: āha khīṇe reṇumhi sampāpuṇāti iti puppha rāsim ti rukkha sākhāsu nissitam puppha sañcayam

original: Sallakattaantevāsikesūti sallakattaācariyassa antevāsikesu. Udakathālagateti udakathāliyaṃ
analyzed: sallakatta antevāsikesu iti sallakatta ācariyassa antevāsikesu udakathāla gatā iti udakathāliyam

original: ṭhapite. Satthakammanti sirāvedhanādisatthakammaṃ. Phusitumpi uppalapattanti sambandho.
analyzed: ṭhapite satthakammanti sirāvedhana ādi satthakammam phusitum pi uppala pattanti sambandho

original: Samenāti purimakā viya garuṃ, mandañca payogaṃ akatvā samappamāṇena payogena. Tatthāti
analyzed: samena ati purimakāḥ viya garum mandam ca payogam a katvā samappamāṇena payogena tattha ati

original: uppalapatte. Pariyodātasippoti suvisuddhasippo nipphannasippo.
analyzed: uppala patte pariyodāta sippo ti su visuddha sippo nipphanna sippo

original: Makkaṭakasuttanti lūtasuttaṃ. Niyāmako nāvāsārathī. Laṅkāranti kilañjādimayaṃ nāvākaṭasārakaṃ.
analyzed: makkaṭaka suttanti lūta suttam niyāmakaḥ nāvā sārathī laṅkāranti kilañja ādi mayam nāvā kaṭasārakam

original: Telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūretīti sarāvādigatena telena achaḍḍento sukhumacchiddakaṃ
analyzed: telena a chaḍḍentaḥ nāḷim pūreti iti sarāva ādi gatena telena a chaḍḍentaḥ sukhuma chiddakam

original: telanāḷiṃ pūreti. Evamevāti yathā te ādito vuttamadhukarasallakattaantevāsisuttākaḍḍhakaniyāmakatelapūrakā
analyzed: tela nāḷim pūra iti evam eva ati yathā te āditas vutta madhukara sallakatta antevāsi suttā kaḍḍhaka niyāmaka telapūrakā

original: vegena payogaṃ karonti, evameva yo bhikkhu “sīghaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti gāḷhaṃ
analyzed: vegena payogam karonti evam eva yaḥ bhikkhu sīgham appanam pāpuṇissāmi iti gāḷham

original: vīriyaṃ karoti, yo majjhe vuttamadhukarādayo viya vīriyaṃ na karoti, ime dvepi vīriyasamatābhāvena
analyzed: vīriyam karoti yaḥ majjhe vutta madhukara ādayaḥ viya vīriyam na karoti ime dve api vīriya samatā bhāvena

original: appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkonti. Yo pana avasāne vuttamadhukarādayo viya samappayogo,
analyzed: appanam pāpuṇitum na sakkonti yaḥ pana avasāne vutta madhukara ādayaḥ viya sama ppayogaḥ

original: ayaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti vīriyasamatāyogatoti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ayam appanam pāpuṇitum sakkoti vīriya sama tā yogato ti upamā saṃsandanam veditabbam

original: Tena vuttaṃ “eko bhikkhū”tiādi. Līnaṃ bhāvanācittanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: tena vuttam ekaḥ bhikkhu iti ādi līnam bhāvanā cittan ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Paṭhamajjhānakathāvaṇṇanā
69. Evanti vuttappakārena. Vīriyasamatāyojanavasena vīthipaṭipannaṃ bhāvanāmānasaṃ
analyzed: evam ti vutta ppakārena vīriya samatā yojana vasena vīthi paṭipannam bhāvanā mānasam

original: paṭibhāganimitteyeva ṭhapanavasena nimittābhimukhaṃ paṭipādayato assa yogino. Ijjhissatīti

original: samijjhissati, uppajjissatīti attho. Anuyogavasenāti bhāvanāvasena. Sesānīti sesāni
analyzed: samijjhissati uppajjissati iti attho anuyoga vasena ati bhāvanā vasena sesāni iti sesāni

original: tīṇi, cattāri vā. Pakaticittehīti pākatikehi kāmāvacaracittehi. Balava…pe… cittekaggatāni
analyzed: tīṇi cattāri vā pakati cittehi iti pākatikehi kāmāvacara cittehi bala vape citta ekaggatāni

original: bhāvanābalena paṭutarasabhāvappattiyā. Parikammattāti paṭisaṅkhārakattā. Yadi āsannattā
analyzed: bhāvanā balena paṭuta rasa bhāva ppattiyā parikamma ttā ati paṭisaṅkhāraka ttā yadi āsanna ttā

original: upacāratā, gotrabhuno eva upacārasamaññā siyāti āha “samīpacārittā vā”ti. Anaccāsannopi
analyzed: upacāra tā gotrabhunaḥ eva upacāra samaññā siyāti āha samīpa cārittā vā ati anacca āsannaḥ pi

original: hi nātidūrapavattī samīpacārī nāma hoti. Appanaṃ upecca carantīti upacārāni. Ito
analyzed: hi na ati dūra pavattī samīpa cārī nāma hoti appanam upecca caranti iti itas

original: pubbe parikammānanti nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ parikammānaṃ. Etthāti etesu parikammupacārānulomasaññitesu.
analyzed: pubbe parikammānanti nānā vajjana vīthiyam parikammānam ettha ati etesu parikamma upacāra anuloma saññitesu

original: Sabbantimanti tatiyaṃ, catutthaṃ vā. Parittagottābhibhavanatoti parittassa gottassa
analyzed: sabbantimanti tatiyam catuttham vā paritta gotta abhibhavanato ti parittassa gottassa

original: abhibhavanato. Gaṃtāyatīti hi gottaṃ, “paritta”nti pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ, buddhiñca
analyzed: abhibhavanataḥ hi gottam parittam ti pavattamānam abhidhānam buddhim ca

original: ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti parittagottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena
analyzed: ekaṃsika visaya tāya rakkhati iti paritta gottam yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇa bhūtena atthena

original: vinā na pavattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena. Tasmā so tāni tāyati rakkhatīti
analyzed: vinā na pavattati evam abhidhānam abhidheyya bhūtena tasmā so tāni tāyati rakkhati iti

original: vuccati. Taṃ pana mahaggatānuttaravidhuraṃ kāmataṇhāya gocarabhūtaṃ kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ
analyzed: vuccati tam pana mahaggata anuttara vidhuram kāma taṇhāya gocara bhūtam kāmāvacara dhammānam

original: āveṇikarūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahaggatagottepi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Bhāvanatoti uppādanato.
analyzed: āveṇika rūpam daṭṭhabbam mahaggata gotte pi iminā nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ bhāvanataḥ ti uppādanataḥ

original: Avisesena sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññāti paṭhamanayo gahitaggahaṇaṃ hotīti āha “aggahitaggahaṇenā”tiādi.
analyzed: avisesena sabbesam sabbā samaññā ti paṭhama nayaḥ gahita ggahaṇam hoti iti āha aggahita ggahaṇena atiādi

original: Nānāvajjanaparikammameva parikammanti adhippāyena “paṭhamaṃ vā upacāra”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: nānā vajjana parikammam eva parikammanti adhippāyena paṭhamam vā upacāra ntiādi vuttam

original: Catutthaṃ appanācittaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ pubbe vuttanayena sace catutthaṃ
analyzed: catuttham appanā cittam pañcamam vā appanā cittam pubbe vutta nayena sace catuttham

original: gotrabhu hotīti attho. Pañcamaṃ vāti vā-saddo aniyame. Svāyaṃ aniyamo iminā kāraṇenāti

original: dassetuṃ “tañca kho khippābhiññadandhābhiññavasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha khippābhiññassa
analyzed: dassetum tat ca kho khippābhiñña dandhābhiñña vasena ati vuttam tattha khippābhiññassa

original: catutthaṃ appeti, dandhābhiññassa pañcamaṃ. Kasmā pana catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā appeti,
analyzed: catuttham appeti dandha abhiññassa pañcamam kasmā pana catuttham pañcamam vā appeti

original: na tato paranti āha “tato paraṃ javanaṃ patatī”ti. Tato pañcamato paraṃ chaṭṭhaṃ,
analyzed: na tatas paranti āha tatas param javanam patati iti tatas pañcamatas param chaṭṭham

original: sattamañca javanaṃ patantaṃ viya hoti parikkhīṇajavattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: sattamam ca javanam patantam viya hoti parikkhīṇa java ttā ati adhippāyo

original: Yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamajavanaṃ dubbalattā gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti, laddhāsevanaṃ
analyzed: yathā a laddha āsevanam paṭhama javanam dubbala ttā gotrabhum na uppādeti laddha āsevanam

original: pana balavabhāvato dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ uppādeti, evaṃ laddhāsevanatāya
analyzed: pana balava bhāvataḥ dutiyam tatiyam vā gotrabhum uppādeti evam laddha āsevana tāya

original: balavabhāvato chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamampi appetīti therassa adhippāyo. Tenāha “tasmā chaṭṭhepi
analyzed: balava bhāvataḥ chaṭṭham sattamam pi appeti iti therassa adhippāyo tena āha tasmā chaṭṭhe pi

original: sattamepi appanā hotī”ti. Tanti therassa vacanaṃ. Suttasuttānulomaācariyavādehi anupatthambhitattā
analyzed: sattame pi appanā hoti iti tanti therassa vacanam sutta sutta anuloma ācariya vādehi an upatthambhita ttā

original: vuttaṃ “attanomatimatta”nti. “Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā”ti pana suttapadamakāraṇaṃ
analyzed: vuttam attano matimattanti purimā purimā kusalāḥ dhammā ti pana sutta padam akāraṇam

original: āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā. Tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi paṭhamacetanā
analyzed: āsevana paccaya lābhassa balava bhāve anekantika ttā tathā hi aladdha āsevanā api paṭhama cetanā

original: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti, laddhāsevanā dutiyacetanā yāva chaṭṭhacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyā.
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyā hoti laddha āsevanā dutiya cetanā yāva chaṭṭha cetanā apara apariya vedanīyā

original: Catutthapañcamesuyevātiādi vuttassevatthassa yuttidassanamukhena nigamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: catuttha pañcamesu yeva atiādi yutti dassana mukhena nigamana attham vuttam

original: Tattha yadi chaṭṭhasattamaṃ javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti parikkhīṇajavattā, kathaṃ sattamajavanacetanā
analyzed: tattha yadi chaṭṭha sattamam javanam patitam nāma hoti parikkhīṇa java tā katham sattama javana cetanā

original: upapajjavedanīyā, ānantariyā ca hotīti? Nāyaṃ viseso āsevanapaccayalābhena balappattiyā.
analyzed: upapajja vedanīyā ānantariyā ca hoti iti na ayam visesaḥ āsevana paccaya lābhena bala ppattiyā

original: Kiñcarahi kiriyāvatthāvisesato. Kiriyāvatthā hi ārambhamajjhapariyosānavasena tividhā.
analyzed: kiñcarahi kiriyā vatthā avisesato kiriyā vatthā hi ārambha majjha pariyosāna vasena tividhā

original: Tattha ca pariyosānāvatthāya sanniṭṭhāpakacetanābhāvena upapajjavedanīyāditā hoti,
analyzed: tattha ca pariyosāna avatthāya sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā bhāvena upapajja vedanīya ādi tā hoti

original: na balavabhāvenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa
analyzed: na balava bhāvena ati daṭṭhabbam paṭisandhiyā anantara paccaya bhāvinaḥ vipāka santānassa

original: anantarapaccayabhāvena tathā abhisaṅkhatattāti ca vadanti. Tasmā chaṭṭhasattamānaṃ
analyzed: anantara paccaya bhāvena tathā ca vadanti tasmā chaṭṭha sattamānam

original: papātābhimukhatāya parikkhīṇajavatā na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Tathā hi “yathā hi puriso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: papāta abhimukha tāya parikkhīṇa java tā na sakkā nivāretum tathā hi yathā hi purisaḥ itiādi vuttam

original: Sā ca pana appanā. Addhānaparicchedoti kālaparicchedo. So panettha sattasu ṭhānesu

analyzed: seta rattehi paribhinnam vimissitam nīlam vinīlam purima vaṇṇa vipariṇāma bhūtam vā nīlam vinīlam

original: Paribhinnaṭṭhānesu kākakaṅkādīhi. Vissandamānapubbanti vissavantapubbaṃ, tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharantapubbanti attho.
analyzed: paribhinna ṭṭhānesu kāka kaṅka ādīhi vissandamāna pubbam ti vissavanta pubbam taham taham paggharanta pubbam ti attho

original: Apadhāritanti vivaṭaṃ ugghāṭitaṃ. Khittanti chaḍḍitaṃ, soṇasiṅgālādīhi visuṃ katvā khādanena sarīrasaṅghātato luñcitvā tahaṃ tahaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ. Vividhaṃ khittanti vikkhittaṃ.
analyzed: apadhāritanti vivaṭam ugghāṭitam khittanti chaḍḍitam soṇa siṅgāla ādīhi visum katvā khādanena sarīra saṅghātataḥ luñcitvā tahaṃ taham chaḍḍitam vividham khittanti vikkhittam

original: Purimanayenāti “vividhaṃ khitta”ntiādinā pubbe vuttanayena. Satthena hanitvāti verīhi
analyzed: purima nayena āti vividham khitta nti ādinā pubbe vutta nayena satthena hanitvā ati verīhi

original: khaggakaravālādinā satthena paharitvā. Vuttanayenāti “aññena hattha”ntiādinā pubbe vuttanayena.
analyzed: khagga karavāla ādinā satthena paharitvā vutta nayena āti aññena hattha nti ādinā pubbe vutta nayena

original: Abbhantarato nikkhamantehi kimīhi paggharantakimikulaṃ puḷavakanti āha “kimiparipuṇṇassā”ti.
analyzed: abbhantarataḥ nikkhamantehi kimīhi paggharanta kimi kulam puḷavakam ti āha kimi paripuṇṇassa ati

original: Uddhumātakādīni āmakasusānādīsu chaḍḍitāsubhāni. Nissāyāti paṭicca tānipi ārabbha. Nimittānanti uggahapaṭibhāganimittānaṃ. Etāneva uddhumātakādīneva nāmāni.
analyzed: uddhumātaka ādīni āmaka susāna ādīsu chaḍḍita asubhāni nissāya ati paṭicca tāni pi ārabbha nimittānam ti uggaha paṭibhāga nimittānam etān eva uddhumātaka ādīn eva nāmāni

original: Uddhumātakakammaṭṭhānavaṇṇanā
analyzed: uddhumātaka kammaṭṭhāna vaṇṇanā

original: 103. Bhāvetukāmenāti uppādetukāmena. Tenāti ācariyena. Assāti yogino. Asubhanimittatthāyāti
analyzed: bhāvetu kāmena ati uppādetu kāmena tena ati ācariyena assa ati yoginaḥ asubha nimitta thāya ati

analyzed: pathavīkasiṇe vuttam paṭipajjana vidhim sandhāya āha appanā vidhāna pariyosānam

original: 104. Tāvadevāti sutakkhaṇeyeva. Atitthena puṇṇanadīādiṃ pakkhandantena viya anupavisantena
analyzed: tāvat eva ati sutakkhaṇeya iva atitthena puṇṇa nadī ādim pakkhandantena viya anupavisantena

original: viya. Kedārakoṭiyāti kedāramariyādāya. Visabhāgarūpanti khettarakkhikādivisabhāgavatthurūpaṃ.
analyzed: kedāra koṭiyā ti kedāra mariyādāya visabhāga rūpanti khetta rakkhikā ādi visabhāga vatthu rūpam

original: Sarīranti uddhumātakakaḷevaraṃ. Adhunāmatanti aciramataṃ uddhumātakabhāvaṃ appattaṃ.
analyzed: uddhumātaka kaḷevaram adhunāmatanti aciramatam uddhumātaka bhāvam appattam

original: Takkayatīti sambhāveti bhāriyaṃ katvā na maññati.
analyzed: takkayati iti sambhāveti bhāriyam katvā na maññati

original: 105. Rūpasaddādīti ettha amanussānaṃ rūpehi, sīhabyagghādīnaṃ saddādīhi, amanussānampi
analyzed: rūpa sadda ādi iti ettha amanussānam rūpehi sīha byaggha ādīnam sadda ādīhi amanussānam pi

original: vā rūpasaddādīhi. Tathā sīhabyagghādīnanti yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Aniṭṭhārammaṇābhibhūtassāti
analyzed: vā rūpa sadda ādīhi tathā yathāraham yojetabbam aniṭṭha ārammaṇa abhibhūtassa ati

analyzed: vidāha vasena āsaye na tiṭṭhati ucchaḍḍetabbam hoti iti attho aññaḥ ti amanussa ādīnam

original: vasena vā aññathā vā vuttappakārato añño ābādho hoti. Soti saṅghatthero, abhiññātabhikkhu
analyzed: vasena vā aññathā vā vutta ppakārataḥ aññaḥ ābādhaḥ hoti saḥ ti saṅgha ttheraḥ abhiññāta bhikkhu

original: vā. Yassānena ārocitaṃ, so. Katakammāti katatheyyakammā. Akatakammāti theyyakammaṃ
analyzed: vā yassa anena ārocitam saḥ kata kammā ati kata theyya kammā a kata kammā ati theyya kammam

original: kātukāmā. Katakammā pana idhādhippetā. Tasmā teti katakammā corā. Saha oḍḍhenāti
analyzed: kātu kāmā katakammā pana idha adhippetā tasmā te iti katakammā corā saha oḍḍhena ati

original: sahoḍḍhaṃ, thenetvā gahiyamānabhaṇḍena saddhinti attho. Yajamānoti yaññaṃ yajanto

original: yaññasāmiko. “Addhā imāya paṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā.
analyzed: yaññasāmikaḥ addhā imāya paṭipattiyā jarā maraṇataḥ muccissāmi iti pīti somanassam uppādetvā

original: Evaṃ gamanavidhānaṃ ekadesena vatvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena taṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhakathāsu
analyzed: evam gamana vidhānam eka desena vatvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgata nayena tam dassetum aṭṭhakathāsu

original: vuttena vidhinā”tiādimāha. Tattha uggaṇhantoti uggaṇhanahetu. Ekoti ayaṃ eka-saddo

original: asahāyattho, na aññādiatthoti “adutiyo”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā vaṇṇādito vavatthānaṃ ekaṃsato

original: samuditameva icchitabbaṃ sabbatthakabhāvato, na tathā sandhiāditoti dassanatthaṃ

original: gahitanimittassa yogino nivattitvā vasanaṭṭhānagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tabbhāgiyaññevāti

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi kevalena disābhimukhabhāvena kiñci ijjhati.
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam na hi kevalena disā abhimukha bhāvena kiñci

original: Samantā nimittupalakkhaṇāti uddhumātakassa samantā pāsāṇādinimittasallakkhaṇā. Asammohatthāti

analyzed: adhigatam hoti iti sambandhaḥ

analyzed: karoti iti vuttaḥ samāna kāla tā dīpakena hi saha saddena ayam samāsaḥ yathā sa cakkam

analyzed: vā tathā nipphajjanato rasaḥ ti vutto

original: itthipurisaliṅganti dassentena “itthiliṅgaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ṭhitassa sattassa idaṃ

original: khuddānukhuddachiddavantaṃ. Medakathālikā medabharitabhājanaṃ. Niccuggharitapaggharitanti

original: niccakālaṃ upari, heṭṭhā ca vissavantaṃ. Vemattanti nānattaṃ. Nānāvatthehīti nānāvaṇṇehi

analyzed: icchita alābhena vighātam āpajjantena

original: Kiṃsukanti pālibhaddakaṃ, palāsoti keci, simbalīti apare. Atilolupoti ativiya lolasabhāvo.

analyzed: dabba jātikena ati uttari manussa dhamme paṭiladdhum bhabba rūpena yattha yattha sarīre

1. Buddhānussatikathāvaṇṇanā

original: 123. Asubhānantaranti asubhakammaṭṭhānānantaraṃ. Anussatīsūti anussatikammaṭṭhānesu.

original: Tikkhindriyeti tikhiṇehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. Mudindriyeti mudukehi

original: saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. Upanissayaindriyāni nāma idhādhippetāni. Svākāreti
analyzed: saddhā ādīhi indriyehi samannāgate upanissaya aindriyāni nāma idha adhippetāni su ākāra iti

original: sundarākāre kalyāṇapakatike, vivaṭṭajjhāsayeti attho. Suviññāpayeti sammattaniyāmaṃ
analyzed: sundara ākāre kalyāṇa pakatike attho su viññāpaya iti sammatta niyāmam

original: viññāpetuṃ sukare saddhe, paññavante ca. Bhabbe abhabbeti ettha bhabbeti kammāvaraṇakilesāvaraṇavipākāvaraṇarahite.
analyzed: viññāpetum sukare saddhe paññavante ca bhabbe abhabbā iti ettha bhabbā iti kamma āvaraṇa kilesa āvaraṇa vipāka āvaraṇa rahite

original: Vuttavipariyāyena dvākāraduviññāpayābhabbā veditabbā. Ettha ca “imassa rāgarajo appo,
analyzed: vutta vipariyāyena veditabbā ettha ca imassa rāga rajaḥ appo

original: imassa dosarajo appo”tiādinā apparajakkhesu jānanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: imassa dosa rajaḥ appaḥ ti ādinā apparajakkhesu jānanam veditabbam sesesu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti, tasmā assa bhagavato

original: sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
analyzed: satta lokaḥ api sabbathā viditaḥ

original: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi. Tassa pana jānanaṃ na nibbidāya
analyzed: nanu ca sattesu pamāṇa ādi api jānitabbaḥ atthi iti atthi tassa pana jānanam na nibbidāya

original: virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṃ, bhagavato pana tampi suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitameva,
analyzed: virāgāya nirodhāya ati na gahitam bhagavataḥ pana tat su viditam

original: payojanābhāvā desanaṃ nāruḷhaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ –
analyzed: payojana abhāvāḥ desanam na āruḷham tena vuttam

analyzed: āropitaḥ ayam vā mahā pathavī iti ādi

original: 137. Okāsalokopi sabbathā viditoti sambandho. Cakkavāḷanti lokadhātu. Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena
analyzed: okāsa lokaḥ api sabbathā vidito ti sambandho cakkavāḷanti lokadhātu sā hi nemi maṇḍala sadisena

original: Evaṃ saṇṭhiteti evamavaṭṭhite. Etthāti cakkavāḷe. Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva

analyzed: catur āsīti yojana sahassāniyā iva ubbedhaḥ na kevalam ca ittha ubbedhaḥ uva atha kho āyāma vitthārā api issa

original: tattakāyeva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
analyzed: tattakāya iva vuttam ha etam

original: “Sineru, bhikkhave, pabbatarājā caturāsīti yojanasahassāni āyāmena, caturāsīti yojanasahassāni vitthārenā”ti.
analyzed: sineru bhikkhave pabbata rājā caturāsīti yojana sahassāni āyāmena caturāsīti yojana sahassāni vitthārena ati

original: Tatoti sinerussa heṭṭhā, upari ca vuttappamāṇato. Upaḍḍhupaḍḍhenāti upaḍḍhena upaḍḍhena.

original: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca
analyzed: idam vuttam hoti dvācattālīsa yojana sahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷhaḥ tattakam eva ca

original: upari uggato yugandharapabbato, ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva

original: ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā.

original: Yathā mahāsamuddo yāva cakkavāḷapādamūlā anupubbaninno, evaṃ yāva sinerupādamūlāti
analyzed: yathā mahā samuddaḥ yāva cakkavāḷa pāda mūlā anupubba ninnaḥ evam yāva sineru pāda mūlā ati

original: evaṃ īsadharādayopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno
analyzed: evam īsadhara ādayaḥ api iti daṭṭhabbam vuttam ha etam mahā samuddaḥ bhikkhave anupubba ninnaḥ

original: anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro”ti. Sineruyugandharādīnaṃ antare sīdantarasamuddā nāma.
analyzed: anupubba poṇaḥ anupubba pabbhāraḥ iti sineru yugandhara ādīnam antare sīdantara samuddāḥ nāma

original: Te vitthārato yathākkamaṃ sineruādīnaṃ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti. Brahāti mahanto.
analyzed: te vitthārataḥ yathākkamam sineru ādīnam vadanti mahantaḥ

original: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā. Sineruṃ tāva
analyzed: sinerussa samantataḥ ti parikkhipana vasena sinerussa samantataḥ ṭhitā sinerum tāva

original: ṭhitā “sinerussa samantato”ti vuttā.
analyzed: ṭhitā sinerussa samantataḥ ti vuttā

original: Yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanānaṃ satāni
analyzed: yojanānam satānuccaḥ himavā pañca pabbatā iti himavā pabbataḥ pañca yojanānam satāni

original: kappaṭṭhāyitādippakārena pabhāvena.
analyzed: kappa ṭṭhāyi tā ādi ppakārena pa bhāvena

original: Garuḷānaṃ simbalirukkho sinerussa dutiyaparibhaṇḍe patiṭṭhito.

original: Sirīsenāti paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ. Sattamanti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, sirīso bhavati sattamoti attho.
analyzed: sirīsena iti paccatte karaṇa vacanam sattaman ti liṅga vipallāsena vuttam sirīsaḥ bhavati sattamaḥ ti attho

original: Tattha caṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ heṭṭhā, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ upari. Tassa āsannabhāvena candamaṇḍalaṃ

analyzed: antara sadise tiṇṇam tiṇṇam cakkavāḷānam antare ekekaḥ lokantaranirayo

original: Anantānīti aparimāṇāni, “ettakānī”ti aññehi minituṃ asakkuṇeyyāni. Bhagavā anantena

original: 138. Attanāti nissakkavacanametaṃ. Guṇehi attanā visiṭṭhatarassāti sambandho. Tara-ggahaṇaṃ

original: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi, kuto sadiso. Visiṭṭhe
analyzed: sa devake hi loke sadisa kappaḥ api nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi kutas sadisaḥ visiṭṭhe

original: pana kā kathā. Kassacīti kassacipi. Abhibhavatīti sīlasampadāya upanissayabhūtānaṃ

original: hirottappamettākaruṇānaṃ, visesapaccayānaṃ saddhāsativīriyapaññānañca ukkaṃsappattiyā

analyzed: satthu sīla guṇo tena bhagavā sa devakam lokam añña datthu abhibhuyya pavattati na

original: Sīlādayo cete lokiyalokuttaramissakā veditabbā. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ pana lokiyaṃ kāmāvacarameva.
analyzed: sīla ādayo ca ite lokiya lokuttara missakā veditabbā vimutti ñāṇa dassanam pana lokiyam kāmāvacaram eva

original: Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ tena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavatīti? Tassāpi ānubhāvato asadisattā.
analyzed: yadi evam katham tena sa devakam lokam abhibhavati iti tassa api ānubhāvataḥ asadisa ttā

original: Tampi hi visayato, pavattito, pavatti ākārato ca uttaritarameva. Taṃ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
analyzed: tam pi hi visayataḥ pavattitaḥ ākārato ca uttaritaram eva tam hi anañña sādhāraṇam

original: satthu vimuttiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattati, pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṃ paramagambhīraṃ

original: saṇhasukhumaṃ savisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ vibhūtataraṃ

original: lahuṃ lahuṃ pavattatīti.
analyzed: lahum lahum pavattati iti

original: Evaṃ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṃ

original: dassetuṃ “asamo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha asamoti ekasmiṃ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena
analyzed: dassetum asamaḥ tiādi vuttam tattha asamaḥ ti ekasmin kāle na atthi etassa sīla ādi guṇena

original: samā sadisāti asamo. Tathā asamehi atītānāgatabuddhehi samo, asamā vā samā etassāti
analyzed: samā sadisā ati asamaḥ tathā asamehi atīta anāgata buddhehi samaḥ asamāḥ vā samāḥ etassa ati

original: asamasamo. Sīlādiguṇena natthi etassa paṭimāti appaṭimo. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.

original: Tattha upamāmattaṃ paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo, yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭipuggalo veditabbo.

original: Na kho panāhaṃ samanupassāmīti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbalokaṃ

original: passantopi tattha sadevake…pe… pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṃ sampannatarasīlaṃ

original: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā

original: pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”ti –

original: Idaṃ aggappasādasuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena –

analyzed: vīriya pārami bhāva ppattaḥ ariya magga pariyāpanno ca sammāvāyāma saṅkhāto payatto

original: Bhedehīti sabbattikadukapadasaṃhitehi pabhedehi. Paṭiccasamuppādādīhīti ādi-saddena
analyzed: bhedehi iti sabba ttika duka pada saṃhitehi pabhedehi paṭiccasamuppāda ādīhi iti ādi saddena

original: na kevalaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā, atha kho saṅgahādayo,
analyzed: na kevalam āgatā sati paṭṭhāna ādayaḥ iva saṅgahitāḥ atha kho saṅgaha ādayaḥ

original: samayavimuttādayo, ṭhapanādayo, tikapaṭṭhānādayo ca saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ. Dukkhasaccassa
analyzed: samaya vimutta ādayo ṭhapana ādayo tika paṭṭhāna ādayo ca saṅgahitā iti veditabbam dukkhasaccassa

original: pīḷanaṭṭho taṃsamaṅgino sattassa hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ. Saṅkhataṭṭho sameccasambhūyapaccayehi
analyzed: pīḷana ṭhaḥ tad samaṅgino sattassa hiṃsanam a vipphārika tā karaṇam saṅkhata ṭhaḥ samecca sambhūya paccayehi

original: katabhāvo. Santāpaṭṭho dukkhadukkhatādīhi santappanaṃ paridahanaṃ. Vipariṇāmaṭṭho
analyzed: kata bhāvaḥ santāpa ṭṭhaḥ dukkha dukkha tā ādīhi santappanam paridahanam vipariṇāma ṭṭhaḥ

original: jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho dukkhassa
analyzed: jarāya maraṇena ca ati dvidhā vipariṇāmetabba tā samudayassa dukkhassa

original: nibbattanavasena sampiṇḍanaṃ. Nidānaṭṭho “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ.
analyzed: nibbattana vasena sampiṇḍanam nidānaṭṭhaḥ idam tam dukkham ti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ

original: Saṃyogaṭṭho saṃsāradukkhena saṃyojanaṃ. Palibodhaṭṭho maggādhigamassa nivāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: saṃyoga ṭṭhaḥ saṃsāra dukkhena saṃyojanam palibodha ṭṭhaḥ magga adhigamassa nivāraṇam

original: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā, tannissaraṇanimittatā
analyzed: nirodhassa nissaraṇa ṭṭhaḥ sabba upadhīnam paṭinissagga sabhāva ttā tatas vinissaṭa tā tad nissaraṇa nimitta tā

original: vā. Vivekaṭṭho sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyuttatā. Asaṅkhataṭṭho kenacipi paccayena anabhisaṅkhatatā.
analyzed: vā viveka ṭṭhaḥ sabba saṅkhāra visaṃyutta tā asaṅkhata ṭṭhaḥ kenacipi paccayena an abhisaṅkhata tā

original: Amataṭṭho niccasabhāvattā maraṇābhāvo, sattānaṃ maraṇābhāvahetutā vā. Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho
analyzed: amata ṭṭhaḥ nicca sabhāva ttā maraṇa abhāvaḥ sattānam maraṇa abhāva hetu tā vā maggassa niyyāna ṭṭhaḥ

original: vaṭṭadukkhato niggamanaṭṭho. Hetuattho nibbānassa sampāpakabhāvo. Dassanaṭṭho accantasukhumassa
analyzed: vaṭṭa dukkhataḥ niggamana aṭṭhaḥ hetu atthaḥ nibbānassa sampāpaka bhāvaḥ dassana ṭṭhaḥ accanta sukhumassa

original: nibbānassa sacchikaraṇaṃ. Ādhipateyyaṭṭho catusaccadassane sampayuttānaṃ ādhipaccakaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: nibbānassa sacchikaraṇam catu sacca dassane sampayuttānam ādhipacca karaṇam

original: ārammaṇādhipatibhāvo vā visesato maggādhipativacanato. Satipi hi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve
analyzed: ārammaṇa adhipati bhāvaḥ vā visesataḥ magga adhipati vacanataḥ sati pi hi jhāna ādīnam ārammaṇa adhipati bhāve

original: “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti evamādiṃ avatvā “maggādhipatino dhammā” icceva vuttaṃ,
analyzed: jhāna adhipatino dhammā ti evamādim avatvā magga adhipatino dhammā icca eva vuttam

original: tasmā viññāyati “atthi maggassa ārammaṇādhipatibhāve viseso”ti. Ete ca pīḷanādayo
analyzed: tasmā viññāyati atthi maggassa ārammaṇa adhipati bhāve viseso ti ete ca pīḷana ādayo

original: soḷasākārā nāma. Kasmā panettha aññesu rogagaṇṭhādiākāresu vijjamānesu eteva pariggayhantīti?
analyzed: soḷasa ākārā nāma kasmā pana ittha aññesu roga gaṇṭha ādi ākāresu vijjamānesu ete iva pariggayhanti iti

original: Salakkhaṇato ca saccantaradassanato ca āvibhāvato. Svāyamattho parato saccakathāyameva āvi bhavissati.
analyzed: sa lakkhaṇato ca sacca antara dassanato ca āvi bhāvato paratas sacca kathā ayam eva bhavissati

original: Dibbavihāro kasiṇādiārammaṇāni rūpāvacarajjhānāni. Mettādijjhānāni brahmavihāro.
analyzed: dibba vihāraḥ kasiṇa ādi ārammaṇāni rūpāvacara jhānāni mettā ādi jhānāni brahmavihāro

original: Phalasamāpatti ariyavihāro. Kāmehi vivekaṭṭhakāyatāvasena ekībhāvo kāyaviveko. Paṭhamajjhānādinā
analyzed: phala samāpatti ariya vihāro kāmehi ekībhāvo kāya viveko paṭhama jhāna ādinā

original: nīvaraṇādīhi vivittacittatā cittaviveko. Upadhiviveko nibbānaṃ. Aññeti lokiyābhiññādike.
analyzed: nīvaraṇa ādīhi vivitta citta tā citta vivekaḥ upadhi vivekaḥ nibbānam aññā iti lokiya abhiññā ādike

original: Kilesābhisaṅkhāravasena bhavesu paribbhamanaṃ, so ca taṇhāppadhānoti vuttaṃ “taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: kilesa abhisaṅkhāra vasena bhavesu paribbhamanam so ca taṇhā ppadhāno ti vuttam taṇhā saṅkhātam

original: gamana”nti. Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṃ puna apaccāvamanavasena chaḍḍitaṃ.
analyzed: ariya magga mukhena uggiritam puna a paccāvamana vasena chaḍḍitam

original: Bhagavāti vuccati niruttinayenāti dassento āha “yathā…pe… mekhalā”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā iti vuccati nirutti nayena ati dassentaḥ āha yathā āpe mekhalā iti

original: Aparo nayo – bhāgavāti bhagavā, bhatavāti bhagavā, bhāge vanīti bhagavā, bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhattavāti bhagavā, bhage vamīti bhagavā. Bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ bhāgavāti bhagavān bhatavāti bhagavān bhāge vanīti bhagavān bhage vanīti bhagavān bhattavāti bhagavān bhage vamīti bhagavān bhāge vamīti bhagavān

original: Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
analyzed: bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge bhage ca vani bhattavā

original: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
analyzed: bhage tathā bhāge vami iti bhagavā jinaḥ

original: Tattha kathaṃ bhāgavāti bhagavā? Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇakoṭṭhāsā, te anaññasādhāraṇā
analyzed: tattha katham bhāgavā ati bhagavā ye te sīla ādayaḥ dhamma kkhandhāḥ guṇa koṭṭhāsā te anañña sādhāraṇā

original: niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti. Tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti
analyzed: niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti tathā hissa sīlam samādhi paññā vimutti

original: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ, hirī ottappaṃ, saddhā vīriyaṃ, sati sampajaññaṃ, sīlavisuddhi
analyzed: vimutti ñāṇa dassanam hirī ottappam saddhā vīriyam sati sampajaññam sīla visuddhi

analyzed: diṭṭhi visuddhi samathaḥ vipassanā tīṇi kusala mūlāni tīṇi su caritāni tayo sammāvitakkā

original: tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā,

analyzed: cha anussati ṭṭhānāni cha gāravā cha nissāraṇīyāḥ dhātuyaḥ cha satata vihārā cha

analyzed: anuttariyāni cha nibbedha bhāgiyā saññā cha abhiññā cha asādhāraṇa ñāṇāni satta

original: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo
analyzed: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānam sattānam āsaya ādi vibhāvana ñāṇāni ca ati evamādayaḥ

original: anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti
analyzed: ananta aparimāṇa bhedāḥ anañña sādhāraṇāḥ niratisayāḥ guṇa bhāgāḥ guṇa koṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti

original: upalabbhanti. Tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ā-kārassa
analyzed: upalabbhanti tasmā yathā vutta vibhāgāḥ guṇa bhāgāḥ assa atthi iti vattabbe ākārassa

analyzed: rassattam katvā bhagavā iti vuttaḥ evam tāva bhāgavā ati bhagavā

original: Yasmā sīlādayo sabbe, guṇabhāgā asesato;
analyzed: sīla ādayaḥ sabbe guṇa bhāgāḥ asesato

original: Vijjanti sugate tasmā, “bhagavā”ti pavuccati.
analyzed: vijjanti sugate tasmai bhagavā ati pavuccati

original: Kathaṃ bhatavāti bhagavā? Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha
analyzed: katham bhatavā ati bhagavā ye te sabba loka hitāya ussukkam āpannehi manussa tta ādike aṭṭha

original: dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūretabbā
analyzed: dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā kata mahā abhinīhārehi mahā bodhisattehi paripūretabbā

original: dānapāramī, sīlanekkhammapaññāvīriyakhantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāpāramīti dasa
analyzed: dāna pāramī sīla nekkhamma paññā vīriya khanti sacca adhiṭṭhāna mettā upekkhā pāramī iti dasa

original: pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo, dānādīni
analyzed: pāramiyaḥ dasa upapāramiyaḥ dasa paramattha pāramiyaḥ ti pāramiyaḥ dāna ādīni

original: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, saccādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, attapariccāgo, nayana, dhana,

original: rajja, puttadārapariccāgoti pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṃ,

original: ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā, buddhatthacariyāti evamādayo, saṅkhepato vā sabbe
analyzed: ñāta ttha cariyā loka ttha cariyā buddha ttha cariyā ati evamādayaḥ saṅkhepataḥ vā sabbe

original: puññasambhārañāṇasambhārabuddhakārakadhammā, te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ
analyzed: puñña sambhāra ñāṇa sambhāra buddha kāraka dhammā te mahā abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānam

original: satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā, saṃkilesabhāgiyā, ṭhitibhāgiyā
analyzed: sata sahassa adhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hāna bhāgiyā saṃkilesa bhāgiyā ṭhiti bhāgiyā

original: vā na honti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva honti, evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ
analyzed: vā na honti atha kho uttaruttari visesa bhāgiyāḥ ava honti evam sakkaccam nirantaram

original: anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena
analyzed: anavasesataḥ bhatā sambhatā assa atthi iti bhatavā ati vattabbe bhagavā ati vuttaḥ nirutti nayena

original: ta-kārassa ga-kāraṃ katvā. Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakārakadhamme
analyzed: takārassa gakāram katvā atha vā yathā vutte buddha kāraka dhamme

original: vuttanayena bhari sambhari, paripūresīti attho. Evampi bhatavāti bhagavā.
analyzed: vutta nayena bhari sambhari paripūresi iti attho evam pi bhatavā ti bhagavā

original: Sammāsambodhiyā sabbe, dānapāramiādike;
analyzed: sammāsambodhiyā sabbe dāna pārami ādike

original: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
analyzed: sambhāre bhatavā nātho tasmā api bhagavā mataḥ

original: Kathaṃ bhāge vanīti bhagavā? Ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā,
analyzed: katham bhāge vani iti bhagavā ye te catuvīsati koṭi sata sahassa saṅkhāḥ devasikam vaḷañjanaka samāpatti bhāgāḥ

original: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ, attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ
analyzed: te anavasesataḥ loka hita attham attano ca diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra attham nicca kappam

original: niccakappaṃ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu,

original: kusalādīsu, khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,

original: āha “aṭṭhakathāyañhī”tiādi.
analyzed: āha aṭṭhakathāyan hi itiādi

analyzed: pakiṇṇaka kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: tam kesa ādi paṇṇattim atikkamitvā ati paṭikkūla bhāvanāya atikkamitvā ugghāṭetvā tassā

original: Sītibhāvanti nibbānaṃ, kilesadarathavūpasamaṃ vā. Niggaṇhātīti uddhaṭaṃ cittaṃ uddhaccapātato
analyzed: sīti bhāvanti nibbānam kilesa daratha vūpasamam vā niggaṇhāti iti uddhaṭam cittam uddhacca pātato

original: rakkhaṇavasena niggaṇhāti. Paggaṇhātīti līnaṃ cittaṃ kosajjapātato rakkhaṇavasena
analyzed: rakkhaṇa vasena niggaṇhāti paggaṇhāti iti līnam cittam kosajja pātataḥ rakkhaṇa vasena

original: paggaṇhāti. Sampahaṃsetīti samappavattaṃ cittaṃ tathāpavattiyaṃ paññāya toseti, uttejeti
analyzed: paggaṇhāti sampahaṃseti iti sama ppavattam cittam tathāpavattiyam paññāya toseti uttejeti

original: vā. Yadā vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya na pakkhandati, tadā jātiādīni saṃvegavatthūni
analyzed: vā yadā vā nirassādam cittam bhāvanāya na pakkhandati tadā jāti ādīni saṃvega vatthūni

original: paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti. Ajjhupekkhatīti yadā pana cittaṃ alīnaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti ajjhupekkhati iti yadā pana cittam alīnam

original: anuddhataṃ sammadeva bhāvanāvīthiṃ otiṇṇaṃ hoti, tadā paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
analyzed: anuddhatam sammat eva bhāvanā vīthim otiṇṇam hoti tadā paggaha niggaha sampahaṃsanesu

original: kañci byāpāraṃ akatvā samappavattesu yugesu sārathi viya ajjhupekkhati upekkhakova
analyzed: kañci byāpāram a katvā samappavattesu yugesu sārathi viya ajjhupekkhati upekkhakaḥ uva

original: hoti. Paṇītādhimuttikoti paṇīte uttame maggaphale adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro.
analyzed: hoti paṇīta adhimuttikaḥ ti paṇīte uttame magga phale adhimuttaḥ ninna poṇa pabbhāro

original: Suggahitaṃ katvāti yathāvuttaṃ uggahakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ suṭṭhu uggahitaṃ pariyāpuṇanādinā
analyzed: suggahitam katvā iti yathāvuttam uggaha kosalla saṅkhātam vidhim suṭṭhu uggahitam pariyāpuṇana ādinā

original: supariggahitaṃ katvā. Suṭṭhu vavatthapetvāti manasikārakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ sammadeva
analyzed: su pariggahitam katvā suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā ati manasikāra kosalla saṅkhātam vidhim sammad eva

original: sallakkhaṇavasena upadhāretvā. Visesanti pubbenāparaṃ bhāvanāya visesaṃ. Punappunaṃ
analyzed: sat lakkhaṇa vasena upadhāretvā pubbena aparam bhāvanāya visesam punappunam

original: parivattetvāti kammaṭṭhānatantiṃ paguṇabhāvaṃ pāpento bhiyyo bhiyyo vācāya, manasā
analyzed: parivattetvā ti kammaṭṭhāna tantim paguṇa bhāvam pāpentaḥ bhiyyas bhiyyas vācāya manasā

original: ca parivattetvā. Gaṇṭhiṭṭhānanti yathā rukkhassa dubbinibhedo araññassa vā gahanabhūto
analyzed: ca parivattetvā gaṇṭhi ṭṭhānan ti yathā rukkhassa dubbinibhedaḥ araññassa vā gahana bhūtaḥ

original: padeso “gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna”nti vuccati, evaṃ kammaṭṭhānatantiyā atthato dubbinibhedo gahanabhūto
analyzed: padesaḥ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānanti vuccati evam kammaṭṭhāna tantiyāḥ atthataḥ dubbinibhedaḥ gahana bhūtaḥ

original: ca padeso “gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna”nti vuccati. Taṃ paripucchanādiladdhena ñāṇapharasunā chinditvā.
analyzed: ca padesaḥ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānanti vuccati tam paripucchanā ādi laddhena ñāṇa pharasunā chinditvā

original: Nimittanti kammaṭṭhānanimittaṃ, asubhākāro. Edisena payojanena luñcanampi anavajjanti
analyzed: nimittam ti kammaṭṭhāna nimittam asubha ākāraḥ edisena payojanena luñcanam pi

original: dassetuṃ “luñcitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Chinnaṭṭhāneti muṇḍitaṭṭhāne. Vaṭṭatiyeva nissaraṇajjhāsayena
analyzed: dassetum luñcitvā iti vuttam chinna ṭṭhāne ti muṇḍita ṭṭhāne vaṭṭatiyā iva nissaraṇa ajjhāsayena

original: olokanato. Ussadavasenāti aphalitānaṃ, phalitānaṃ vā bahulatāvasena. Disvāva nimittaṃ
analyzed: olokanataḥ ussada vasena ati aphalitānam phalitānam vā bahula tā vasena nimittam

original: gahetabbaṃ dassanayogyatāya tacapañcakassa, itaresu sutvā ca ñatvā ca nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: gahetabbam dassana yogyatāya taca pañcakassa itaresu sutvā ca ñatvā ca nimittam gahetabbam

original: Koṭṭhāsavavatthāpanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: koṭṭhāsa vavatthāpana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 182. Addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇāti abhinavāriṭṭhaphalavaṇṇā. Kaṇṇacūḷikāti uparikaṇṇasakkhalikāya
analyzed: addā ariṭṭhaka vaṇṇā ati abhinava ariṭṭha phala vaṇṇā kaṇṇacūḷikā ati upari kaṇṇa sakkhalikāya

original: parabhāgaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā, kathaṃ? Dve kesā ekato natthīti.
analyzed: parabhāgam sandhāya vuttam tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā katham dve kesā ekatas natthi iti

original: Āsayoti nissayo, paccayoti attho.
analyzed: āsayo ti nissayo paccayo ti attho

original: 184. Asambhinnakāḷakā aññena vaṇṇena asammissakāḷakā.
analyzed: a sambhinna kāḷakā aññena vaṇṇena a sammissa kāḷakā

original: 185. Pattasadisattā nakhā eva nakhapattāni. Nakhā tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti visuṃ vavatthitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dve nakhā ekato natthī”ti āha.
analyzed: patta sadisa ttā nakhāḥ eva nakha pattāni nakhā tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā ati visum sandhāya vuttam tam eva hi attham dassetum dve nakhā ekatas natthi iti āha

original: 186. Dantapāḷiyāti dantāvaliyā. Yānakaupatthambhinīti sakaṭassa dhuraṭṭhāne upatthambhakadaṇḍo. Dantānaṃ ādhārabhūtā aṭṭhi hanukaṭṭhi.
analyzed: dantapāḷiyā ati danta āvaliyā yānaka opatthambhinī ti sakaṭassa dhuraṭṭhāne upatthambhaka daṇḍaḥ dantānaṃ ādhāra bhūtā aṭṭhi hanukaṭṭhi

original: 187. Saṅkaḍḍhiyamānāti sampiṇḍiyamānā. Kosakārakakoso upalliṇḍupoṭṭalakaṃ, yaṃ “koseyyaphala”ntipi
analyzed: saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā ati sampiṇḍiyamānā kosa kāraka kosaḥ upalliṇḍu poṭṭalakam yam

original: vuccati. Puṭabandhaupāhano sakalapiṭṭhipādacchādanaupāhano. Ānisadaṃ āsanapadeso.
analyzed: vuccati puṭabandha upāhano sakala piṭṭhi pāda chādana upāhano ānisadam āsana padeso

original: Tūṇiro sarāvāso. Galakañcukaṃ kaṇṭhattāṇaṃ. Kīṭakulāvakaṃ kharamukhakuṭi.
analyzed: tūṇiraḥ sarāvāsaḥ gala kañcukam kaṇṭhattāṇam kīṭa kulāvakam kharamukhakuṭi

original: Anulomena paṭilomena cāti ettha aṃsapadesato paṭṭhāya bāhuno piṭṭhipadesena otaraṇaṃ
analyzed: anulomena paṭilomena ca ati ettha aṃsa padesataḥ paṭṭhāya bāhuno piṭṭhi padesena otaraṇam

original: anulomo, maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya bāhuno purimabhāgena ārohanaṃ paṭilomo. Teneva nayenāti
analyzed: anulomaḥ maṇibandhataḥ paṭṭhāya bāhuno purima bhāgena ārohanam paṭilomaḥ tena iva nayena ati

original: dakkhiṇahatthe vuttena nayena anulomena paṭilomena cāti attho. Sukhumampīti yathāvuttaoḷārikacammato
analyzed: dakkhiṇa hatthe vuttena nayena anulomena paṭilomena ca ati attho sukhumam pi iti yathā vutta oḷārika cammato

original: sukhumaṃ. Antomukhacammādikoṭṭhāsesu vā tacena paricchinnattā yaṃ durupalakkhaṇīyaṃ,
analyzed: su khumam antar mukha camma ādi koṭṭhāsesu vā tacena paricchinna ttā yam durupalakkhaṇīyam

original: taṃ “sukhuma”nti vuttaṃ. Tañhi vuttanayena ñāṇena tacaṃ vivaritvā passantassa pākaṭaṃ
analyzed: tam sukhuman ti vuttam tat hi vutta nayena ñāṇena tacam vivaritvā passantassa pākaṭam

original: hoti. Idha chavipi tacagatikā evāti “taco upari ākāsena paricchinno”ti vutto.
analyzed: hoti idha taca gatikā eva ati tacaḥ upari ākāsena paricchinno ti vutto

original: 188. Nisadapoto silāputtako. Uddhanakoṭīti mattikāpiṇḍena katauddhanassa koṭi. Tālaguḷapaṭalaṃ
analyzed: nisada poto silāputtakaḥ uddhana koṭī iti mattikā piṇḍena kata oddhanassa tāla guḷa paṭalam

original: nāma pakkatālaphalalasikaṃ tālapaṭṭikādīsu limpitvā sukkhāpetvā uddharitvā gahitapaṭalaṃ.
analyzed: nāma pakka tāla phala lasikam tāla paṭṭikā ādīsu limpitvā sukkhāpetvā uddharitvā gahita paṭalam

original: Sukhumanti yathāvuttamaṃsato sukhumaṃ. Paṇhikamaṃsādithūlānaṃ sakalasarīrassa kisānaṃ
analyzed: sukhumanti yathāvutta maṃsataḥ sukhumam paṇhika maṃsa ādi thūlānam sakala sarīrassa kisānam

original: yebhuyyena maṃsena paṭicchāditattā vuttaṃ “tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinna”nti.
analyzed: yebhuyyena maṃsena paṭicchādita ttā vuttam tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnanti

original: 189. Jālākāro kañcuko jālakañcuko. Visuṃ vavatthitabhāveneva nhārū tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā.
analyzed: jāla ākāraḥ kañcukaḥ jāla kañcukaḥ visum vavatthita bhāvena iva nhārū tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā

original: 190. Dantānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā “ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīnī”ti vuttaṃ. Ekaṃ jaṇṇukaṭṭhi,
analyzed: dantānam visum gahita ttā ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa danta ṭṭhīni iti vuttam ekam

original: ekaṃ ūruṭṭhīti eka-ggahaṇaṃ “ekekasmiṃ pāde”ti adhikatattā. Evaṃ timattānīti evaṃ
analyzed: ekam ūruṭṭhī iti eka gahaṇam eka ekasmin pāde iti adhika tattā evam ti mattāni iti evam

original: mattasaddehi ānisadaṭṭhiādīni idha avuttānipi dassetīti veditabbaṃ. Evañca katvā
analyzed: matta saddehi ānisadaṭṭhi ādīni idha avuttāni pi dasseti iti veditabbam evam ca katvā

original: “atirekatisataaṭṭhikasamussaya”nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
analyzed: idam ca vacanam samatthitam hoti

original: Kīḷāgoḷakāni suttena bandhitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭetvā kīḷanagoḷakāni. Dhanukadaṇḍo
analyzed: kīḷā goḷakāni suttena bandhitvā aññam aññam ghaṭṭetvā kīḷana goḷakāni dhanuka daṇḍaḥ

original: dārakānaṃ kīḷanakakhuddakadhanukaṃ. Tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānanti jaṇṇukaṭṭhimhi
analyzed: dārakānam kīḷanaka khuddaka dhanukam tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhita ṭṭhānanti jaṇṇukaṭṭhimhi

original: pavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhānanti adhippāyo. Tena ūruṭṭhinā patiṭṭhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ yaṃ kaṭiṭṭhino,
analyzed: pavisitvā ṭhita ṭṭhānanti adhippāyo tena ūru ṭṭhinā patiṭṭhitam ṭhānam yam kaṭi ṭṭhino

original: taṃ aggacchinnamahāpunnāgaphalasadisaṃ.
analyzed: tam agga chinna mahā punnāga phala sadisam

original: Kumbhakārena nipphāditaṃ uddhanaṃ kumbhakārikauddhanaṃ. Sīsakapaṭṭaveṭhakaṃ veṭhetvā
analyzed: kumbhakārena nipphāditam uddhanam kumbhakārika oddhanam sīsaka paṭṭa veṭhakam veṭhetvā

original: ṭhapitaṃ sīsamayaṃ paṭṭakaṃ. Yena suttaṃ kantanti, tasmiṃ takkamhi vijjhitvā ṭhapitagoḷakā
analyzed: ṭhapitam sīsa mayam paṭṭakam yena suttam kantanti tasmin takkamhi vijjhitvā ṭhapita goḷakā

original: vaṭṭanā nāma, vaṭṭanānaṃ āvaḷi vaṭṭanāvaḷi.
analyzed: vaṭṭanā nāma vaṭṭanānam āvaḷi vaṭṭanāvaḷi

original: Maṇḍalākārena chinnavaṃsakaḷīrakhaṇḍāni vaṃsakaḷīracakkalakāni. Avalekhanasatthakaṃ ucchutacāvalekhanasatthakaṃ.
analyzed: maṇḍala ākārena chinna vaṃsa kaḷīra khaṇḍāni vaṃsa kaḷīra cakkalakāni avalekhana satthakam ucchuta ca avalekhana satthakam

original: 192. Vakkabhāgena paricchinnanti vakkapariyantena bhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ito paresupi evarūpesu eseva nayo.
analyzed: vakka bhāgena vakka pariyantena bhāgena paricchinnam itas paresu pi evarūpesu eṣa iva nayo

original: 193. Yaṃ nissāyāti yaṃ lohitaṃ nissāya, nissayanissayopi “nissayo”tveva vuccati.
analyzed: yam nissāya ati yam lohitam nissāya nissaya nissayaḥ api nissayaḥ tu eva vuccati

original: Bhavati hi kāraṇakāraṇepi kāraṇavohāro yathā “corehi gāmo daḍḍho”ti. Atha vā yasmiṃ
analyzed: bhavati hi kāraṇa kāraṇe api kāraṇa vohāraḥ yathā corehi gāmaḥ atha vā yasmin

original: rūpakalāpe hadayavatthu, tampi lohitagatikameva hutvā tiṭṭhatīti “yaṃ nissāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: rūpa kalāpe hadaya vatthu tam pi lohita gatikam eva hutvā tiṭṭhati iti yam nissāya iti vuttam

original: 194. Paṇḍukadhātukanti paṇḍusabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: paṇḍuka dhātukam ti paṇḍu sabhāvam

original: 195. Pariyonahanamaṃsanti paṭicchādakamaṃsaṃ.
analyzed: pariyonahanam aṃsanti paṭicchādakam aṃsam

original: 196. Udarajivhāmaṃsanti jivhāsaṇṭhānaṃ udarassa matthakapasse tiṭṭhanakamaṃsaṃ. “Nīla”nti vatvā nīlaṃ nāma bahudhātukanti āha “nigguṇḍipupphavaṇṇa”nti.
analyzed: udara jivhā maṃsam ti jivhā saṇṭhānam udarassa matthaka passe tiṭṭhanaka maṃsam nīlanti vatvā nīlam nāma bahu dhātukan ti āha nigguṇḍi puppha vaṇṇam ti

original: 197. Papphāsamaṃsanti yathāṭhāne eva lambitvā thokaṃ parivattakamaṃsaṃ. Nirasanti nihīnarasaṃ. Nirojanti nippabhaṃ, ojārahitaṃ vā.
analyzed: papphāsam aṃsanti yathā ṭhāne eva lambitvā thokam parivattaka maṃsam nirasanti nihīna rasam nirojanti nippabham ojā rahitam vā

original: 198. Obhaggāti avabhujitvā ṭhitā. Sakkharasudhāvaṇṇanti marumbehi katasudhāvaṇṇaṃ. “Setasakkharasudhāvaṇṇa”ntipi pāṭho, setasakkharavaṇṇaṃ, sudhāvaṇṇañcāti attho.
analyzed: obhaggā ti avabhujitvā ṭhitā sakkhara sudhā vaṇṇam ti marumbehi kata sudhā vaṇṇam seta sakkhara sudhā vaṇṇam iti pi pāṭhaḥ seta sakkhara vaṇṇam sudhā vaṇṇam ca ati attho

original: 199. Antassa ābhujitvā ābhujitvā ṭhitappadesā antabhogaṭṭhānāni. Tesaṃ bandhanabhūtaṃ
analyzed: antassa ābhujitvā ābhujitvā ṭhita ppadesāḥ anta bhogaṭṭhānāni tesam bandhana bhūtam

original: antaguṇaṃ nāmāti dassento āha “antaguṇanti antabhogaṭṭhānesu bandhana”nti. Kuddālapharasukammādīni
analyzed: antaguṇam nāma ati dassentaḥ āha anta guṇam ti anta bhogaṭṭhānesu bandhanam ti kuddāla phara sukamma ādīni

original: karontānaṃ antabhoge agaḷante ekato ābandhitvā, kiṃ viya? Yantasuttakamiva yantaphalakānīti.
analyzed: anta bhoge ekatas ābandhitvā kim viya yanta suttakam iva yanta phalakāni iti

original: Kimiva tattha ṭhitanti āha “pādapuñchana…pe… ṭhita”nti. Purimañcettha ābandhanassa,
analyzed: kim iva tattha ṭhitanti āha pāda puñchanape ṭhitanti puriman ca itthā ābandhanassa

original: dutiyaṃ ṭhānākārassa nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: dutiyam ṭhāna ākārassa nidassanan ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 200. Asitaṃ nāma bhuttaṃ odanādi. Pītaṃ nāma pivanavasena ajjhohaṭapānakādi. Khāyitaṃ nāma saṃkhāditaṃ piṭṭhamūlaphalakhajjādi. Sāyitaṃ nāma assāditaṃ ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi.
analyzed: asitam nāma bhuttam odana ādi pītam nāma pivana vasena ajjhohaṭa pānaka ādi khāyitam nāma saṃkhāditam piṭṭha mūla phala khajja ādi sāyitam nāma assāditam amba pakka madhu phāṇita ādi

original: Yatthāti yasmiṃ udare. Yanti ca udarameva paccāmasati. Yattha pānabhojanādīni patitvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. Suvānavamathu sārameyyavantaṃ. Vivekanti vibhāgaṃ.
analyzed: yattha ati yasmin udare yanti ca udaram eva pāna bhojana ādīni patitvā tiṭṭhati iti sambandho suvāna vamathu vibhāgam

original: 201. Heṭṭhānābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antareti purimabhāgavasena nābhiyā heṭṭhāpadesassa pacchimabhāgavasena heṭṭhimapiṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ vemajjhe. Veḷunāḷikasadiso padesoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: heṭṭhā nābhi piṭṭhikaṇṭaka mūlānam antare ti purima bhāga vasena nābhiyāḥ heṭṭhā padesassa pacchima bhāga vasena heṭṭhima piṭṭhikaṇṭakānam vemajjhe veḷu nāḷika sadisaḥ padesaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

original: 202. Samohitanti nicitaṃ.
analyzed: nicitam

original: 204. Pūtibhāvaṃ āpannaṃ kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ pūtikukkuṭaṇḍaṃ. Uddeko pittādīhi vinā kevalo uddhaṅgamavāto.
analyzed: pūti bhāvam āpannam kukkuṭaṇḍam pūti kukkuṭaṇḍam uddekaḥ pitta ādīhi vinā kevalaḥ uddhaṅgama vātaḥ

original: 205. Ācāmo avassāvanakañjikaṃ.
analyzed: ācāmaḥ avassāvana kañjikam

original: 206. Vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānanti ettha yakanaṃ heṭṭhābhāgapūraṇeneva temeti, itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vakka hadaya yakana papphāse ettha yakanam heṭṭhābhāga pūraṇena iva temeti itarāni tesam upari thokam thokam paggharaṇena ati daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: 207. Utuvikāro uṇhavalāhakādihetuko. Visamacchinno bhisādikalāpo visamaṃ udakaṃ paggharati,
analyzed: utu vikāraḥ uṇha valāhaka ādi hetukaḥ visama chinnaḥ bhisa ādi kalāpaḥ visamam udakam paggharati

original: evamevaṃ sarīraṃ kesakūpādivivarehi upari, heṭṭhā, tiriyañca sedaṃ visamaṃ paggharatīti
analyzed: evam evam sarīram kesa kūpa ādi vivarehi upari heṭṭhā tiriyañca sā idam visamam paggharati iti

original: dassetuṃ visamacchinna-ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: dassetum visama chinna ggahaṇam katam

original: 208. Visamāhāranti tadāpavattamānasarīrāvatthāya asappāyāhāraṃ, atikaṭukaaccuṇhādivisabhāgāhāraṃ
analyzed: visama āhāram ti tadā apavattamāna sarīra avatthāya asappāya āhāram ati kaṭuka accuṇha ādi visa bhāga āhāram

original: vā. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ pana “visabhāgāhāra”ntveva vuttaṃ tadā pavattamānānaṃ dhātūnaṃ visabhāgattā.
analyzed: vā sammoha vinodaniyam pana visabhāga āhāra ntu eva vuttam tadā pavattamānānam dhātūnam visabhāga ttā

original: 209. “Nhānakāle”ti idaṃ udakassa upari sinehassa sambhavadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Paribbhamantasinehabinduvisaṭasaṇṭhānāti
analyzed: nhāna kāle ti idam udakassa upari sinehassa sambhava dassana tham vuttam paribbhamanta sineha bindu visaṭa saṇṭhānā ti

original: visaṭaṃ hutvā paribbhamantasinehabindusaṇṭhānā. Utuvisabhāgo bahiddhāsamuṭṭhāno.
analyzed: visaṭam hutvā utu visa bhāgaḥ bahiddhā samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: Dhātuvisabhāgo antosamuṭṭhāno. Te padesāti te hatthatalādipadesā.
analyzed: dhātu visa bhāgaḥ antosamuṭṭhāno te padesā ati te hattha tala ādi padesā

original: 210. Kiñcīti uṇhādirasānaṃ aññataraṃ āhāravatthu. Nesanti sattānaṃ. Hadayaṃ āgilāyatīti visabhāgāhārādiṃ paṭicca hadayappadeso vivattati.
analyzed: kiñci iti uṇha ādi rasānam aññataram āhāra vatthu sattānam hadayam āgilāyati iti visa bhāga āhāra ādim paṭicca hadaya ppadesaḥ vivattati

original: 211. Dadhino vissandanaaccharaso dadhimuttaṃ. Gaḷitvāti sanditvā. Tālumatthakavivarena otaritvāti matthakavivarato āgantvā tālumatthakena otaritvā.
analyzed: dadhinaḥ vissandana accha rasaḥ dadhi muttam gaḷitvā ati sanditvā tālu matthaka vivarena otaritvā ati matthaka vivarataḥ āgantvā tālu matthakena otaritvā

original: 212. Telaṃ viya sakaṭassa nābhiakkhasīsānaṃ aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā.
analyzed: telam viya sakaṭassa nābhi akkha sīsānam aṭṭhi sandhīnam abbhañjana kiccam sādhayamānā

original: Kaṭakaṭāyantīti “kaṭa kaṭā”ti saddaṃ karonti. Anuravadassanaṃ hetaṃ. Dukkhantīti
analyzed: kaṭakaṭāyanti iti saddam karonti anurava dassanam ha etam dukkhanti iti

original: dukkhitāni sañjātadukkhāni honti.
analyzed: dukkhitāni sañjāta dukkhāni honti

original: 213. Samūlakūlamāsaṃ jhāpetvā chārikaṃ avassāvetvā gahitayūso māsakhāro. Ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ
analyzed: sa mūla kūla māsam jhāpetvā chārikam avassāvetvā gahita yūsaḥ māsa khāraḥ ucchiṭṭha udaka gabbha mala ādīnam

original: chaḍḍanaṭṭhānaṃ candanikā. Ravaṇaghaṭaṃ nāma pakatiyā sammukhameva hoti. Yassa pana
analyzed: chaḍḍana ṭhānam candanikā ravaṇa ghaṭam nāma pakatiyā sammukham eva hoti yassa pana

original: āraggamattampi udakassa pavisanamukhaṃ natthi, taṃ dassetuṃ “amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe”ti
analyzed: āragga mattam pi udakassa pavisana mukham na atthi tam dassetum a mukhe ravaṇa ghaṭe ti

original: vuttaṃ. Āyūhananti samīhanaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam āyūhanan ti samīhanam

original: 214. Evañhītiādi yathāvuttāya uggahakosallapaṭipattiyā nigamanaṃ. Idāni yathāvuttaṃ
analyzed: evam hi itiādi yathā vuttāya uggaha kosalla paṭipattiyāḥ nigamanam idāni yathā vuttam

original: manasikārakosallapaṭipattimpi nigamanavasena gahetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
analyzed: manasikāra kosalla paṭipattim pi nigamana vasena gahetvā kammaṭṭhānam matthakam pāpetvā

original: dassetuṃ “anupubbato”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha paṇṇattisamatikkamāvasāneti kesādipaṇṇattisamatikkamavasena
analyzed: dassetum anupubbato tiādi āraddham tattha paṇṇatti samatikkama avasāne iti kesa ādi paṇṇatti samatikkama vasena

original: pavattāya bhāvanāya avasāne. Apubbāpariyamivāti ekajjhamiva. Kesāti iti-saddo ādiattho,
analyzed: pavattāya bhāvanāya avasāne apubba apariyam iva ati ekajjham iva kesa iti iti saddaḥ ādi atthaḥ

original: pakārattho vā, evamādinā iminā pakārena vāti attho. Te dhammāti vaṇṇādivasena vavatthāpitā
analyzed: pakāra atthaḥ vā evamādinā iminā pakārena vā ati atthaḥ te dhammā ti vaṇṇa ādi vasena vavatthāpitā

original: paṭikkūlākārato upaṭṭhitā koṭṭhāsadhammā.
analyzed: paṭikkūla ākārataḥ upaṭṭhitā koṭṭhāsa dhammā

original: Bahiddhāpīti sasantānato bahipi, parasantānakāyepīti attho. Manasikāraṃ upasaṃharatīti
analyzed: bahiddhā api iti sa santānataḥ para santāna kāye pi iti atthaḥ manasikāram upasaṃharati iti

original: yathāvuttaṃ paṭikkūlamanasikāraṃ upaneti. Yathā idaṃ, tathā etanti. Evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu
analyzed: yathāvuttam paṭikkūla manasikāram upaneti yathā idam tathā etat ti evam sabba koṭṭhāsesu

original: pākaṭībhūtesūti yathā attano kāye, evaṃ paresampi kāye sabbesu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu paṭikkūlavasena
analyzed: pākaṭībhūtesu iti yathā attano kāye evam paresam pi kāye sabbesu kesa ādi koṭṭhāsesu paṭikkūla vasena

original: vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhitesūti attho. Ayamettha kasiṇesu vaḍḍhanasadiso yogino bhāvanāviseso dassito.
analyzed: vibhūta bhāvena upaṭṭhitesu iti atthaḥ ayam ettha kasiṇesu vaḍḍhana sadisaḥ yoginaḥ bhāvanā visesaḥ dassitaḥ

original: Anupubbamuñcanādīti ādi-saddena suttantanayena vibhāvitaṃ vīriyasamatāyojanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: anupubba muñcana ādi iti ādi saddena suttanta nayena vibhāvitam vīriya sama tā yojanam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Punappunaṃ manasi karototi vuttanayena attano kāye kesādike “paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā”ti
analyzed: punappunam manasi karoto ti vutta nayena attano kāye kesa ādike paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā ati

original: abhiṇhaso manasikāraṃ pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamathāni visadāni
analyzed: manasikāram pavattentassa yadā saddhā ādīni indriyāni laddha samathāni visadāni

original: pavattanti, tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ balappattehi sattahi saddhammehi
analyzed: pavattanti tadā assaddhi ādīnam dūrībhāvena sa atisayam bala ppattehi sattahi saddhammehi

original: laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti. Tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya
analyzed: laddhu upatthambhāni vitakka ādīni jhān aṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti tesam uju vipaccanīka tāya

original: nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi. Upacārasamādhinā
analyzed: nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāna iva honti saddhim tad ekaṭṭhehi pāpa dhammehi upacāra samādhinā

original: cittaṃ samādhiyati, so taṃyeva nimittaṃ āsevanto bhāvento bahulīkaronto appanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: cittam samādhiyati saḥ taṃyeva nimittam āsevantaḥ bhāventaḥ bahulīkarontaḥ appanam pāpuṇāti

original: Tena vuttaṃ “anukkamena appanā uppajjatī”ti. Sabbākāratoti vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhāpi. Sāti appanā.
analyzed: tena vuttam anukkamena appanā uppajjati iti sabba ākārataḥ ti vaṇṇa ādi vasena pañcadhā api sā ati appanā

original: Yadi panetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ aviññāṇakāsubhakammaṭṭhānāni viya paṭhamajjhānavasena sijjhati,
analyzed: yadi pana etam kammaṭṭhānam aviññāṇaka asubha kammaṭṭhānāni viya paṭhamajjhāna vasena sijjhati

original: atha kasmā “kāyagatāsatī”ti vuttanti āha “evaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasenā”tiādi. Nānāvaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu
analyzed: atha kasmā kāya gatā asatī iti vuttan ti āha evam paṭhama jhāna vasena atiādi nānā vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna ādīsu

original: dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu pavattamānāya satiyā kiccamettha sātisayanti āha “satibalena ijjhanato”ti.
analyzed: dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu pavattamānāya satiyā kiccam ettha āha sati balena

original: Pantasenāsanesu, adhikusalesu ca aratiṃ, kāmaguṇesu ca ratiṃ sahati abhibhavatīti
analyzed: panta senā āsanesu adhi kusalesu ca aratim kāma guṇesu ca ratim sahati abhibhavati iti

original: aratiratisaho sarīrasabhāvacintanena anabhiratiyā pahīnattā. Tathā koṭṭhāsabhāvanāya
analyzed: arati rati sahaḥ sarīra sabhāva cintanena anabhiratiyā tathā koṭṭhāsa bhāvanāya

original: attasinehassa parikkhīṇattā bhayabheravaṃ sahati, sītādīnañca adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
analyzed: atta sinehassa parikkhīṇa ttā bhaya bheravam sahati sītā ādīnam ca adhivāsaka jātikaḥ hoti

original: Attasinehavasena hi purisassa bhayabheravaṃ hoti, dukkhassa ca anadhivāsanaṃ. Imaṃ
analyzed: atta sineha vasena hi purisassa bhaya bheravam hoti dukkhassa ca an adhivāsanam imaṃ

analyzed: pana koṭṭhāsa bhāvanam anuyuttassa na kevalam paṭhamajjhāna mattam eva uttari pi paṭivedhaḥ

original: atthīti dassetuṃ “kesādīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: atthi iti dassetum kesa ādīnam tiādi vuttam

original: Ānāpānassatikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: āna apāna sati kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 215. Yaṃ taṃ evaṃ pasaṃsitvā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho. Tattha
analyzed: yam tam evam pasaṃsitvā āna apāna sati kammaṭṭhānam niddiṭṭhanti sambandhaḥ tattha

original: yasmā “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādikāya pucchāpāḷiyā atthe vibhāvite thomanāpāḷiyāpi attho
analyzed: yasmai katham bhāvitā uti ādikāya pucchā pāḷiyā atthe vibhāvite thomanā pāḷiyā api

original: vibhāvitoyeva hoti bhedābhāvato, tasmā taṃ laṅghitvā “kathaṃ bhāvito cā”tiādinā ārabhati.
analyzed: tasmāt tam laṅghitvā katham ca ati ādinā ārabhati

original: Tattha hi ito pasaṃsābhāvo “ayampi kho”ti vacanañca viseso. Tesu pasaṃsābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: tattha hi itas pasaṃsā bhāvaḥ ayam pi kho ti vacanam ca visesaḥ tesu pasaṃsā bhāvam dassetuṃ

original: “evaṃ pasaṃsitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Pasaṃsā ca tattha abhirucijananena ussāhanatthā. Tañhi
analyzed: evam pasaṃsitvā iti vuttam pasaṃsā ca tattha abhiruci jananena ussāha atthā tat hi

original: sutvā bhikkhū “bhagavā imaṃ samādhiṃ anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsati, santo kirāyaṃ samādhi
analyzed: sutvā bhikkhū bhagavā imam samādhim anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsati santaḥ kira ayam samādhi

original: paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro pāpadhamme ca ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī”ti sañjātābhirucayo
analyzed: paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro pāpa dhamme ca ṭhānasaḥ antaradhāpeti iti sañjāta abhirucayaḥ

original: ussāhajātā sakkaccaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ maññanti. “Ayampi kho”ti padassa
analyzed: ussāha jātā sakkaccam anuyuñjitabbam paṭipajjitabbam maññanti ayam pi kho ti padassa

original: ye ime mayā nibbānamahāsarassa otaraṇatitthabhūtā kasiṇajjhānaasubhajjhānādayo desitā,
analyzed: ye ime mayā nibbāna mahā sarassa otaraṇa tittha bhūtā kasiṇa jhāna asubha jjhāna ādayaḥ desitā

original: na kevalaṃ te eva, ayampi khoti bhagavā attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ desanānubhāvena
analyzed: na kevalam te eva ayam pi kho ti bhagavā attano paccakkha bhūtam samādhim desanā anubhāvena

original: tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ āsannaṃ, paccakkhañca karonto sampiṇḍanavasena evamāhāti sambandhamukhena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: tesam pi bhikkhūnam āsannam paccakkham ca karontaḥ sampiṇḍana vasena evam āha ati sambandha mukhena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Soḷasavatthukanti catūsu anupassanāsu catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbākāraparipūroti
analyzed: soḷasa vatthukanti catūsu anupassanāsu catunnam catukkānam vasena soḷasa ṭṭhānam sabba ākāra paripūro ti

analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna pāḷiyā padattho piṇḍattho upamā codanā parihāro payojanan ti evamādīhi

original: sabbehi ākārehi paripuṇṇo. Niddesoti kammaṭṭhānassa nissesato vitthāro.
analyzed: sabbehi ākārehi paripuṇṇaḥ niddeso ti kammaṭṭhānassa nissesataḥ vitthāro

original: 216. Kathanti idaṃ pucchanākāravibhāvanapadaṃ. Pucchā cettha kathetukamyatāvasena
analyzed: kathanti idam pucchana ākāra vibhāvana padam pucchā ca itthā kathā itu kamya tā vasena

original: imamatthaṃ dassento “kathanti…pe… kamyatāpucchā”ti āha. Kathaṃ bahulīkatoti etthāpi
analyzed: imam attham dassento āha katham bahulīkato ti ettha api

original: “ānāpānassatisamādhī”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tattha kathanti ānāpānassatisamādhibahulīkāraṃ
analyzed: āna apāna sati samādhi iti padam ānetvā sambandhitabbam tattha katham ti āna apāna ssati samādhi bahulīkāram

analyzed: nānā ppakārataḥ vitthāretu kamyatā pucchā bahulīkataḥ āna apāna ssati samādhi iti tathā puṭṭha dhamma nidassanan ti

original: imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati. Tathā santabhāvādayopi tassa yehi bhāvanābahulīkārehi
analyzed: imam attham iminā atidisati tathā santa bhāva ādayaḥ api tassa yehi bhāvanā bahulīkārehi

original: siddhā, taggahaṇeneva gahitā hontīti dassetuṃ “kathaṃ bahulīkato…pe… vūpasametīti
analyzed: siddhā tad gahaṇena iva gahitāḥ honti iti dassetum katham bahulīka tope vūpasameti iti

original: etthāpi eseva nayo”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ettha api esā iva nayaḥ ti vuttam

original: “Puna ca paraṃ, udāyi, akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ paṭipadā, yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā
analyzed: puna ca param udāyi akkhātā mayā sāvakānam paṭipadā yathā paṭipannāḥ me sāvakā

original: atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā”ti āha. Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ
analyzed: attham dassentaḥ bhāvito ti uppāditaḥ vaḍḍhitaḥ vā ti āha tattha bhāvam vijjamāna tam

original: ito gatoti bhāvito, uppādito paṭiladdhamattoti attho. Uppanno pana laddhāsevano,
analyzed: itas gataḥ ti bhāvitaḥ uppādito paṭiladdha matto ti attho uppanno pana laddha āsevano

original: bhāvito paguṇabhāvaṃ āpādito, vaḍḍhitoti attho. Ānāpānapariggāhikāyāti dīgharassādivisesehi

original: saddhiṃ assāsapassāse paricchijjagāhikāya, te ārabbha pavattāya, satiyaṃ paccayabhūtāyanti
analyzed: saddhim assāsa passāse paricchijja gāhikāya te ārabbha pavattāya satiyam paccaya bhūtāyanti

original: attho. Purimasmiñhi atthe samādhissa satiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo vutto sampayuttavacanato,
analyzed: atthaḥ purimasmin hi atthe samādhissa satiyā sahajāta ādi paccaya bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ sampayutta vacanato

original: dutiyasmiṃ pana upanissayabhāvopi. Upacārajjhānasahagatā hi sati appanāsamādhissa
analyzed: dutiyasmin pana upanissaya bhāvaḥ api upacāra jhāna sahagatā hi sati appanā samādhissa

analyzed: upanissayaḥ hoti iti bahulīkato ti bahulam pavattitaḥ tena āvajjana ādivasībhāva ppattim āha

original: Yo hi vasībhāvaṃ āpādito, so icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjitabbato punappunaṃ pavattīyati.
analyzed: yaḥ hi vasībhāvam āpāditaḥ saḥ icchiti chita khaṇe samāpajjitabbataḥ punappunam pavattīyati

original: Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ kato”ti. Yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo”ti, “vivicceva
analyzed: tena vuttam punappunam kataḥ ti yathā idha iva bhikkhave samaṇaḥ ti vivicca iva

original: kāmehī”ti ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-saddo dutiyādīsupi vutto eva hoti, evamidhāpīti
analyzed: kāmehi iti ca evamādīsu paṭhama pade vuttaḥ eva saddo dutiya ādīsu pi vuttaḥ eva hoti evam idha api iti

original: āha “ubhayattha evasaddena niyamo veditabbo”ti. Ubhayapadaniyamena laddhaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: āha ubhayattha eva saddena niyamaḥ veditabbaḥ iti ubhaya pada niyamena laddha guṇam dassetuṃ

original: “ayañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ayam hi itiādi vuttam

original: Asubhakammaṭṭhānanti asubhārammaṇajhānamāha. Taṃ hi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato, yogino

original: satiyāti yathāvuttāya satiyā. Tena ñāṇenāti yathāvutteneva ñāṇena. Taṃ kāyanti taṃ
