original: assāsapassāsakāyañceva tannissayarūpakāyañca. Anupassatīti jhānasampayuttañāṇena
analyzed: assāsa passāsa kāyañca iva tad nissaya rūpa kāyañca anupassati iti jhāna sampayutta ñāṇena

original: ceva vipassanāñāṇena ca anu anu passati. Tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti

original: tena anupassanena yathāvutte kāye ayaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti vuccati.
analyzed: tena anupassanena yathā vutte kāye ayam kāya anupassanā sati paṭṭhāna bhāvanā ti vuccati

original: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yā ayaṃ yathāvutte assāsapassāsakāye, tassa nissayabhūte karajakāye
analyzed: idam vuttam hoti yā ayam yathā vutte assāsa passāsa kāye tassa nissaya bhūte karaja kāye

original: ca kāyasseva anupassanā anudakabhūtāya marīciyā udakānupassanā viya na aniccādisabhāve

original: Atha vā kāye “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā gahetabbassa kassaci

original: Esa nayoti “navahi ākārehī”tiādinā vuttavidhiṃ rassa-pade atidisati. Etthāti etasmiṃ
analyzed: esa nayo ti navahi ākārehi itiādinā vutta vidhim rassa pade atidisati ettha ati etasmin

analyzed: yathā dassite katham dīgham assasanto ti ādinā āgate pāḷi naye idha ati imasmin rassa pada vasena āgate pāḷi naye

original: Ayanti yogāvacaro. Addhānavasenāti dīghakālavasena. Ittaravasenāti parittakālavasena. Imehi ākārehīti imehi navahi ākārehi.
analyzed: yogāvacaraḥ addhāna vasena ati dīgha kāla vasena ittara vasena ati paritta kāla vasena imehi ākārehi iti imehi navahi ākārehi

original: aniyamattho, tena uttaroṭṭhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: tena uttara uṭṭham saṅgaṇhāti

original: 220. Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedīti sabbassa kāyassa paṭi paṭi paccekaṃ sammadeva vedanasīlo

original: katāti veditabbaṃ. Pākaṭaṃ karontoti vibhūtaṃ karonto, sabbaso vibhāventoti attho.
analyzed: katā ati veditabbam pākaṭam karonto ti vibhūtam karonto sabbasas vibhāvento ti attho

original: Pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ vibhāvanaṃ tattha asammuyhanaṃ ñāṇeneva nesaṃ pavattanena hotīti dassento
analyzed: pākaṭīkaraṇam vibhāvanam tattha a sammuyhanam ñāṇena iva nesam pavattanena hoti iti dassento

original: Saṃvaroti sati, vīriyampi vā. Tāya satiyāti yā ānāpāne ārabbha pavattā sati, tāya.
analyzed: saṃvaroti sati vīriyam pi vā tāya satiyā ati yā āna apāne ārabbha pavattā sati tāya

original: Tena manasikārenāti yo so tattha satipubbaṅgamo bhāvanāmanasikāro, tena saddhinti

analyzed: sikkhananti adhippetam

original: Sāraddheti sadarathe sapariḷāhe. Adhimattanti balavaṃ oḷārikaṃ. Liṅgavipallāsena

original: te sabbepi vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhimicchantiyeva. “Apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro
analyzed: te sabbe api vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhim icchantiyā iva a pariggahita kāle pavatta kāya saṅkhāro

original: pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhatī”ti idaṃ sadisasantānatāya vuttaṃ. Na hi te eva oḷārikā
analyzed: pariggahita kāle paṭippassambhati iti idam sadisa santāna tāya vuttam na hi te eva oḷārikā

original: assāsādayo sukhumā honti. Passambhanākāro pana nesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
analyzed: assa asa ādayaḥ sukhumāḥ honti passambhana ākāraḥ pana nesam heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yeva

original: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: mahābhūta pariggahe sukhumaḥ ti catu dhātu mukhena vipassanā abhinivesam sandhāya vuttam

original: Sakalarūpapariggahe sukhumo bhāvanāya uparūpari paṇītabhāvato. Tenevāha “rūpārūpapariggahe
analyzed: sakala rūpa pariggahe bhāvanāya upari upari paṇīta bhāvataḥ tena iva āha rūpa arūpa pariggahe

original: sukhumo”ti. Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāti kalāpasammasanamāha. Nibbidānupassanato
analyzed: sukhumaḥ ti lakkhaṇa ārammaṇika vipassanā ti kalāpa sammasanam āha nibbida anupassanato

original: paṭṭhāya balavavipassanā. Tato oraṃ dubbalavipassanā. Pubbe vuttanayenāti “apariggahitakāle”tiādinā
analyzed: paṭṭhāya balava vipassanā tatas oram dubbala vipassanā pubbe vutta nayena ati apariggahita kāla iti ādinā

original: samathanaye vuttena nayena “apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro mahābhūtapariggahe paṭippassambhatī”tiādinā
analyzed: samatha naye vuttena nayena a pariggahe pavattaḥ kāya saṅkhāraḥ mahābhūta pariggahe paṭippassambhati iti ādinā

original: vipassanānayepi paṭippassaddhi yojetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vipassanā naye pi paṭippassaddhi yojetabbā iti vuttam hoti

original: Assāti imassa “passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti padassa. Codanāsodhanāhīti anuyogaparihārehi. Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena.
analyzed: assa ati imassa kāya saṅkhāranti padassa anuyoga parihārehi evam ti idāni vuccamāna ākārena

original: Kathanti yaṃ idaṃ “passambhayaṃ…pe… sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena
analyzed: katham ti yam idam sikkhati iti vuttam tam katham kena pakārena

original: kāyasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ, yogino ca sikkhanaṃ hotīti kathetukamyatāya pucchitvā
analyzed: kāya saṅkhārassa passambhanam yogino ca sikkhanam hoti iti kathetu kamyatāya pucchitvā

original: kāyasaṅkhāre sarūpato, oḷārikasukhumato, vūpasamato, anuyogaparihārato ca dassetuṃ
analyzed: kāya saṅkhāre sarūpataḥ oḷārika sukhumataḥ vūpasamataḥ anuyoga parihārato ca dassetuṃ

original: “katame kāyasaṅkhārā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha kāyikāti rūpakāye bhavā. Kāyapaṭibaddhāti
analyzed: katame kāya saṅkhārā ati ādi āraddham tattha kāyikā ati rūpa kāye bhavā kāya paṭibaddhā ati

original: kāyasannissitā. Kāye sati honti, asati na honti, tato eva te akāyasamuṭṭhānāpi kāyena
analyzed: kāya sannissitā kāye sati honti asati na honti tatas eva te a kāya samuṭṭhānā api kāyena

original: saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā. Passambhentoti oḷārikoḷārikaṃ passambhento. Sesapadadvayaṃ
analyzed: saṅkharīyanti iti kāya saṅkhārā passambhento ti oḷārika uḷārikam sesa pada dvayam

original: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Oḷārikañhi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ avūpasantasabhāvaṃ sannisīdāpento “passambhento”ti
analyzed: tassa iva vevacanam oḷārikam hi kāya saṅkhāram a vūpasanta sabhāvam sannisīdāpento passambhento ti

original: vuccati, anuppādanirodhaṃ pāpento “nirodhento”ti, suṭṭhu santasabhāvaṃ nayanto “vūpasamento”ti.
analyzed: vuccati anuppāda nirodham pāpentaḥ nirodhentaḥ ti suṭṭhu santa sa bhāvam nayantaḥ vūpasamentaḥ iti

original: Yathārūpehīti yādisehi. Kāyasaṅkhārehīti oḷārikehi kāyasaṅkhārehi. Ānamanāti abhimukhabhāvena
analyzed: yathārūpehi iti yādisehi kāya saṅkhārehi iti oḷārikehi kāya saṅkhārehi abhimukha bhāvena

original: kāyassa namanā. Vinamanāti visuṃ visuṃ passato namanā. Sannamanāti sabbato, suṭṭhu
analyzed: kāyassa namanā vinamanā ati visum visum passataḥ namanā sannamanā ati sabbatas suṭṭhu

original: vā namanā. Paṇamanāti pacchato namanā. Iñjanādīni ānamanādīnaṃ vevacanāni, adhimattāni
analyzed: vā namanā paṇamanā ati pacchatas namanā iñjana ādīni ānamana ādīnam vevacanāni adhimattāni

original: vā abhimukhaṃ calanādīni ānamanādayo, mandāni iñjanādayo. Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti
analyzed: vā abhimukham calana ādīni ānamana ādayaḥ mandāni iñjana ādayaḥ

original: tathārūpaṃ ānamanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: tathārūpam ānamana ādīnam kāraṇa bhūtam oḷārikam kāya saṅkhāram tasmin

original: hi passambhite ānamanādayopi passambhitā eva honti.
analyzed: hi passambhite ānamana ādayaḥ pi passambhitāḥ eva honti

original: Santaṃ sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa aparipphandanahetūhi ānamanādayo
analyzed: santam sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāya saṅkhārehi kāyassa a paripphandana hetūhi ānamana ādayaḥ

original: na honti, tathārūpaṃ darathābhāvato santaṃ, anoḷārikatāya sukhumaṃ. Passambhayaṃ
analyzed: na honti tathārūpam darathā bhāvataḥ santam anoḷārika tāya sukhumam passambhayam

original: kāyasaṅkhāranti sāmaññato ekaṃ katvā vadati. Atha vā pubbe oḷārikoḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
analyzed: kāya saṅkhāranti sāmaññataḥ ekam katvā vadati atha vā pubbe oḷārika uḷārikam kāya saṅkhāram

original: paṭippassambhento anukkamena kāyassa aparipphandanahetubhūte sukhumasukhumatare uppādetvā
analyzed: paṭippassambhentaḥ anukkamena kāyassa a paripphandana hetu bhūte sukhuma sukhumatare uppādetvā

original: tepi paṭippassambhetvā paramasukhumatāya koṭippattaṃ yaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambheti,
analyzed: te api paṭippassambhetvā parama sukhumatāya koṭippattam yam kāya saṅkhāram paṭippassambheti

original: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti.
analyzed: tam sandhāya vuttam santam sukhumam passambhayam kāya saṅkhāran ti

original: Itītiādi codakavacanaṃ. Tattha itīti pakāratthe nipāto. Kirāti arucisūcane, evaṃ
analyzed: iti iti ādi codaka vacanam tattha iti iti pakāra atthe nipātaḥ kirāti aruci sūcane evam

original: ceti attho. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – vuttappakārena yadi atisukhumampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
analyzed: ca iti atthaḥ ayam ha ittha adhippāyaḥ vutta ppakārena yadi ati sukhumam pi kāya saṅkhāram

original: passambhetīti. Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sati tayā vuttākāre labbhamāne. Vātūpaladdhiyāti
analyzed: passambheti iti evam santā iti evam sati tayā vutta ākāre labbhamāne vātu upaladdhiyā ati

original: vātassa upaladdhiyā. Ca-saddo samuccayattho, assāsādivātārammaṇassa cittassa pabhāvanā
analyzed: vātassa upaladdhiyā ca saddo samuccaya ttho assāsa ādi vāta ārammaṇassa cittassa pabhāvanā

original: uppādanā pavattanā na hoti, te ca tena passambhetabbāti adhippāyo. Assāsapassāsānañca
analyzed: uppādanā pavattanā na hoti te ca tena passambhetabbā ati adhippāyaḥ assāsa passāsānam ca

original: bhāvanāti oḷārike assāsapassāse bhāvanāya paṭippassambhetvā sukhumānaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvanā
analyzed: bhāvanā ti oḷārike assāsa passāse bhāvanāya paṭippassambhetvā sukhumānam tesam pabhāvanā

original: ca na hoti, ubhayesaṃ tesaṃ tena paṭippassambhetabbato. Ānāpānassatiyāti ānāpānārammaṇāya
analyzed: ca na hoti ubhayesam tesam tena paṭippassambhetabbataḥ āna apāna satiyā ati āna apāna ārammaṇāya

original: satiyā ca pavattanaṃ na hoti, ānāpānānaṃ abhāvato. Tato eva taṃsampayuttassa ānāpānassatisamādhissa
analyzed: satiyāḥ ca pavattanam na hoti āna apānānam abhāvato tatas eva tad sampayuttassa āna apāna sati samādhissa

original: ca pabhāvanā uppādanāpi na hoti. Na hi kadāci ārammaṇena vinā sārammaṇadhammā sambhavanti.
analyzed: ca pabhāvanā uppādanā api na hoti na hi kadāci ārammaṇena vinā sa ārammaṇa dhammā sambhavanti

original: Na ca naṃ tanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ. Taṃ vuttavidhānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā paññavanto
analyzed: na ca naṃ tanti ettha nanti nipāta mattam tam vutta vidhānam samāpattim paṇḍitā paññavanto

original: na ceva samāpajjantipi tato na vuṭṭhahantipīti yojanā. Evaṃ codako sabbena sabbaṃ
analyzed: na ca iva samāpajjanti pi tatas na vuṭṭhahanti pi iti yojanā evam ca udakaḥ sabbena sabbam

original: abhāvūpanayanaṃ passambhananti adhippāyena codeti.
analyzed: abhāva upanayanam adhippāyena codeti

original: Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā. Tattha kirāti “yadī”ti etassa
analyzed: puna iti kirāti ādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā tattha kirāti yadi iti etassa

original: atthe nipāto. Iti kira sikkhati, mayā vuttākārena yadi sikkhatīti attho. Evaṃ santeti
analyzed: atthe nipātaḥ iti kira sikkhati mayā vutta ākārena yadi sikkhati iti atthaḥ evam santā iti

original: evaṃ passambhane sati. Pabhāvanā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti,
analyzed: evam passambhane sati pabhāvanā hoti iti yadi api oḷārikā kāya saṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti

original: sukhumā pana atthevāti anukkamena paramasukhumabhāvappattassa vasena nimittuppattiyā
analyzed: sukhumā pana atthā iva ati anukkamena parama sukhuma bhāva pattassa vasena nimitta uppattiyā

original: ānāpānassatiyā, ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā ijjhatevāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ānāpānassatiyāḥ ānāpānassati samādhissa ca pabhāvanā ijjha tā iva ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Yathā kathaṃ viyāti yathāvuttavidhānaṃ taṃ kathaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ, atthi kiñci tadatthasampaṭipādane
analyzed: yathā katham viya iti yathā vutta vidhānam tam katham viya daṭṭhabbam atthi kiñci tad attha sampaṭipādane

original: opammanti adhippāyo. Idāni opammaṃ dassetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha seyyathāpīti
analyzed: opammam ti adhippāyaḥ idāni opammam dassetum seyyathāpi itiādi vuttam tattha seyyathāpi iti

original: opammatthe nipāto. Kaṃseti kaṃsabhājane. Nimittanti nimittassa, tesaṃ saddānaṃ pavattākārassāti
analyzed: opamma atthe nipātaḥ kaṃsa iti kaṃsa bhājane nimittam ti nimittassa tesam saddānam pavatta ākārassa ati

original: attho. Sāmiatthe hi idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Suggahitattāti suṭṭhu gahitattā. Sumanasikatattāti
analyzed: attho sāmi atthe hi idam upayoga vacanam su gahita ttā ati suṭṭhu gahita ttā su manasikata ttā ati

original: suṭṭhu citte ṭhapitattā. Sūpadhāritattāti sammadeva upadhāritattā sallakkhitattā.
analyzed: suṭṭhu citte ṭhapita ttā su upadhārita ttā ati sammad eva upadhārita ttā sallakkhita ttā

original: Sukhumakā saddāti anurave āha, ye appakā. Appattho hi ayaṃ ka-saddo. Sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇatāpīti
analyzed: sukhumakā saddā iti anurave āha ye appakāḥ appatthaḥ hi ayam ka saddaḥ sukhuma sadda nimitta ārammaṇa tā api iti

original: sukhumo saddova nimittaṃ sukhumasaddanimittaṃ, tadārammaṇatāyapi. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti?
analyzed: nimittam sukhuma sadda nimittam kim vuttam hoti

original: Kāmaṃ tadāsukhumāpi saddā niruddhā, saddanimittassa pana suggahitattā sukhumatarasaddanimittārammaṇabhāvenāpi
analyzed: kāmam tadā asukhumā api saddāḥ niruddhā sadda nimittassa pana suggahita ttā sukhumatara sadda nimitta ārammaṇa bhāvena api

original: cittaṃ pavattati. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi tassa tassa niruddhassa saddassa nimittaṃ avikkhittena
analyzed: cittam pavattati āditaḥ paṭṭhāya hi tassa tassa niruddhassa saddassa nimittam a vikkhittena

original: cittena upadhārentassa anukkamena pariyosāne atisukhumasaddanimittampi ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: cittena upadhārentassa anukkamena pariyosāne ati sukhuma sadda nimittam pi ārammaṇam

original: katvā cittaṃ pavattateva. Cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati tasmiṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte
analyzed: katvā cittam pavattate iva cittam na vikkhepam gacchati tasmim yathā upaṭṭhite nimitte

original: samādhānasabbhāvato.
analyzed: samādhāna sabbhāvataḥ

original: Evaṃ santetiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Tattha yassa suttapadassa
analyzed: evam santā iti ādi vuttassa iva atthassa nigamana vasena vuttam tattha yassa sutta padassa

original: saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi attho vutto, taṃ uddharitvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānāni vibhāgato
analyzed: saddhim codanā sodhanāhi atthaḥ vuttaḥ tam uddharitvā kāya anupassanā sati paṭṭhānāni vibhāgato

original: dassetuṃ “passambhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayattā uttānameva.
analyzed: dassetum passambhayanti ādi vuttam tat sabbam vutta naya ttā uttānam eva

original: 222. Ādikammikassa kammaṭṭhānavasenāti samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vipassanaṃ
analyzed: ādikammikassa kammaṭṭhāna vasena āti samatha kammaṭṭhānam sandhāya vuttam vipassanam

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana itaracatukkesupi labbhateva. Etthāti paṭhamacatukke. Pañcasandhikanti
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam pana itara catukkesu pi labbhateva ettha ati paṭhama catukke pañca sandhikanti

original: pañcapabbaṃ, pañcabhāganti attho.
analyzed: pañca pabbam pañca bhāgam ti atthaḥ

original: Kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhananti kammaṭṭhānaganthassa uggaṇhanaṃ. Tadatthaparipucchā kammaṭṭhānassa
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhananti kammaṭṭhāna ganthassa uggaṇhanam tad attha paripucchā kammaṭṭhānassa

original: paripucchanā. Atha vā ganthato, atthato ca kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanaṃ uggaho. Tattha
analyzed: paripucchanā atha vā ganthataḥ atthataḥ ca kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanam uggahaḥ tattha

original: saṃsayaparipucchanā paripucchā. Kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānanti nimittupaṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ
analyzed: saṃsaya paripucchanā paripucchā kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānan ti nimitta upaṭṭhānam evam

original: bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa “evamidha nimittaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti upadhāraṇaṃ, tathā kammaṭṭhānappanā
analyzed: bhāvanam anuyuñjantassa evam idha nimittam upaṭṭhāti iti upadhāraṇam tathā kammaṭṭhāna ppanā

original: “evaṃ jhānamappetī”ti. Kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇanti gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena
analyzed: evam jhānam appeti iti kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇan ti gaṇanā anubandhana āphusanānam vasena

original: bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāya sampatti, tato parampi vā sallakkhaṇādivasena matthakappattīti
analyzed: bhāvanam ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāya sampatti tatas param pi vā sat lakkhaṇa ādi vasena matthaka ppatti iti

original: kammaṭṭhānasabhāvassa sallakkhaṇaṃ. Tenāha “kammaṭṭhānasabhāvūpadhāraṇanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna sabhāvassa sat lakkhaṇam tena āha kammaṭṭhāna sabhāva upadhāraṇam ti vuttam hoti iti

original: Attanāpi na kilamati odhiso kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanato. Tato eva ācariyampi na viheseti
analyzed: attanā api na kilamati odhiso kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanato tatas eva ācariyam pi na viheseti

original: dhammādhikaraṇampi bhāvanāya matthakaṃ pāpanato. Tasmāti taṃ nimittaṃ attano akilamanaācariyāvihesanahetu.
analyzed: dhamma adhikaraṇam pi bhāvanāya matthakam tasmā ati tam nimittam attanaḥ a kilamana ācariyā vihesana hetu

original: Thokanti thokaṃ thokaṃ. Uggahetabbato uggaho, sabbopi kammaṭṭhānavidhi, na pubbe
analyzed: thokanti thokam thokan uggahetabbataḥ uggahaḥ sabbaḥ api kammaṭṭhāna vidhi na pubbe

original: vuttauggahamattaṃ. Ācariyato uggaho ācariyuggaho, tato. Ekapadampīti ekakoṭṭhāsampi.
analyzed: vutta oggaha mattam ācariyataḥ uggahaḥ ācariyuggaho tatas eka padam pi iti eka koṭṭhāsam pi

original: 223. Anuvahanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anupavattanā.
analyzed: anuvahanā ati assāsa passāsānam anugamana vasena satiyāḥ nirantaram anupavattanā

original: Phusanāti assāsapassāse gaṇentassa gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhantassa
analyzed: assāsa passāse gaṇentassa gaṇanam paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhantassa

original: yathā appanā hoti, tathā cittaṃ ṭhapentassa ca nāsikaggādiṭṭhānassa nesaṃ phusanā.
analyzed: yathā appanā hoti tathā cittam ṭhapentassa ca nāsikagga ādiṭṭhānassa na īsam phusanā

original: Yasmā pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi, phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
analyzed: yasmā pana gaṇanā ādi vasena viya phusanā vasena visum manasikāraḥ na atthi phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭhānā iya iva

original: gaṇanādi kātabbanti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti
analyzed: gaṇanā ādi kātabbanti dassetum idha phusanā gahaṇam ti dīpentaḥ phusanā ati phuṭṭha ṭhānam ti

original: āha. Ṭhapanāti samādhānaṃ. Taṃ hi sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa ādhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ hoti.
analyzed: āha ṭhapana ati samādhānam tam hi sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa ādhānam ṭhapanam hoti

original: Tathā hi samādhi “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhitī”ti niddiṭṭho. Samādhippadhānā pana appanāti
analyzed: tathā hi samādhi cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti iti niddiṭṭhaḥ samādhi ppadhānā pana appanā ti

original: āha “ṭhapanāti appanā”ti. Aniccatādīnaṃ sallakkhaṇato sallakkhaṇā vipassanā. Pavattato,
analyzed: āha ṭhapanā ti appanā ti anicca tā ādīnam sat lakkhaṇataḥ sat lakkhaṇā vipassanā pavattato

original: nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato vivaṭṭanā nāma maggo. Sakalasaṃkilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvato
analyzed: nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanataḥ vivaṭṭanā nāma maggo sakala saṃkilesa paṭippassaddhi bhāvato

original: sabbaso suddhīti pārisuddhi phalaṃ. Tesanti vivaṭṭanāpārisuddhīnaṃ. Paṭipassanāti
analyzed: sabbaso suddhī iti pārisuddhi phalam tesan ti vivaṭṭanā pārisuddhīnam paṭipassanā ati

original: paṭi paṭi dassanaṃ pekkhanaṃ. Tenāha “paccavekkhaṇā”ti.
analyzed: paṭi paṭi dassanam pekkhanam tena āha paccavekkhaṇā ti

original: Khaṇḍanti ekaṃ tīṇi pañcāti evaṃ gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ. Okāseti gaṇanavidhiṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: khaṇḍanti ekam tīṇi pañca ati evam gaṇanāya khaṇḍanam okāsa iti gaṇana vidhim sandhāya āha

original: Gaṇananissitova na kammaṭṭhānanissito. “Sikhāppattaṃ nu kho”ti idaṃ cirataraṃ gaṇanāya
analyzed: gaṇana nissitaḥ iva na kammaṭṭhāna nissitaḥ sikhā pattam nu khalu iti idam cirataram gaṇanāya

original: manasi karontassa vasena vuttaṃ. So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ
analyzed: manasi karontassa vasena vuttam so hi tathā laddham avikkhepa mattam nissāya evam

original: maññeyya. “Assāsapassāsesu yo upaṭṭhāti, taṃ gahetvā”ti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa
analyzed: maññeyya assāsa passāsesu yaḥ upaṭṭhāti tam gahetvā iti idam assāsa passāsesu yassa

original: ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yassa pana ubhopi upaṭṭhahanti, tena
analyzed: ekaḥ iva paṭhamam upaṭṭhāti tam sandhāya vuttam yassa pana ubho api upaṭṭhahanti tena

original: ubhayampi gahetvā gaṇetabbaṃ. “Yo upaṭṭhātī”ti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭataro
analyzed: ubhayam pi gahetvā gaṇetabbam yaḥ upaṭṭhāti iti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭa vātesu yo pākaṭataro

original: upaṭṭhāti, so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pavattamānaṃ pavattamānanti
analyzed: upaṭṭhāti so gahetabbaḥ ti ayam pi atthaḥ dīpitaḥ iti daṭṭhabbam pavattamānam pavattamānam

original: āmeḍitavacanena nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Evanti vuttappakārena
analyzed: āmeḍita vacanena nirantaram assāsa passāsānam upalakkhaṇam dasseti evam ti vutta ppakārena

original: upalakkhetvā vāti attho. Pākaṭā honti gaṇanāvasena bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato.
analyzed: upalakkhetvā vā ti atthaḥ pākaṭāḥ honti gaṇanā vasena bahiddhā vikkhepa abhāvato

original: Palighassa parivattanaṃ, taṃ yattha nikkhipanti, so palighatthambho. Tiyāmarattinti
analyzed: palighassa parivattanam tam yattha nikkhipanti saḥ palighatthambhaḥ

original: accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Purimanayenāti sīghagaṇanāya, gopālakagaṇanāyāti attho.
analyzed: a c c anta saṃyoge upayoga vacanam purima nayena ati sīgha gaṇanāya gopālaka gaṇanāya ati attho

original: Eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañcāti gaṇanāvidhidassanaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhātiādīsupi ekato paṭṭhāyeva
analyzed: ekaḥ dve tīṇi cattāri pañca ati gaṇanā vidhi dassanam tasmai aṭṭha ati ādīsu pi ekatas paṭṭhāya iva

original: paccekaṃ aṭṭhādīni pāpetabbāni. Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbameva. Kasmāti tattha kāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: paccekam aṭṭha ādīni pāpetabbāni sīgham sīgham gaṇetabbam eva kasmā ati tattha kāraṇam

original: nidassanañca dasseti “gaṇanapaṭibaddhe hī”tiādinā. Tattha arīyati tena nāvāti arittaṃ,
analyzed: nidassanam ca dasseti gaṇana paṭibaddhe hi itiādinā tattha arīyati tena na avāti arittam

original: pājanadaṇḍo. Arittena upatthambhanaṃ arittupatthambhanaṃ, tassa vasena.
analyzed: pājana daṇḍaḥ arittena upatthambhanam aritta upatthambhanam tassa vasena

original: Nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyamevāti āha “nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ viyā”ti.
analyzed: nippariyāyataḥ nirantarappavatti nāma āha nirantaram pavattam viyāti

original: Anto pavisantaṃ vātaṃ manasi karonto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma. Bahi cittanīharaṇepi
analyzed: antar pavisantam vātam manasi karontaḥ antar cittam paveseti nāma bahi citta nīharaṇe pi

original: eseva nayo. Vātabbhāhatanti abbhantaragataṃ vātaṃ bahulaṃ manasi karontassa vātena
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ abbhantara gatam vātam bahulam manasi karontassa vātena

original: taṃ ṭhānaṃ abbhāhataṃ viya, medena pūritaṃ viya ca hoti, tathā upaṭṭhāti. Nīharato
analyzed: tam ṭhānam abbhāhatam viya medena pūritam viya ca hoti tathā upaṭṭhāti nīharataḥ

original: phuṭṭhokāsaṃ muñcitvā, tathā pana nīharato vātassa gatisamannesanamukhena nānārammaṇesu
analyzed: phuṭṭha ukāsam muñcitvā tathā pana nīharataḥ vātassa gati samannesana mukhena nānā ārammaṇesu

original: cittaṃ vidhāvatīti āha “puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipatī”ti.
analyzed: cittam vidhāvati iti āha puthutta ārammaṇe cittam vikkhipati iti

original: Etanti etaṃ assāsapassāsajātaṃ.
analyzed: etam ti etam assāsa passāsa jātam

original: 224. Anugamananti pavattapavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena satiyā
analyzed: anugamanam ti pavatta pavattānam assāsa passāsānam ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena satiyā

original: anu anu pavattanaṃ anugacchanaṃ. Tenevāha “tañca kho na ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasenā”ti.
analyzed: anu anu pavattanam anugacchanam tena iva āha tat ca kho na ādi majjha pariyosāna anugamana vasena ati

original: Nābhi ādi tattha paṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. Paṭhamuppattivasena hi idha ādicintā, na uppattimattavasena.
analyzed: ādi tattha paṭhamam uppajjanataḥ paṭhama uppatti vasena hi idha ādi cintā na uppattimatta vasena

original: Tathā hi te nābhito paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva. Yattha yattha
analyzed: tathā hi te nābhitaḥ paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva yattha yattha

original: ca uppajjanti, tattha tattheva bhijjanti dhammānaṃ gamanābhāvato. Yathāpaccayaṃ pana
analyzed: ca uppajjanti tattha tattha iva bhijjanti dhammānam gamana abhāvataḥ yathāpaccayam pana

original: desantaruppattiyaṃ gatisamaññā. Hadayaṃ majjhanti hadayasamīpaṃ tassa uparibhāgo
analyzed: desantara uppattiyam gati samaññā hadayam majjhanti hadaya samīpam tassa upari bhāgaḥ

original: majjhaṃ. Nāsikaggaṃ pariyosānanti nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ tassa pariyosānaṃ assāsapassāsasamaññāya
analyzed: majjham nāsikaggam pariyosānanti nāsika ṭṭhānam tassa pariyosānam assāsa passāsa samaññāya

original: tadavadhibhāvato. Tathā hete “cittasamuṭṭhānā”ti vuttā, na ca bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
analyzed: tad avadhi bhāvato tathā ha ete citta samuṭṭhānā ati vuttā na ca bahiddhā

original: sambhavo atthi. Tenāha “abbhantaraṃ pavisanavātassa nāsikaggaṃ ādī”ti. Pavisananikkhamanapariyāyo
analyzed: sambhavaḥ atthi tena āha abbhantaram pavisana vātassa nāsikaggam ādi iti pavisana nikkhamana pariyāyaḥ

original: pana taṃsadisavasena vuttoti veditabbo. Vikkhepagatanti vikkhepaṃ upagataṃ, vikkhittaṃ
analyzed: pana tad sadisa vasena vuttaḥ ti veditabbaḥ vikkhepa gatanti vikkhepam upagatam vikkhittam

original: asamāhitanti attho. Sāraddhāyāti sadarathabhāvāya. Iñjanāyāti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa calanāya.
analyzed: asamāhitam ti attho sāraddhāya ati sadaratha bhāvāya iñjanāya ati kammaṭṭhāna manasikārassa calanāya

original: Vikkhepagatena cittenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe vā. Sāraddhāti sadarathā. Iñjitāti iñjanakā calanakā. Tathā phanditā.
analyzed: vikkhepa gatena cittena ati hetumhi karaṇa vacanam ittham bhūta lakkhaṇe vā sāraddhā ati sadarathā iñjitā ati iñjanakā calanakā tathā phanditā

original: Ādimajjhapariyosānavasenāti ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasena na manasi kātabbanti
analyzed: ādi majjha pariyosāna vasena ati ādi majjha pariyosāna anugamana vasena na manasi kātabbanti

original: sambandho. “Anubandhanāya manasi karontena phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi
analyzed: sambandhaḥ anubandhanāya manasi karontena phusanā vasena ca ṭhapanā vasena ca manasi

original: kātabba”nti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, taṃ vivarituṃ “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viyā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: kātabbam ti yena adhippāyena vuttam tam vivaritum gaṇanā anubandhanā vasena viya iti ādim āha

original: Tattha visuṃ manasikāro natthīti gaṇanāya, anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamaṃ kevalaṃ
analyzed: tattha visum manasikāraḥ natthi iti gaṇanāya anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamam kevalam

original: phusanāvasena, ṭhapanāvasena ca kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro natthi. Nanu phusanāya vinā
analyzed: phusanā vasena ṭhapanā vasena ca kammaṭṭhāna manasikāro natthi nanu phusanāya vinā

original: ṭhapanāya viya, phusanāya vinā gaṇanāyapi manasikāro natthiyeva? Yadipi natthi, gaṇanā
analyzed: manasikāraḥ manasikāro yadi api natthi gaṇanā

original: pana yathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetabbā, evaṃ anubandhanā
analyzed: pana yathā kammaṭṭhāna manasikārassa mūla bhāvataḥ padhāna bhāvena gahetabbā evam anubandhanā

original: ṭhapanāya, tāya vinā ṭhapanāya asambhavato. Tasmā satipi phusanāya nānantarikabhāve
analyzed: tāya vinā tasmā satipi phusanāya na ānantarika bhāve

original: gaṇanānubandhanā eva mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetvā itarāsaṃ tadabhāvaṃ dassento
analyzed: gaṇanā anubandhanāḥ eva mūla bhāvataḥ padhāna bhāvena gahetvā itarāsam tad abhāvam dassento

original: āha “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthī”ti.
analyzed: āha gaṇanā anubandhanā vasena viya hi phusanā ṭhapanā vasena visum manasikāraḥ natthi iti

original: Yadi evaṃ tā kasmā uddese visuṃ gahitāti āha “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyevā”tiādi. Tattha
analyzed: yadi evam tā kasmai uddese visum gahitā iti āha phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭṭhāneyā iva atiādi tattha

original: “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento”ti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti. Tenāha
analyzed: phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭṭhāne iya iva gaṇento ti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti tena āha

original: “gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karotī”ti. Tatthevāti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva.
analyzed: gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karoti iti tattha iva ati phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭhānā iya iva

original: Teti assāsapassāse. Satiyā anubandhantoti gaṇanāvīthiṃ anugantvā satiyā nibandhanto,
analyzed: te iti assāsa passāse satiyā anubandhantaḥ ti gaṇanā vīthim anugantvā satiyā nibandhantaḥ

original: phuṭṭhokāseyeva te nirantaraṃ upadhārentoti attho. Appanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapentoti
analyzed: te nirantaram upadhārento ti attho appanā vasena cittam ṭhapentoti

original: yathā appanā hoti, evaṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapento samādahanto. Anubandhanāya
analyzed: yathā appanā hoti evam yathā upaṭṭhite nimitte cittam ṭhapentaḥ samādahantaḥ anubandhanāya

original: cātiādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccatīti yojanā.
analyzed: cāti ādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karoti iti vuccati iti yojanā

original: Svāyamatthoti yvāyaṃ “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento, tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā
analyzed: su ayam attho ti yvā ayam phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭhāneyā iva gaṇento tattha iva gaṇanam paṭisaṃharitvā

original: te satiyā anubandhanto”ti ca vutto, so ayamattho. Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchināti,
analyzed: te satiyā anubandhanto ti ca vutto saḥ ayam attho yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchināti

original: sā mānassa samīpeti upamā yathā “goṇo viya gavayo”ti.
analyzed: sā mānassa samīpā iti upamā yathā goṇaḥ viya gavayā iti

original: 225. Paṅguḷoti pīṭhasappī. Dolā pekholo. Kīḷatanti kīḷantānaṃ. Mātāputtānanti attano
analyzed: paṅguḷaḥ ti pīṭhasappī dolā pekholaḥ kīḷatanti kīḷantānam mātā puttānam ti attano

original: bhariyāya, puttassa ca. Ubho koṭiyoti āgacchantassa purimakoṭiṃ, gacchantassa pacchimakoṭinti
analyzed: bhariyāya puttassa ca ubho koṭiyo ti āgacchantassa purima koṭim gacchantassa pacchima koṭim ti

original: dvepi koṭiyo. Majjhanti dolāphalakasseva majjhaṃ. Upanibandhanathambho viyāti upanibandhanathambho,
analyzed: dve api koṭiyaḥ majjhanti dolā phalakassa iva majjham upanibandhana thambhaḥ viyāti upanibandhana thambhaḥ

original: nāsikaggaṃ, mukhanimittaṃ vā, tassa mūle samīpe ṭhatvā. Kathaṃ ṭhatvā? Satiyā vasena.
analyzed: nāsikaggam mukha nimittam vā tassa mūle samīpe ṭhatvā katham ṭhatvā satiyāḥ vasena

original: Satiñhi tattha sūpaṭṭhitaṃ karonto yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito nāma hoti, avayavadhammena
analyzed: satim hi tattha su upaṭṭhitam karontaḥ yogāvacaro tattha ṭhitaḥ nāma hoti avayava dhammena

original: samudāyassa apadisitabbato. Nimitteti nāsikaggādinimitte. Satiyā nisīdantoti sativasena
analyzed: samudāyassa apadisitabbataḥ nimitta iti nāsikagga ādi nimitte satiyā nisīdantaḥ iti sati vasena

original: nisīdanto. “Satiñhi tatthā”tiādinā ṭhāne viya vattabbaṃ. Tatthāti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: nisīdantaḥ satim hi tattha atiādinā ṭhāne viya vattabbam tattha ati phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭṭhāne

original: 226. Teti nagarassa antobahigatā manussā, tesaṃ saṅgahā ca hatthagatā.
analyzed: te ti nagarassa antar bahi gatā manussā tesam saṅgahā ca hattha gatā

original: 227. Ādito paṭṭhāyāti upameyyatthadassanato paṭṭhāya. Gāthāyaṃ nimittanti upanibandhanānimittaṃ.
analyzed: āditas paṭṭhāya ati upameyya ttha dassanataḥ paṭṭhāya gāthā ayam nimittam ti upanibandhanā nimittam

original: Anārammaṇamekacittassāti ekassa cittassa na ārammaṇaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti attho.
analyzed: anārammaṇam eka cittassa ti ekassa cittassa na ārammaṇam ārammaṇam na honti iti attho

original: Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
analyzed: a jānataḥ ca tayo dhamme iti nimittam assāso passāso ti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena

original: avindantassa. Ca-saddo byatireke. Bhāvanāti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā. Nupalabbhatīti
analyzed: avindantassa casaddaḥ byatireke bhāvanā ati āna apāna ssati samādhi bhāvanā na upalabbhati iti

original: na upalabbhati na sijjhatīti ayaṃ codanāgāthāya attho, dutiyā pana parihāragāthā suviññeyyāva.
analyzed: na upalabbhati na sijjhati iti ayam codanā gāthāya attho dutiyā pana parihāra gāthā su viññeyyā ava

original: Kathanti tāsaṃ atthaṃ vivarituṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Ime tayo dhammātiādīsu padayojanāya
analyzed: kathanti tāsam attham vivaritum kathetu kamyatā pucchāḥ ime tayaḥ dhammā ati ādīsu pada yojanāya

original: saddhiṃ ayamatthaniddeso – ime nimittādayo tayo dhammā ekacittassa kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: saddhim ayam attha niddesaḥ ime nimitta ādayaḥ tayaḥ dhammāḥ eka cittassa katham ārammaṇam

original: na honti, tathāpi na cime na ca ime tayo dhammā aviditā honti, kathaṃ na ca honti
analyzed: na honti tathā api na ca ime na ca ime tayaḥ dhammā aviditāḥ honti katham na ca honti

original: aviditā? Tesañhi aviditatte cittañca kathaṃ vikkhepaṃ na gacchati, padhānañca bhāvanāya
analyzed: tesam hi cittam ca katham vikkhepam na gacchati padhānam ca bhāvanāya

original: nipphādakaṃ vīriyañca kathaṃ paññāyati, nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ sammadeva samādhānāvahaṃ
analyzed: nipphādakam vīriyam ca katham paññāyati nīvaraṇānam vikkhambhakam sammad eva samādhāna āvaham

original: bhāvanānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ payogañca yogī kathaṃ sādheti, uparūpari lokiyalokuttarañca
analyzed: bhāvanā anuyoga saṅkhātam yogī katham sādhā iti upari upari lokiya lokuttaram ca

original: visesaṃ kathamadhigacchatīti.
analyzed: visesam katham adhigacchati iti

original: Idāni tamatthaṃ kakacūpamāya sādhetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhūmibhāgassa visamatāya
analyzed: idāni tam attham kakaca upamāya sādhetum seyyathā api itiādi vuttam bhūmi bhāgassa visama tāya

original: cañcale rukkhe chedanakiriyā na sukarā siyā, tathā ca sati kakacadantagati dubbiññeyyāti
analyzed: cañcale rukkhe chedana kiriyā na sukarā siyā tathā ca sati kakaca danta gati dubbiññeyyā ati

original: āha “same bhūmibhāge”ti. Kakacenāti khuddakena kharapattena. Tenāha “puriso”ti. Phuṭṭhakakacadantānanti
analyzed: āha same bhūmi bhāge iti ka kacena ati khuddakena khara pattena tena āha purisaḥ iti

original: phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena. Tena kakacadantehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
analyzed: phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ka kaca dantānam vasena tena ka kaca dantehi phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭṭhānā iya iva

original: purisassa satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi
analyzed: purisassa satiyāḥ upaṭṭhānam dasseti tena āha na āgate vā gate vā kakaca dante manasi

original: karotī”ti. Kakacassa ākaḍḍhanakāle purisābhimukhaṃ pavattā āgatā. Pellanakāle tato
analyzed: karoti iti kakacassa ākaḍḍhana kāle purisa abhimukham pavattā āgatā pellana kāle tatas

original: vigatā “gatā”ti vuttā. Na ca āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti sabbattha

original: nirodhānupassanā. Muñcitukamyatā hi ayaṃ balappattā. Tenāha “samudayato mocento”ti.
analyzed: nirodha anupassanā muñcitu kamya tā hi ayam bala ppattā tena āha samudayataḥ mocentā iti

original: Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Ādānatoti niccādivasena
analyzed: paṭinissajjana ākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissagga anupassanā ādānataḥ ti nicca ādi vasena

original: gahaṇato, paṭisandhiggahaṇato vāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: gahaṇataḥ paṭisandhi ggahaṇataḥ vā ti evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: 236. Aniccanti anupassī, aniccassa vā anupassanasīlo aniccānupassīti ettha kiṃ panetaṃ
analyzed: aniccanti anupassī aniccassa vā anupassana sīlaḥ anicca anupassī iti ettha kim pana etam

original: aniccaṃ, kathaṃ vā aniccaṃ, kā vā aniccānupassanā, kassa vā aniccānupassanāti catukkaṃ
analyzed: aniccam katham vā aniccam kā vā anicca anupassanā kassa vā anicca anupassanā ati catukkam

original: vibhāvetabbanti taṃ dassento “aniccaṃ veditabba”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: vibhāvetabbanti tam dassentaḥ aniccam veditabba nti ādim āha

original: Tattha niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ sassataṃ yathā taṃ nibbānaṃ, na niccanti aniccaṃ, udayabbayavantaṃ,
analyzed: tattha niccam nāma dhuvam sassatam yathā tam nibbānam na niccanti aniccam udaya bbayavantam

original: atthato saṅkhatā dhammāti āha “aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā”ti,
analyzed: atthataḥ saṅkhatāḥ dhammā ti āha aniccanti pañca kkhandhā kasmai uppāda vayaññathatta bhāvā ti

original: uppādavayaññathattasabbhāvāti attho. Tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hetupaccayehi uppajjanaṃ
analyzed: uppāda vayaññathatta sabbhāvā ti atthaḥ tattha saṅkhata dhammānam hetu paccayehi uppajjanam

original: ahutvā sambhavo attalābho uppādo. Uppannānaṃ tesaṃ khaṇanirodho vināso vayo. Jarāya
analyzed: a hutvā sambhavaḥ atta lābho uppādaḥ uppannānam tesam khaṇa nirodhaḥ vināsaḥ vayaḥ jarāya

original: aññathābhāvo aññathattaṃ. Yathā hi uppādāvatthāya bhinnāya bhaṅgāvatthāyaṃ vatthubhedo
analyzed: aññathābhāvaḥ aññathattam yathā hi uppāda avatthāya bhinnāya bhaṅga avatthā ayam vatthu bhedaḥ

original: natthi, evaṃ ṭhitisaṅkhātāya bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthāyampi vatthubhedo natthi, yattha
analyzed: natthi evam ṭhiti saṅkhātāya vatthu bhedaḥ natthi

original: jarāvohāro. Tasmā ekassāpi dhammassa jarā yujjati, yā khaṇikajarāti vuccati. Ekaṃsena
analyzed: jarā vohāraḥ tasmai ekassa api dhammassa jarā yujjati yā khaṇika jarā ati vuccati ekaṃsena

original: ca uppādabhaṅgāvatthāsu vatthuno abhedo icchitabbo, aññathā “añño uppajjati, añño
analyzed: ca uppāda bhaṅga avatthāsu vatthuno abhedaḥ icchitabbaḥ aññathā aññaḥ uppajjati aññaḥ

original: bhijjatī”ti āpajjeyya. Tayimaṃ khaṇikajaraṃ sandhāyāha “aññathatta”nti. Yaṃ panettha
analyzed: bhijjati iti āpajjeyya tayimam khaṇikajaram sandhāya āha aññathattam ti yam pana ittha

original: vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato kathayissāma.
analyzed: vattabbam tam paratas kathayissāma

original: Yassa lakkhaṇattayassa bhāvā khandhesu aniccasamaññā, tasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye aniccatāsamaññāti
analyzed: yassa lakkhaṇa ttayassa bhāvā khandhesu anicca samaññā tasmim lakkhaṇa ttaye anicca tā samaññā ati

original: “aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathatta”nti vatvā visesato dhammānaṃ khaṇikanirodhe
analyzed: anicca tā ti tesam yeva uppāda vayaññathattan ti vatvā visesataḥ dhammānam khaṇika nirodhe

original: aniccatāvohāroti dassento “hutvā abhāvo vā”tiādimāha. Tattha uppādapubbakattā abhāvassa
analyzed: anicca tā vohāraḥ ti dassentaḥ hutvā abhāvaḥ vā tiādim āha tattha uppāda pubbaka ttā abhāvassa

original: hutvāgahaṇaṃ. Tena pākabhāvapubbakattaṃ vināsabhāvassa dasseti. Tenevākārenāti nibbattanākāreneva.
analyzed: hutvā gahaṇam tena pāka bhāva pubbaka ttam vināsa bhāvassa dasseti tena iva ākārena ati nibbattana ākārena iva

original: Khaṇabhaṅgenāti khaṇikanirodhena. Tassā aniccatāyāti khaṇikabhaṅgasaṅkhātāya aniccatāya.
analyzed: khaṇa bhaṅgena ati khaṇika nirodhena tassāḥ anicca tāya ati khaṇika bhaṅga saṅkhātāya anicca tāya

original: Tāya anupassanāyāti yathāvuttāya aniccānupassanāya. Samannāgatoti samaṅgibhūto yogāvacaro.
analyzed: tāya anupassanāya ati yathā vuttāya anicca anupassanāya samannāgataḥ ti samaṅgi bhūtaḥ yogāvacaraḥ

original: Khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso, virajjanaṃ tesaṃyeva vilujjanaṃ virāgo, khayo eva virāgo
analyzed: vināsaḥ virajjanam virāgaḥ eva virāgaḥ

original: khayavirāgo, khaṇikanirodho. Accantamettha etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārā virajjanti nirujjhantīti
analyzed: khaya virāgaḥ khaṇika nirodhaḥ etasmin adhigate saṅkhārāḥ virajjanti nirujjhanti iti

original: accantavirāgo, nibbānaṃ. Tenāha “khayavirāgo saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgo, accantavirāgo
analyzed: nibbānam tena āha khaya virāgo saṅkhārānam khaṇa bhaṅgo accanta virāgo

original: nibbāna”nti. Tadubhayavasena pavattāti khayavirāgānupassanāvasena vipassanāya, accantavirāgānupassanāvasena
analyzed: nibbānanti tad ubhaya vasena pavattā ati khaya virāga anupassanā vasena vipassanāya accanta virāga anupassanā vasena

original: maggassa pavatti yojetabbā. Ārammaṇato vā vipassanāya khayavirāgānupassanāvasena
analyzed: maggassa pavatti yojetabbā ārammaṇataḥ vā vipassanāya khaya virāga anupassanā vasena

original: pavatti, tanninnabhāvato accantavirāgānupassanāvasena, maggassa pana asammohato khayavirāgānupassanāvasena,
analyzed: pavatti tad ninna bhāvataḥ accanta virāga anupassanā vasena maggassa pana asammohataḥ khaya virāga anupassanā vasena

original: ārammaṇato accantavirāgānupassanāvasena pavatti veditabbā. “Eseva nayo”ti iminā yasmā
analyzed: ārammaṇataḥ accanta virāga anupassanā vasena pavatti veditabbā esā iva nayo ti iminā yasmā

original: virāgānupassī-pade vuttanayānusārena “dve nirodhā khayanirodho ca accantanirodho
analyzed: virāga anupassī pade vutta naya anusārena dve nirodhā khaya nirodho ca accanta nirodho

original: cā”ti evamādiatthavaṇṇanaṃ atidisati, tasmā virāgaṭṭhāne nirodhapadaṃ pakkhipitvā
analyzed: ca ati evamādi attha vaṇṇanam atidisati tasmai virāga ṭṭhāne nirodha padam pakkhipitvā

original: “khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tassa atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā.
analyzed: khayaḥ saṅkhārānam vināsaḥ tiādinā idha vutta nayena tassa attha vaṇṇanā veditabbā

original: Paṭinissajjanaṃ pahātabbassa tadaṅgavasena vā samucchedavasena vā pariccajanaṃ pariccāgapaṭinissaggo.
analyzed: paṭinissajjanam pahātabbassa tad aṅga vasena vā samuccheda vasena vā pariccajanam pariccāga paṭinissaggaḥ

original: Tathā sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggabhūte visaṅkhāre attano nissajjanaṃ, tanninnatāya
analyzed: tathā sabba upadhīnam paṭinissagga bhūte visaṅkhāre attanaḥ nissajjanam tad ninna tāya

original: vā tadārammaṇatāya vā tattha pakkhandanaṃ pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo.
analyzed: vā tad ārammaṇa tāya vā tattha pakkhandanam pakkhandana paṭinissaggo

original: Tadaṅgavasenāti ettha aniccānupassanā tāva tadaṅgappahānavasena niccasaññaṃ pariccajati,
analyzed: tad aṅga vasena āti ettha anicca anupassanā tāva tad aṅga ppahāna vasena nicca saññam pariccajati

original: pariccajantī ca tathā appavattiyaṃ ye “nicca”nti gahaṇavasena kilesā, tammūlakā abhisaṅkhārā,
analyzed: ca tathā appavattiyam ye niccanti gahaṇa vasena kilesā tad mūlakāḥ abhisaṅkhārāḥ

original: tadubhayamūlakā ca vipākakkhandhā anāgate uppajjeyyuṃ, te sabbepi appavattikaraṇavasena
analyzed: tad ubhaya mūlakā ca vipāka khandhāḥ anāgate uppajjeyyum te sabbe pi appavatti karaṇa vasena

original: pariccajati, tathā dukkhasaññādayo. Tenāha “vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi
analyzed: pariccajati tathā dukkha saññā ādayaḥ tena āha vipassanā hi tad aṅga vasena saddhim khandha abhisaṅkhārehi

original: kilese pariccajatī”ti.
analyzed: kilese pariccajati iti

original: Saṅkhatadosadassanenāti saṅkhate tebhūmake saṅkhāragate aniccatādidosadassanena.
analyzed: saṅkhata dosa dassanena ati saṅkhate tebhūmake saṅkhāra gate anicca tā ādi dosa dassanena

original: Niccādibhāvena tabbiparīte. Tanninnatāyāti tadadhimuttatāya. Pakkhandatīti anupavisati
analyzed: nicca ādi bhāvena tad biparīte tad ninna tāya ati tad adhimutta tāya pakkhandati iti anupavisati

original: anupavisantaṃ viya hoti. Saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatīti maggena
analyzed: anupavisantam viya hoti saddhim khandha abhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati iti maggena

original: kilesesu pariccattesu avipākadhammatāpādanena abhisaṅkhārā, tammūlakā ca khandhā
analyzed: kilesesu pariccattesu avipāka dhamma tā āpādanena abhisaṅkhārā tad mūlakā ca khandhā

original: anuppattirahabhāvena pariccattā nāma hontīti sabbepi te maggo pariccajatīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: anuppatti raha bhāvena pariccattāḥ nāma honti iti sabbe pi te maggo pariccajati iti vuttam

original: Ubhayanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ, maggañāṇañca. Maggañāṇampi hi gotrabhuñāṇassa anu pacchā
analyzed: ubhayanti vipassanā ñāṇam magga ñāṇañca magga ñāṇam pi hi gotrabhu ñāṇassa anu pacchā

original: nibbānadassanato “anupassanā”ti vuccati.
analyzed: nibbāna dassanataḥ anupassanā ti vuccati

original: Soḷasavatthuvasena cāti soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasenāpi vuccamānasantabhāvādivasenāpīti samuccayattho ca-saddo. “Ānāpānassati bhāvitā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: soḷasa vatthu vasena ca ati soḷasannam vatthūnam vasena api vuccamāna santa bhāva ādi vasena api iti samuccaya tthaḥ ca saddaḥ āna apāna ssati bhāvitā ati padam ānetvā sambandhitabbam

original: 237. Assāti ānāpānassatisamādhissa. Kāmavitakkādivitakkupacchedasamatthatāyapi mahānisaṃsatā
analyzed: assa ti āna apāna ssati samādhissa mahā nisaṃsa tā

original: veditabbāti sambandho. Ayanti ānāpānassatisamādhi. Uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu pavattiyeva
analyzed: veditabbā ti sambandhaḥ ayanti āna apāna ssati samādhi uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu pavattiyā iva

original: ito cito ca cittassa vidhāvanaṃ.
analyzed: itas citas ca cittassa vidhāvanam

original: Vijjā nāma maggo. Vimutti phalaṃ. Mūlabhāvo vipassanāya pādakabhāvo. Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne
analyzed: vijjā nāma maggaḥ vimutti phalam mūla bhāvaḥ vipassanāya pādaka bhāvo cattāro satipaṭṭhāne

original: paripūreti kāyānupassanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena tassā bhāvanāya pavattanato.
analyzed: paripūreti kāya anupassanā ādīnam catunnam anupassanānam vasena tassāḥ bhāvanāya pavattanato

original: Satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya vinā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāpāripūriyā
analyzed: satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti bojjhaṅga bhāvanāya vinā sati paṭṭhāna bhāvanā pāripūriyā

original: abhāvato. Vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrenti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya tāsaṃ sikhāppattibhāvato.
analyzed: abhāvataḥ vijjā vimuttim paripūrenti bojjhaṅga bhāvanāya tāsam sikhā appatti bhāvataḥ

original: Carimakānanti antimakānaṃ.
analyzed: antima kānam

original: 238. Nirodhavasenāti nirujjhanavasena. Bhavacarimakāti bhavavasena carimakā nihīnabhavapavattino.
analyzed: nirodha vasena ati nirujjhana vasena bhava carimakāḥ ati bhava vasena carimakāḥ nihīna bhava pavattinaḥ

original: Tathā jhānacarimakā veditabbā. Cuticarimakāti cutiyā carimakā cutikkhaṇapavattino
analyzed: tathā jhāna carimakā veditabbā cuti carimakā ati cutiyā carimakā cuti khaṇa pavattino

original: sabbapariyosānakā. Tasmāti tīsu bhavesu nihīne kāmabhave pavattanato. Teti assāsapassāsā.
analyzed: sabba pariyosānakā tasmā ati tīsu bhavesu nihīne kāma bhave pavattanato te ti assāsa passāsā

original: Puratoti heṭṭhā. Yasmā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā
analyzed: puratas ti heṭṭhā yasmā rūpa dhammānam soḷasa cittakkhaṇa āyuka tā

original: vibhāvitā, tasmā “soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Cuticittassa puratoti
analyzed: vibhāvitā tasmā soḷasamena cittena saddhim uppajjitvā ati vuttam cuti cittassa puratas ti

original: vā cuticittaṃ avadhibhāvena gahetvā tato oraṃ soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvāti
analyzed: vā cuti cittam avadhi bhāvena gahetvā tatas oram soḷasamena cittena saddhim uppajjitvā ati

original: evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukatāva assāsapassāsānaṃ vuttā hoti.
analyzed: evam pana atthe gayhamāne satta rasa cittakkhaṇa āyuka tā va assāsa passāsānam vuttā hoti

original: Ime kira imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno pākaṭā hontīti ānetvā sambandho.
analyzed: ime kira imam kammaṭṭhānam anuyuttassa bhikkhuno pākaṭāḥ honti iti ānetvā sambandhaḥ

original: Tattha kāraṇamāha “ānāpānārammaṇassa suṭṭhu pariggahitattā”ti. Tamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
analyzed: tattha kāraṇam āha āna apāna ārammaṇassa suṭṭhu pariggahita ttā ti tam eva attham vibhāvetum

original: “cuticittassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cuti cittassa atiādi vuttam

original: Tattha āyuantaraṃ nāma jīvitantaraṃ jīvanakkhaṇāvadhi. Dhammatāya evāti sabhāveneva, rucivasenevāti attho.
analyzed: tattha āyu antaram nāma jīvita antaram jīvana kkhaṇa avadhi dhamma tāya eva ati sa bhāvena iva ruci vasena iva ati attho

original: Candālokaṃ oloketvāti juṇhapakkhe padosavelāyaṃ samantato āsiñcamānakhīradhāraṃ viya
analyzed: canda ālokam oloketvā ati juṇha pakkhe padosa velāyam samantataḥ āsiñcamāna khīra dhāram viya

original: gaganatalaṃ, rajatapattasadisavālikāsanthatañca bhūmibhāgaṃ disvā “ramaṇīyo vatāyaṃ
analyzed: gagana talam bhūmi bhāgam disvā ramaṇīyaḥ vata ayam

original: kālo, deso ca mama ajjhāsayasadiso, kīva ciraṃ nu kho ayaṃ dukkhabhāro vahitabbo”ti
analyzed: kālaḥ deso ca mama ajjhāsaya sadiso kīva ciram nu kho ayam dukkha bhāro vahitabbo ti

original: attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā parikkhīṇeti adhippāyo. Lekhaṃ katvāti caṅkame tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā.
analyzed: attanaḥ āyu saṅkhāre upadhāretvā parikkhīṇā iti adhippāyaḥ lekham katvā ati caṅkame tiriyam lekham katvā

original: Anuyuñjethāti anuyuñjeyya, bhāveyyāti attho.
analyzed: anuyuñjetha ati anuyuñjeyya bhāveyya ati attho

original: Upasamānussatikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: upasama anussati kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 239. Evanti yathāvuttena virāgādiguṇānussaraṇappakārena. Sabbadukkhūpasamasaṅkhātassāti dukkhadukkhādibhedaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ upasammati etthāti sabbadukkhūpasamoti saṅkhātabbassa.
analyzed: evam ti yathā vuttena virāga ādi guṇa anussaraṇa ppakārena sabba dukkha upasama saṅkhātassa ati dukkha dukkha ādi bhedam sabbam pi dukkham upasammati ettha ati sabba dukkha upasamaḥ iti saṅkhātabbassa

original: “Paññattidhammā”tiādīsu asabhāvopi ñāṇena dhārīyati avadhārīyatīti dhammoti vuccatīti
analyzed: paññatti dhamma ati ādīsu asabhāvaḥ pi ñāṇena dhārīyati avadhārīyati iti dhammo ti vuccati iti

original: tato nivattento “dhammāti sabhāvā”ti āha. Bhavanaṃ paramatthato vijjamānatā bhāvo,
analyzed: tatas nivattentaḥ dhammā ati sabhāvā ti āha bhavanam paramatthataḥ vijjamāna tā bhāvaḥ

original: saha bhāvenāti sabhāvā, sacchikaṭṭhaparamatthato labbhamānarūpāti attho. Te hi attano
analyzed: saha bhāvena ati sabhāvā sacchikaṭṭha paramatthataḥ labbhamāna rūpā ti te hi attanaḥ

original: sabhāvassa dhāraṇato dhammāti, yathāvuttenaṭṭhena sabhāvāti ca vuccanti. Saṅgammāti
analyzed: sabhāvassa dhāraṇataḥ dhammā ti yathā vuttena aṭṭhena sabhāvā ti ca vuccanti saṅgamma ati

original: paccayasamodhānalakkhaṇena saṅgamena sannipatitvā. Samāgammāti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
analyzed: paccaya samodhāna lakkhaṇena saṅgamena sannipatitvā samāgamma iti tassa iva vevacanam

original: Paccayehīti anurūpehi paccayehi. Katāti nibbattitā. Akatāti kehicipi paccayehi na
analyzed: paccayehi iti anurūpehi paccayehi katā ati nibbattitā a katā ati kehici pi paccayehi na

original: katā. Asaṅkhatāti bahuvacanassa kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Aggamakkhāyatīti aggo akkhāyati,
analyzed: katā asaṅkhatā iti bahuvacanassa kāraṇam heṭṭhā vuttam eva aggam akkhāyati iti aggaḥ akkhāyati

original: ma-kāro padasandhikaro. So asaṅkhatalakkhaṇo sabhāvadhammo virāgoti paccetabbo, virajjati
analyzed: makāro pada sandhi karo so asaṅkhata lakkhaṇo sa bhāva dhammo virāgaḥ ti paccetabbaḥ virajjati

original: ettha saṃkilesadhammoti. Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānena ariyamaggena pahīyamānā
analyzed: ettha saṃkilesa dhammaḥ ti nibbānam ārammaṇam katvā pavattamānena ariya maggena pahīyamānā

original: mānamadādayo taṃ patvā pahīyanti nāmāti āha “tamāgamma…pe… vinassantī”ti. Tattha
analyzed: māna mada ādayaḥ tam patvā pahīyanti nāma ati āha vinassanti iti tattha

original: “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā maññanāvasena pavatto māno eva mānamado. Purisabhāvaṃ nissāya
analyzed: seyya uham asmi itiādinā maññanā vasena pavatto mānaḥ eva māna madaḥ purisa bhāvam nissāya

original: uppajjanakamado purisamado. Ādi-saddena jātimadādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nimmadāti
analyzed: uppajjanaka madaḥ purisa madaḥ ādi saddena jāti mada ādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo nimmadā ti

original: vigatamadabhāvā. Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “amadā”ti vuttaṃ. Madā nimmadīyanti ettha
analyzed: vigata mada bhāvāḥ imam eva hi attham dassetum amadā ti vuttam madāḥ nimmadīyanti ettha

original: amadabhāvaṃ vināsaṃ gacchantīti madanimmadano. Eseva nayo sesapadesupi. Kāmapipāsāti
analyzed: a mada bhāvam vināsam gacchanti iti mada nimmadanaḥ eṣa iva nayaḥ sesa padesu pi kāma pipāsā ati

original: kāmānaṃ pātukamyatā, kāmataṇhā. Kāmaguṇā eva āliyanti ettha sattāti kāmaguṇālayā.
analyzed: kāmānam pātukamyatā kāma taṇhā kāma guṇāḥ eva āliyanti ettha kāma guṇa ālayā

original: Tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭanti tīsu bhūmīsu kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ. Esa asaṅkhatadhammo. Aparāparabhāvāyāti
analyzed: tebhūmakam vaṭṭanti tīsu bhūmīsu kamma kilesa vipāka vaṭṭam esa asaṅkhata dhammaḥ apara apara bhāvāya ati

original: aparāparaṃ yoniādito yoniādibhāvāya. Ābandhanaṃ gaṇṭhikaraṇaṃ. Saṃsibbanaṃ tunnakāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: apara aparam yoni āditaḥ yoni ādi bhāvāya ābandhanam gaṇṭhikaraṇam saṃsibbanam tunna kāraṇam

original: Nikkhamanaṃ, nissaraṇañcassa taṇhāya visaṃyogo evāti āha “visaṃyutto”ti.
analyzed: nikkhamanam nissaraṇam ca assa taṇhāya visaṃyogaḥ eva ati āha visaṃyuttaḥ ti

original: Ye guṇe nimittaṃ katvā madanimmadanādināmāni nibbāne niruḷhāni, te madanimmadanatādike
analyzed: ye guṇe nimittam katvā mada nimmadana ādi nāmāni nibbāne niruḷhāni te mada nimmadana tā ādike

original: yathāvutte nibbattitanibbānaguṇe eva gahetvā āha “madanimmadanatādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ vasenā”ti,
analyzed: yathā vutte nibbattita nibbāna guṇe eva gahetvā āha mada nimmadana tā ādīnam guṇānam vasena iti

original: na pana madā nimmadīyanti etenāti evamādike. Te hi ariyamaggaguṇā. Bhagavatā upasamaguṇā
analyzed: na pana madāḥ nimmadīyanti etena ati evamādike te hi ariya magga guṇāḥ bhagavatā upasama guṇā

original: vuttāti sambandho. Kattha pana vuttāti? Asaṅkhatasaṃyuttādīsu. Tattha saccanti avitathaṃ.
analyzed: vuttā iti sambandhaḥ kattha pana vuttā ati asaṅkhata saṃyutta ādīsu tattha saccam ti avitatham

original: Nibbānaṃ hi kenaci pariyāyena asantabhāvābhāvato ekaṃseneva santattā aviparītaṭṭhena
analyzed: nibbānam hi kenacid pariyāyena asanta bhāva abhāvato ekaṃsena iva santattā aviparīta ṭṭhena

original: saccaṃ. Tenāha “ekaṃ hi saccaṃ, na dutiyamatthī”ti. Pāranti saṃsārassa paratīrabhūtaṃ.
analyzed: saccam tena āha ekam hi saccam na dutiyam atthi iti saṃsārassa para tīra bhūtam

original: Tenevāha “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti, “appakā te manussesu, ye janā
analyzed: tena iva āha tiṇṇaḥ pāraṅgataḥ thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ ti appakā te manussesu ye janā

original: pāragāmino”ti ca. Sududdasanti paramagambhīratāya, atisukhumasantasabhāvatāya ca
analyzed: ca ca

original: anupacitañāṇasambhārehi daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya suṭṭhu duddasaṃ. Natthi ettha jarā,
analyzed: an upacita ñāṇa sambhārehi daṭṭhum a sakkuṇeyya tāya suṭṭhu duddasam na atthi ettha jarā

original: etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa jarābhāvoti ajaraṃ. Tato eva jarādīhi apalokiyatāya
analyzed: etasmin vā adhigate puggalassa jarā bhāvaḥ ti ajaram tatas eva jarā ādīhi

original: thiraṭṭhena dhuvaṃ. Taṇhādipapañcābhāvato nippapañcaṃ. Natthi ettha matanti amataṃ.
analyzed: thira aṭṭhena dhuvam taṇhā ādi papañca abhāvataḥ nippapañcam natthi ettha matam nti amatam

original: Asivabhāvakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ abhāvena sivaṃ. Catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā
analyzed: saṃkilesa dhammānam abhāvena sivam catūhi yogehi anupadduta ttā

original: khemaṃ. Visaṅkhārabhāvena acchariyatāya, abhūtapubbatāya ca abbhutaṃ. Sabbāsaṃ ītīnaṃ
analyzed: khemam visaṅkhāra bhāvena a chariya tāya a bhūta pubba tāya ca abbhutam sabbāsam ītīnam

original: anatthānaṃ abhāvena anītikaṃ. Niddukkhatāya abyābajjhaṃ. Sabbasaṃkilesamalato accantasuddhiyā
analyzed: anatthānam abhāvena anītikam niddukkha tāya abyābajjham sabba saṃkilesa malataḥ accanta suddhiyā

original: visesato suddhīti visuddhi. Catūhipi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyatāya dīpaṃ. Sakalavaṭṭadukkhato
analyzed: visesataḥ catūhi pi oghehi an ajjhottharaṇīya tāya dīpam sakala vaṭṭa dukkhato

original: paripālanaṭṭhena tāṇaṃ.
analyzed: paripālana ṭṭhena tāṇam

original: “Saccañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādikā pāḷi saṃkhittāti veditabbā. Ādi-saddena
analyzed: saccam ca vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi iti ādikā pāḷi saṃkhittā ati veditabbā ādi saddena

original: anantaanāsavanipuṇaajajjaraapalokitaanidassanapaṇītaacchariyaanītikadhammamuttileṇaparāyaṇagambhīrādivacanehi
analyzed: ananta anāsava nipuṇa ajajjara apalokita a nidassana paṇīta acchariya anītika dhamma mutti leṇa parāyaṇa gambhīra ādi vacanehi

original: ca bodhitā idha avuttā guṇā saṅgayhanti, tattha natthi etassa uppādanto vā vayanto
analyzed: ca bodhitāḥ idha avuttā guṇā saṅgayhanti tattha natthi etassa uppādantaḥ vā vayantaḥ

original: vāti ananto, asaṅkhatadhammo. Āsavānaṃ anārammaṇatāya anāsavo. Nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya
analyzed: vāti anantaḥ asaṅkhata dhammaḥ āsavānam anārammaṇa tāya anāsavaḥ nipuṇa ñāṇa gocara tāya

original: nipuṇo. Saṅkhatadhammo viya jarāya ajajjaritatāya ajajjaro. Byādhiādīhi apalokiyatāya
analyzed: nipuṇaḥ saṅkhata dhammaḥ viya jarāya ajajjarita tāya ajajjaraḥ byādhi ādīhi apalokiya tāya

original: apalokitaṃ. Acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyatāya anidassano. Atittikaraṭṭhena paṇīto. Apacuratāya
analyzed: apalokitam a cakkhu viññāṇa viññeyya tāya anidassanaḥ a tittika raṭṭhena paṇītaḥ apacura tāya

original: acchariyo. Ītīhi anabhibhavanīyasabhāvattā, anītikabhāvahetuto ca anītikadhammo.
analyzed: ītīhi an abhibhavanīya sabhāva ttā anītika bhāva hetutaḥ ca anītika dhammo

original: Vaṭṭadukkhamuttinimittatāya mutti. Saṃsāraṃ bhayato passantehi nilīyanīyato leṇaṃ.
analyzed: vaṭṭa dukkha mutti nimitta tāya mutti saṃsāram bhayataḥ passantehi nilīyanīyataḥ leṇam

original: Tesaṃyeva parā gatīti parāyaṇo. Pakatiñāṇena aladdhapatiṭṭhatāya agādhaṭṭhena gambhīro.
analyzed: tesam yā iva parā gatī iti parāyaṇo pakati ñāṇena a laddha patiṭṭha tāya agādha ṭṭhena gambhīraḥ

original: Katapuññehipi dukkhena kicchena anubujjhitabbato duranubodho. Sacchikiriyaṃ muñcitvā
analyzed: kata puññehi pi dukkhena kicchena anubujjhitabbataḥ duranubodhaḥ sacchikiriyam muñcitvā

original: na takkañāṇena avacaritabboti atakkāvacaro. Buddhādīhi paṇḍiteheva veditabbato adhigantabbato
analyzed: na takka ñāṇena avacaritabbaḥ ti atakkāvacaraḥ buddha ādīhi paṇḍitehi iva veditabbataḥ adhigantabbataḥ

original: paṇḍitavedanīyoti evamattho veditabbo.
analyzed: paṇḍita vedanīyaḥ ti evamatthaḥ veditabbo

original: Ariyasāvakasseva ijjhati sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nibbānaguṇānaṃ pākaṭabhāvato.
analyzed: ariya sāvakassa iva ijjhati sacchikiriyā abhisamaya vasena nibbāna guṇānam pākaṭa bhāvato

original: Aṭṭhāne cāyaṃ eva-saddo vutto, ijjhati evāti yojanā. Sukhasiddhivasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhāne ca ayam eva saddo vuttaḥ ijjhati eva ati yojanā sukha siddhi vasena vā evam vuttam

original: “ariyasāvakassevā”ti. Tenevāha “evaṃ santepī”tiādi. Upasamagarukenāti nibbānaninnena.
analyzed: ariya sāvakassa iva āti tena iva āha evam sante pi itiādi upasama garukena ati nibbāna ninnena

original: Manasi kātabbā yathāvuttā upasamaguṇā. Sukhaṃ supatītiādīsu vattabbaṃ mettākathāyaṃ
analyzed: manasi kātabbā yathā vuttā upasama guṇā sukham supati iti ādīsu vattabbam mettākathā ayam

original: āvi bhavissati. Paṇītādhimuttiko hoti nibbānādhimuttattā.
analyzed: āvi bhavissati paṇīta adhimuttikaḥ hoti nibbāna adhimutta ttā

original: Anussatikammaṭṭhānaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: anussati kammaṭṭhāna niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti aṭṭhamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: iti aṭṭhama pariccheda vaṇṇanā

original: 9. Brahmavihāraniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: brahmavihāra niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Mettābhāvanākathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: mettā bhāvanā kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 240. Mettaṃ brahmavihāraṃ. Bhāvetukāmenāti uppādetukāmena paccavekkhitabboti sambandho. Sukhanisinnenāti visamaṃ anisīditvā pallaṅkābhujanena sukhanisinnena.
analyzed: mettam brahmavihāram bhāvetu kāmena ati uppādetu kāmena paccavekkhitabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ sukha nisinnena ati visamam a nisīditvā pallaṅka bhujanena sukha nisinnena

original: Kasmāti paccavekkhaṇāya kāraṇapucchā, aññaṃ adhigantukāmena aññattha ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā
analyzed: kasmā iti paccavekkhaṇāya kāraṇa pucchā aññam adhigantu kāmena aññattha ādīnava anisaṃsa paccavekkhaṇā

original: kimatthiyāti adhippāyo. Mettā nāma atthato adoso. Tathā hi adosaniddese “metti mettāyanā
analyzed: kim atthiyā ti adhippāyaḥ mettā nāma atthataḥ adoso tathā hi adosa niddese metti mettāyanā

original: mettāyitatta”nti niddiṭṭhaṃ. Khantīti ca idha adhivāsanakkhanti adhippetā. Sā pana
analyzed: niddiṭṭham khantī iti ca idha adhivāsana khanti adhippetā sā pana

original: atthato adosappadhānā cattāro arūpakkhandhāti mettāya sijjhamānāya titikkhākhanti
analyzed: atthataḥ a dosa ppadhānā cattāro arūpa kkhandhā ati mettāya sijjhamānāya titikkhā khanti

original: siddhā eva hotīti āha “khanti adhigantabbā”ti. Tena khantiyaṃ ānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā
analyzed: siddhā eva hoti iti āha khanti adhigantabbā ti tena khantiyam ānisaṃsa paccavekkhaṇā

original: satthikāvāti dasseti. Abhibhūto pariyuṭṭhānena. Pariyādinnacitto kusaluppattiyā okāsālābhena.
analyzed: satthikā avāti dasseti abhibhūtaḥ pariyuṭṭhānena pariyādinna citto kusala uppattiyā okāsa alābhena

original: Ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo pāṇaghātādivasena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādianatthamūlabhāvato.
analyzed: ādīnavaḥ daṭṭhabbo pāṇa ghāta ādi vasena diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika ādi anattha mūla bhāvato

original: Khantī paramaṃ tapoti parāpakārasahanādikā titikkhalakkhaṇā khanti uttamaṃ tapo akattabbākaraṇakattabbakaraṇalakkhaṇāya
analyzed: khantī paramam tapaḥ ti para apakāra sahana ādikā titikkha lakkhaṇā khanti uttamam tapaḥ a kattabba a karaṇa kattabba karaṇa lakkhaṇāya

original: sammāpaṭipattiyā mūlabhāvato. Khantibalaṃ balānīkanti paramaṃ maṅgalabhūtā khanti
analyzed: sammā paṭipattiyāḥ mūla bhāvataḥ khanti balam paramam maṅgala bhūtā khanti

original: eva balaṃ etassāti khantibalaṃ. Vuttañhi “khantibalā samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti. Dosādipaṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthatāya
analyzed: eva balam etassa ati khanti balam vuttam hi khanti balā samaṇa brāhmaṇā ti dosa ādi paṭipakkha vidhamana samattha tāya

original: anīkabhūtena teneva ca khantibalena balānīkaṃ. Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti attano
analyzed: anīka bhūtena tena iva ca khanti balena bala anīkam khantyāḥ bhiyyas na vijjati iti

original: paresañca anatthapaṭibāhano, atthāvaho ca khantito uttari apassayo natthi.
analyzed: paresam ca anattha paṭibāhanaḥ attha āvahaḥ ca khantitaḥ uttari a passayaḥ natthi

original: Vivecanatthāyāti vikkhambhanatthāya. Khantiyā saṃyojanatthāya attānanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: vivecana tthāya ati vikkhambhana tthāya khantiyā saṃyojana tthāya attānam ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Bhāvanaṃ dūsentīti dosā, puggalāyeva dosā puggaladosā. Yesu bhāvanā na sampajjati,
analyzed: bhāvanam dūsenti iti dosā dosā puggala dosā yesu bhāvanā na sampajjati

original: aññadatthu vipajjateva, te eva vuttā. Paṭhamanti vakkhamānena koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsantarupasaṃharaṇanayena vinā sabbapaṭhamaṃ.
analyzed: añña datthu vipajjatā iva te eva vuttā paṭhamanti vakkhamānena koṭṭhāsataḥ koṭṭhāsa antar upasaṃharaṇa nayena vinā sabba paṭhamam

original: Piyāyitabbo piyo, tappaṭipakkho appiyo. So saṅkhepato duvidho atthassa akārako, anatthassa
analyzed: piyāyitabbaḥ piyaḥ tad paṭipakkhaḥ appiyaḥ so saṅkhepataḥ duvidhaḥ atthassa akārakaḥ anatthassa

original: kārakoti. Tattha yo attano, piyassa ca anatthassa kārako, so veripuggalo daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: kārakaḥ ti tattha yaḥ attanaḥ piyassa ca anatthassa kārakaḥ saḥ veri puggalaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Yo pana attano, piyassa ca atthassa akārako, appiyassa ca atthassa kārako, “atthaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ pana attanaḥ piyassa ca atthassa akārakaḥ appiyassa ca atthassa kārakaḥ attham

original: me nācarī”tiādinā, “appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṃ acarī”tiādinā ca āghātavatthubhūto,
analyzed: me na acari iti ādinā appiyassa me amanāpassa attham acari iti ādinā ca āghāta vatthu bhūtaḥ

original: so appiyo, ananukūlavuttiko aniṭṭhoti attho. Liṅgavisabhāgeti itthiliṅgādinā liṅgena
analyzed: so appiyaḥ an anukūla vuttikaḥ aniṭṭhaḥ ti attho liṅga visabhāge iti itthi liṅga ādinā liṅgena

original: visadise. Odhisoti bhāgaso. “Tissa dattā”tiādinā odhisakanti attho.
analyzed: visadise odhiso ti bhāgaso tissa dattā atiādinā odhisakanti atthaḥ

original: Idāni yathāvuttesu chasu puggalesu abhāvetabbatāya kāraṇaṃ dassento “appiyaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni yathā vuttesu chasu puggalesu abhāvetabba tāya kāraṇam dassentaḥ appiyam hi iti ādim āha

original: Tattha appiyaṃ hi piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatīti dosena bhāvanāya saparissayatamāha.
analyzed: tattha appiyam hi piya ṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamati iti dosena bhāvanāya sa parissaya tam āha

original: Appiyatā hi piyabhāvassa ujupaṭipakkhā, na ca tassa piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapanena vinā bhāvanā
analyzed: appiya tā hi piya bhāvassa uju paṭipakkhā na ca tassa piya ṭṭhāne ṭhapanena vinā bhāvanā

original: sijjhati. Atippiyasahāyakaṃ majjhattaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatīti rāgena bhāvanāya
analyzed: sijjhati atippiya sahāyakam majjhatta ṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamati iti rāgena bhāvanāya

original: saparissayatamāha atippiyasahāyassa gehassitapemaṭṭhānabhāvato. Tenāha “appamattakepī”tiādi.
analyzed: sa parissaya tam āha atippiya sahāyassa geha ssita pema ṭṭhāna bhāvato tena āha appamattake pi itiādi

original: Majjhattaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatāhi majjhasabhāvaṃ neva piyaṃ nāppiyanti attho. Garuṭṭhāne
analyzed: majjhattam iṭṭha aniṭṭha tāhi majjha sabhāvam na iva piyam na appiyanti atthaḥ garuṭṭhāne

original: piyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapento kilamati majjhatte sambhāvanīyapiyāyitabbatānaṃ abhāvā. Na
analyzed: piya ṭṭhāne ca ṭhapentaḥ kilamati majjhatte sambhāvanīya piyāyitabba tānam abhāvā na

original: hi ajjhupekkhitabbe bhāvanīyatā, manāpatā vā paccupaṭṭhāti, piyagarubhāvasampanne
analyzed: hi ajjhupekkhitabbe bhāvanīya tā manāpa tā vā paccupaṭṭhāti piya garu bhāva sampanne

original: ca paṭhamaṃ mettā bhāvetabbā. Kodho uppajjati koṭṭhāsantarabhāvānupanayanato.
analyzed: ca paṭhamam mettā bhāvetabbā kodhaḥ uppajjati koṭṭhāsa antara bhāva an upanayanato

original: Tamevāti visabhāgaliṅgameva. Liṅgasabhāgeti avisesetvā “piyapuggale”ti āha. Bhittiyuddhamakāsīti
analyzed: tam eva ati visabhāga liṅgam eva liṅga sabhāga iti avisesetvā piya puggala iti āha bhitti yuddham akāsi iti

original: sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pihitadvāre gabbhe sayanapīṭhe nisīditvā mettaṃ bhāvento mettāmukhena
analyzed: sīlam adhiṭṭhāya pihita dvāre gabbhe sayana pīṭhe nisīditvā mettam bhāventaḥ mettā mukhena

original: uppannarāgena andhīkato bhariyāya santikaṃ gantukāmo dvāraṃ asallakkhetvā bhittiṃ
analyzed: uppanna rāgena andhīkataḥ bhariyāya santikam gantu kāmaḥ dvāram a saṃlakkhetvā bhittim

original: bhinditvāpi nikkhamitukāmatāya bhittiṃ pahari. Tenāha “mettāyanāmukhena rāgo vañcetī”ti,
analyzed: bhinditvā api nikkhamitu kāma tāya bhittim tena āha mettāyanā mukhena rāgaḥ vañca iti iti

original: “andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara”nti ca.
analyzed: andhatamam tadā hoti yam rāgaḥ sahate ca

original: Ādānanikkhepaparicchinne addhāpaccuppannabhūte dharamānatāya paccakkhato viya upalabbhamāne
analyzed: ādāna nikkhepa paricchinne addhā paccuppanna bhūte dharamāna tāya paccakkhataḥ viya upalabbhamāne

original: khandhappabandhe idha sattādiggahaṇaṃ, na tiyaddhagateti āha “kālakate panā”tiādi.
