analyzed: sa patta kantā ati paṭisattūhi icchitā sa patta karaṇā ati tehi kātabbā kodhanam ti kujjhana sīlam

original: Kodhanāyanti kodhano ayaṃ, ayanti ca nipātamattaṃ. Kodhaparetoti kodhena anugato,
analyzed: kodhanāyanti kodhanaḥ ayam ayanti ca nipāta mattam kodha paretaḥ iti kodhena anugataḥ

original: parābhibhūto vā. Dubbaṇṇova hotīti pakatiyā vaṇṇavāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattopi mukhavikārādivasena
analyzed: para abhibhūtaḥ vā dubbaṇṇaḥ uva hoti iti pakatiyā vaṇṇavā api alaṅkata paṭiyattaḥ api mukha vikāra ādi vasena

original: virūpo eva hoti etarahi, āyatiṃ cāti. Kodhābhibhavassa ekantikamidaṃ phalanti dīpetuṃ
analyzed: virūpaḥ eva hoti etarahi āyatim ca ati kodha abhibhavassa ekantikam idam phalanti dīpetum

original: “dubbaṇṇo vā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ katvā puna “kodhābhibhūto”ti vuttaṃ. Na pacuratthoti
analyzed: dubbaṇṇaḥ vā ti avadhāraṇam katvā puna kodha abhibhūto ti vuttam na pacurattho ti

original: na pahūtadhano. Na bhogavāti upabhogaparibhogavatthurahito. Na yasavāti na kittimā.
analyzed: na pahūta dhanaḥ na bhogavāti upabhoga paribhoga vatthu rahitaḥ na yasavāti na kittimā

original: Chavālātanti chavadahanālātaṃ, citakāyaṃ santajjanummukkantipi vadanti. Ubhatopadittanti
analyzed: chava alātam chava dahana alātam vadanti

original: ubhosu koṭīsu daḍḍhaṃ. Majjhe gūthagatanti vemajjhaṭṭhāne sunakhassa vā siṅgālassa
analyzed: ubhosu koṭīsu daḍḍham majjhe gūtha gatanti vemajjha ṭṭhāne sunakhassa vā siṅgālassa

original: vā uhadena gūthena makkhitaṃ. Kaṭṭhatthanti dārukiccaṃ. Neva pharati na sādheti.
analyzed: vai uhadena gūthena makkhitam dāru kiccam na iva pharati na sādheti

original: Tathūpamāhanti tathūpamaṃ tādisaṃ ahaṃ. Imanti “so ca hoti abhijjhālū”tiādinā heṭṭhā
analyzed: tathūpama ahanti tathūpamam tādisam aham imanti saḥ ca hoti abhijjhālūti ādinā heṭṭhā

original: vuttaṃ sandhāya satthā vadati, tasmā kāmesu tibbasārāgatādinā sīlarahitanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: vuttam sandhāya satthā vadati tasmā kāmesu tibba sāra āgata ādinā sīla rahitanti adhippāyaḥ

original: Idha pana byāpannacittaṃ paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappatāvasena yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: idha pana byāpanna cittam paduṭṭha mana saṅkappa tā vasena yojetabbam

original: So dāni tvantiādi yathāvuttehi suttapadehi attano ovadanākāradassanaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ dāni tvanti ādi yathāvuttehi sutta padehi attano ovadana ākāra dassanam

original: 244. Yo yo dhammoti kāyasamācārādīsu yo yo sucaritadhammo. Vūpasantoti saṃyato. Parisuddhoti
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ dhammo ti kāya samācāra ādīsu yaḥ yaḥ su carita dhammo vūpasanto ti saṃyato parisuddho ti

original: kilesamalavigamena visuddho. Kilesadāhābhāvena vā upasanto, anavajjabhāvena parisuddho,
analyzed: kilesa mala vigamena visuddhaḥ kilesa dāha abhāvena vā upasantaḥ anavajja bhāvena parisuddhaḥ

original: kāyasamācārasseva upasamo cirakālaṃ saṃyatakāyakammatāya veditabbo. Evaṃ sesesupi.
analyzed: kāya samācārassa iva upasamaḥ cira kālam saṃyata kāya kamma tāya veditabbo evam sesesu pi

original: Teti vacīmanosamācāre.
analyzed: tā iti vacī manaḥ samācāre

original: Soti upasantavacīsamācāro puggalo. Paṭisanthārakusaloti yathā parehi chiddaṃ na hoti,
analyzed: saḥ ti upasanta vacī samācāraḥ puggalo paṭisanthāra kusalo ti yathā parehi chiddam na hoti

original: evaṃ paṭisantharaṇe kusalo. Sakhiloti adhivāsanakhantisaṅkhātena sakhilabhāvena samannāgato.
analyzed: evam paṭisantharaṇe kusalo sakhilaḥ ti adhivāsana khanti saṅkhātena sakhila bhāvena samannāgataḥ

original: Sukhasambhāsoti piyakatho. Sammodakoti sammodanīyakathāya sammodanasīlo. Uttānamukhoti
analyzed: sukha sambhāsaḥ ti piya katho sammodako ti sammodanīya kathāya sammodana sīlo uttāna mukhaḥ iti

original: vikuṇitamukho ahutvā pītisomanassavasena vikasitamukho. Pubbabhāsīti yena kenaci
analyzed: vikuṇita mukhaḥ a hutvā pīti somanassa vasena vikasita mukhaḥ pubbabhāsi iti yena kenacid

original: samāgato paṭisanthāravasena paṭhamaṃyeva ābhāsanasīlo. Madhurena sarena dhammaṃ osāreti
analyzed: samāgataḥ paṭisanthāra vasena ābhāsana sīlo madhurena sarena dhammam osāreti

original: sarabhaññavasena. Sarabhāṇaṃ pana karonto parimaṇḍalehi paripuṇṇehi padehi ca byañjanehi
analyzed: sarabhañña vasena sarabhāṇam pana karontaḥ parimaṇḍalehi paripuṇṇehi padehi ca byañjanehi

original: ca abyākulehi dhammakathaṃ katheti.
analyzed: ca a byākulehi dhamma katham katheti

original: Sabbajanassa pākaṭo sakkaccakiriyāyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “yo hī”tiādi. Okappetvāti
analyzed: sabba janassa pākaṭaḥ sakkacca kiriyāya ati adhippāyaḥ tena āha yaḥ hi itiādi okappetvā iti

original: saddahitvā. Okappanalakkhaṇā hi saddhā. Ohitasototi avahitasoto, sussusantoti attho.
analyzed: saddahitvā okappana lakkhaṇā hi saddhā ohita soto ti avahita soto sussusanto ti attho

original: Aṭṭhiṃkatvā atthaṃ katvā, atthiko vā hutvā.
analyzed: aṭṭhiṃkatvā attham katvā atthikaḥ vā hutvā

original: “Ekopi na vūpasanto hotī”ti pāṭho, evarūpo puggalo nirayato nirayaṃ upapajjanto bahukālaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ api na vūpasantaḥ hoti iti pāṭhaḥ evarūpaḥ puggalaḥ nirayataḥ nirayam upapajjantaḥ bahukālam

original: tattheva saṃsaratīti dassetuṃ “aṭṭhamahānirayasoḷasaussadanirayaparipūrako bhavissatī”ti
analyzed: tattha iva saṃsarati iti dassetum aṭṭha mahāniraya soḷasa ussada niraya paripūrakaḥ bhavissati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha sañjīvādayo aṭṭha mahānirayā. Avīcimahānirayassa dvāre dvāre cattāro
analyzed: vuttam tattha sañjīva ādayaḥ aṭṭha mahānirayāḥ avīci mahānirayassa dvāre dvāre cattāro

original: cattāro katvā kukkuḷādayo soḷasa ussadanirayā. Kāruññaṃ upaṭṭhapetabbaṃ mahādukkhabhāgibhāvato.
analyzed: cattāro katvā kukkuḷa ādayaḥ soḷasa ussada nirayā kāruññam upaṭṭhapetabbam mahā dukkha bhāgi bhāvato

original: Yasmiṃ puggale avihesābhūtā dukkhāpanayanakāmatā upatiṭṭhati, tattha paṭigho anokāsovāti
analyzed: yasmin puggale a vihesa bhūtā dukkha apanayana kāma tā upatiṭṭhati tattha paṭighaḥ anokāsaḥ uvāti

original: āha “kāruññampi paṭicca āghāto vūpasammatī”ti.
analyzed: āha kāruññam pi paṭicca āghāto vūpasammati iti

original: Imassa ca atthassāti “yo yo dhammo”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa.
analyzed: imassa ca atthassa ati yaḥ yaḥ dhammo ti ādinā vuttassa atthassa

original: 245. Yaṃ verī dukkhāpetuṃ sakkoti, so tassa vasena “attano visaye”ti vutto bhikkhuno
analyzed: yam verī dukkhāpetum sakkoti saḥ tassa vasena attanaḥ visaye ti vuttaḥ bhikkhuno

original: kāyo. Kinti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. Tassāti verino. Avisayeti dukkhaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
analyzed: kāyaḥ kinti kim kāraṇam tassa ati verino a visayā iti dukkham uppādetum a sakkuṇeyya tāya

original: agocare. Sacitteti attano citte. Mahānatthakaranti idhalokatthaparalokatthaparamatthānaṃ
analyzed: agocare sa citta iti citte idha lokattha para lokattha parama tthānam

original: virādhanavasena mahato vipulassa, nānāvidhassa ca diṭṭhadhammikādibhedassa anatthassa
analyzed: virādhana vasena mahataḥ vipulassa nānāvidhassa ca diṭṭhadhammika ādi bhedassa anatthassa

original: kāraṇaṃ. Mūlanikantananti sīlassa mūlāni nāma hirottappakhantimettānuddayā, tesaṃ
analyzed: kāraṇam mūla nikantananti sīlassa mūlāni nāma hira uttappa khanti mettā anuddayā tesam

original: chindanaṃ. Kodho hi uppajjamānova pāṇātipātādivasena hirottappādīni ucchindati. Jaḷoti andhabālo.
analyzed: chindanam kodhaḥ hi uppajjamānaḥ iva pāṇa atipāta ādi vasena hirā uttappa ādīni ucchindati andha bālaḥ

original: Anariyaṃ kammanti verinā katamahāparādhamāha. Yo sayanti yo tvaṃ sayampi. Dosetukāmoti
analyzed: anariyam tvam sayampi dosa etu kāmaḥ iti

original: kodhaṃ uppādetukāmo. Yadi kari yadi akāsi. Dosuppādenāti dosassa uppādanena. Dukkhaṃ
analyzed: kodham uppādetu kāmaḥ yadi kari yadi akāsi dos uppādena ati dosassa uppādanena dukkham

original: tassa ca nāmāti dukkhañca nāma tassa aparādhakassa. Nāmāti asambhāvane nipāto, tena
analyzed: tassa ca nāma ati dukkham ca nāma tassa aparādhakassa nāma ati asambhāvane nipātaḥ tena

original: tassa kāraṇaṃ anekantikanti dasseti. Tenāha “kāhasi vā na vā”ti, karissasi na vā
analyzed: tassa kāraṇam anekantikanti dasseti tena āha kā ahasi vā na vā ati karissasi na vā

original: karissasīti attho. Ahitaṃ magganti attano ahitāvahaṃ duggatimaggaṃ.
analyzed: karissasi iti attho ahitam magganti attanaḥ ahita āvaham duggati maggam

original: Aṭṭhāneti doso tava appiyassa kārāpako, sattu pana tassa vasavattitāya dāsasadisoti
analyzed: aṭṭhāne ti doso tava appiyassa kārāpako sattu pana tassa vasa vatti tāya dāsa sadisaḥ ti

original: aṭṭhānaṃ paccāpakiriyāya. Tasmā tameva dosaṃ chindassu ucchinda. Khaṇikattāti udayavayaparicchinno
analyzed: aṭṭhānam pacca apakiriyāya tasmai tam eva dosam chindassu ucchinda khaṇikattā ati udaya vaya paricchinno

original: attano pavattikālasaṅkhāto khaṇo etesaṃ atthīti khaṇikā, tabbhāvato khaṇapabhaṅgubhāvatoti
analyzed: attano pavatti kāla saṅkhāto khaṇaḥ etesam atthi iti khaṇikā tad bhāvataḥ khaṇa pabhaṅgu bhāvato ti

original: attho. Kassa dānīdha kujjhasīti aparādhakassa santāne yehi khandhehi te aparādho
analyzed: attho kassa dānīdha kujjhasi iti aparādhakassa santāne yehi khandhehi te aparādhaḥ

original: kato, te taṃkhaṇaṃyeva sabbaso niruddhā. Idāni pana aññe tiṭṭhantīti kassa tvaṃ idha
analyzed: kato te sabbasas niruddhāḥ idāni pana aññe tiṭṭhanti iti kassa tvam idha

original: kujjhasi. Na hi yuttaṃ anaparādhesu kujjhananti adhippāyo. Taṃ vinā kassa so kareti
analyzed: kujjhasi na hi yuttam anaparādhesu adhippāyaḥ tam vinā kassa saḥ kareti

original: yo puggalo yassa dukkhaṃ karoti, taṃ dukkhakiriyāya visayabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ vinā kassa
analyzed: yaḥ puggalaḥ yassa dukkham karoti tam dukkha kiriyāya visaya bhūtam puggalam vinā kassa

original: nāma so dukkhakārako dukkhaṃ kare kareyya. Sayampi dukkhahetu tvamitīti evaṃ sayampi
analyzed: nāma saḥ dukkha kārakaḥ dukkham kare kareyya sayam pi dukkha hetu tvam iti iti evam sayam pi

original: tvaṃ etassa dukkhassa hetu, evaṃ samāne tassa tuyhañca tassa dukkhassa hetubhāve
analyzed: tvam etassa dukkhassa hetu evam samāne tassa tuyhan ca tassa dukkhassa hetu bhāve

original: kiṃ kāraṇā tassa kujjhasi na tuyhanti attho.
analyzed: kim kāraṇā tassa kujjhasi na attho

original: 246. Paralokepi anugāmibhāvato kammaṃyeva sakaṃ santakaṃ etesanti kammassakā, tesaṃ
analyzed: para loke pi anugāmi bhāvato kammaṃya iva sakam santakam etesan ti kammassakā tesam

original: bhāvo kammassakatā. Paccavekkhaṇā nāma nisedhanatthā, nisedhanañca bhāvino kammassāti
analyzed: bhāvaḥ kammassaka tā paccavekkhaṇā nāma nisedhana tthā nisedhanam ca bhāvino kammassa ati

original: āha “yaṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti. Paṭighavasena pana pavattakammaṃ pākaṭabhāvato āsannaṃ,
analyzed: āha yam kammam karissasi iti paṭigha vasena pana pavatta kammam pākaṭa bhāvataḥ āsannam

original: paccakkhañcāti āha “idañcā”ti. Ca-saddo byatireke, so tassa kammassa phalanissandena
analyzed: paccakkham ca iti āha idam ca ati casaddaḥ byatireke so tassa kammassa phala nissandena

original: “neva sammāsambodhi”ntiādinā byatirekato vuccamānamevatthaṃ joteti. Neva samatthanti
analyzed: na iva sammāsambodhi nti ādinā byatirekataḥ vuccamānam evattham na iva samattha nti

original: sambandho. Niraye niyuttaṃ, jātanti vā nerayikaṃ. Attānaṃyeva okirati dosarajenāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ niraye niyuttam jātanti vā nerayikam attānaṃ yeva okirati dosa rajena ati adhippāyaḥ

original: 247. Satthu pubbacariyaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā, satthu gāravenāpi paṭighaṃ vūpasameyyāti.
analyzed: satthu pubba cariya guṇā paccavekkhitabbā satthu gāravena api paṭigham vūpasameyya

original: Bodhisattopi samāno nanu te satthā cittaṃ nappadūsesi, pageva abhisambuddhoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: bodhisattaḥ api samānaḥ nanu te satthā cittam na ppadūsesi pagā iva abhisambuddhaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Deviyā paduṭṭhenāti deviyā saddhiṃ padubbhinā micchācāravasena aparaddhena. Yattha
analyzed: deviyā paduṭṭhena ati deviyā saddhim padubbhinā micchā ācāra vasena aparaddhena yattha

original: susāne chavasarīraṃ chaḍḍīyati, taṃ āmakasusānaṃ. Nikhaññamānoti nikhaṇiyamāno. Purisakāraṃ
analyzed: susāne chava sarīram chaḍḍīyati tam āmaka susānam nikhaññamānaḥ ati nikhaṇiyamānaḥ purisakāram

original: katvāti āvāṭato nikkhamanatthāya bāhubalena purisakāraṃ katvā. Yakkhānubhāvenāti
analyzed: katvā iti āvāṭataḥ nikkhamana atthāya bāhu balena purisakāram katvā yakkha anubhāvena ati

original: aḍḍavinicchayena ārādhitacittassa yakkhassa ānubhāvena. Sirigabbhanti vāsāgāre.
analyzed: aḍḍa vinicchayena ārādhita cittassa yakkhassa ānubhāvena sirigabbhanti vāsāgāre

original: Āsīsethevāti yathādhippete atthe ñāyato anavajjato āsaṃ kareyya. Na nibbindeyyāti
analyzed: āsīsetha iva ati yathā adhippete atthe ñāyataḥ an avajjataḥ āsam kareyya na nibbindeyya ati

original: “evaṃ kicchāpannassa me kuto sotthibhāvo”ti na nibbindeyya. Vuttañhi “āpadāsu kho,
analyzed: evam kicchā āpannassa me kutas sotthi bhāvaḥ ti na nibbindeyya vuttam hi āpadāsu kho

original: mahārāja, thāmo veditabbo”ti. Yathā icchinti yena pakārena kassaci pīḷaṃ akatvā rajje
analyzed: mahā rāja thāmaḥ veditabbaḥ uti yathā yena pakārena kassaci pīḷam a katvā rajje

original: patiṭṭhitaṃ attānaṃ icchiṃ, tathā ahaṃ ahunti passāmi. Voti hi nipātamattaṃ.
analyzed: patiṭṭhitam attānam icchim tathā aham passāmi vo ti hi nipāta mattam

original: Kāsiraññāti kalābunā kāsirājena. Sakaṇṭakāhīti ayakaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭakāhi.
analyzed: kāsiraññā ati kalābunā kāsirājena sa kaṇṭakāhi iti ayakaṇṭakehi sa kaṇṭakāhi

original: Mahallakoti vuddho vayoanuppatto. Rujjhantīti nirujjhanti.
analyzed: mahallakaḥ iti vuddhaḥ vayaḥ anuppatto rujjhanti iti nirujjhanti

original: Cittapariggaṇhanakāloti visevanaṃ kātuṃ adatvā cittassa sammadeva damanakālo.
analyzed: citta pariggaṇhana kālaḥ iti visevanam kātum a datvā cittassa sammadeva damana kālaḥ

original: Puthusallenāti vipulena sallena. Nāgoti hatthināgo. Vadhīti vijjhi, māresīti vā attho.
analyzed: puthu sallena ati vipulena sallena nāgaḥ ti hatthi nāgaḥ vadhi iti vijjhi māresi iti vā attho

original: Imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā mayi evaṃ karaṇaṃ nāma na tava vasena hoti, tasmā kassa vā rañño,
analyzed: imam ṭhānam āgantvā mayi evam karaṇam nāma na tava vasena hoti tasmā kassa vā rañño

original: rājamattassa vā ayaṃ payogo uyyojanāti attho.
analyzed: rāja mattassa vai ayam payogaḥ uyyojanā ati atthaḥ

original: Chabbaṇṇarasmīti nīlapītalohitādivasena chabbaṇṇamayūkhā. Chabbaṇṇakiraṇavantadantatāya hi te hatthī “chaddantā”ti vuccanti, na chaddantavantatāya.
analyzed: chabbaṇṇa rasmi iti nīla pīta lohita ādi vasena chabbaṇṇa mayūkhā chabbaṇṇa kiraṇavanta danta tāya hi te hatthī chaddantā ati vuccanti na chaddantavanta tāya

original: Chātoti jighacchito. Khādeyyāti khādeyyaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Āhitoti suhito. Sambalanti
analyzed: chāto iti khādeyyam ati khādeyyam ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ āhitaḥ iti su hitaḥ

original: maggāhāraṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā upacārena pathassa hitanti vuccati, tasmā “pātheyya”ntipi
analyzed: magga āhāram tam pana yasmai upacārena pathassa hitanti vuccati tasmai

original: vuttaṃ. “Mittadubbhī vatāyaṃ andhabālo”ti kāruññena assupuṇṇehi nettehi taṃ purisaṃ udikkhamāno.
analyzed: vuttam mitta dubbhī vata ayam andha bālaḥ ti kāruññena assu puṇṇehi nettehi tam purisam udikkhamāno

original: Mā ayyosi me bhadanteti ettha māti nipātamattaṃ, māti vā paṭikkhepo, tena upari tena
analyzed: mā ayyā asi me bhadanta iti ettha mā ati nipāta mattam mā ati vā paṭikkhepaḥ tena upari tena

original: kātabbaṃ vippakāraṃ paṭisedheti. Ayyo meti ayyirako tvaṃ mama atithibhāvato. Bhadanteti
analyzed: kātabbam vippakāram paṭisedha iti ayyaḥ mā iti tvam mama atithi bhāvataḥ bhadanta iti

original: piyasamudācāro. Tvaṃ nāmetādisaṃ karīti tvampi evarūpaṃ akāsi nāma.
analyzed: piya samudācāraḥ tvam nāma etādisam kari iti tvam pi evarūpam nāma

original: Tiracchānabhūtopi pana mahākapi hutvā khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesīti yojanā.
analyzed: tiracchāna bhūtaḥ api pana mahā kapi hutvā khemanta bhūmim sampāpesi iti yojanā

original: Peḷāya pakkhipantepīti khuddakāya peḷāya pādehi koṭetvā pakkhipantepi. Maddantepīti dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ nānappakārehi maddantepi. Alampāneti evaṃnāmake ahituṇḍike.
analyzed: peḷāya pakkhipante iti khuddakāya peḷāya pādehi koṭetvā pakkhipante ipi maddante ipi iti dubbala bhāva karaṇa ttham nānappakārehi maddante ipi alampāne iti evaṃnāmake ahituṇḍike

original: Pītaṃ vāti ettha vā-saddo avuttatthavikappe, tena odātamañjiṭṭhādiṃ avuttaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: pītam vā ti ettha vā saddaḥ a vutta attha vikappe tena odāta mañjiṭṭha ādim a vuttam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Cittānuvattantoti cittaṃ anuvattanto. Homi cintitasannibho evamayaṃ bahulābhaṃ labhatūti.
analyzed: citta anuvattanto ti cittam anuvattantaḥ homi cintita sannibhaḥ evam ayam bahu lābham labhatu iti

original: Ānubhāvena pana thalaṃ kareyya udakaṃ…pe… chārikaṃ kare. Evaṃ pana yadi cittavasī
analyzed: ānubhāvena pana thalam kareyya uda kaṃpe chārikam kare evam pana yadi

original: hessaṃ…pe… uttamattho na sijjhatīti tadā attanā tattha diṭṭhaṃ ādīnavaṃ dasseti bhagavā.

original: Tattha uttamatthoti buddhabhāvamāha. Bhojaputtehīti luddaputtehi.
analyzed: tattha uttama atthaḥ iti buddha bhāvam āha bhoja puttehi iti ludda puttehi

original: Aḷārāti yena sayaṃ tadā luddahatthato mocito, taṃ satthavāhaṃ nāmena ālapati. Atikassāti

original: nāsāya āvutarajjuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā. Samparigayhāti kāḷavettalatādīhi sabbaso pariggahetvā,
analyzed: nāsāya āvuta rajjum ākaḍḍhitvā samparigayhāti kāḷa vetta latā ādīhi sabbaso pariggahetvā

original: acchariyāni dussahānaṃ sahanavasenāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: acchariyāni dussahānam sahana vasena ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Ativiya ayuttaṃ appatirūpaṃ paṭighacittuppādanena kenaci appaṭisamakhantiguṇassa satthusāsanāvokkamanappasaṅgato.
analyzed: ativiya ayuttam appatirūpam paṭigha citta uppādanena kenaci appaṭisama khanti guṇassa satthu sāsana avokkamana ppasaṅgato

original: 248. “Anamataggoyaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃsāro”tiādinā āgatāni suttapadāni anamataggasaddo, tadattho vā etesanti anamataggiyāni.
analyzed: anamataggoyam bhikkhave saṃsāraḥ ti ādinā āgatāni sutta padāni anamatagga saddo tad atthaḥ vā etesanti anamataggiyāni

original: Ajehi gamanamaggo ajapatho. Saṅkū laggāpetvā te ālambitvā gamanamaggo saṅkupatho.
analyzed: ajehi gamana maggo aja pathaḥ saṅkū laggāpetvā te ālambitvā gamana maggo saṅku pathaḥ

original: Saṅkūti aṅkusākārena katadīghadaṇḍo vuccati. Ādi-saddena papātamaggaduggamaggādike

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Ubhatobyūḷheti sampahāratthaṃ dvīhipi pakkhehi gāḷhasannāhe. Aññāni ca

original: dukkarāni karitvā dhanāsāya pabbatavidugganadīviduggādipakkhandanavasenāti adhippāyo.

original: Maṃ posesi, upakāraṃ akāsi, tatra nappatirūpaṃ manaṃ padūsetunti evaṃ cittaṃ uppādetabbanti
analyzed: mam posesi upakāram akāsi tatra na patirūpam manam padūsetunti evam cittam uppādetabbanti

analyzed: sambandhaḥ evam citta uppādanam ca etarahi dissamānena putta ādīnam posana ādinā atītassa

original: anumānato gahaṇavasena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: anumānataḥ gahaṇa vasena veditabbam

original: 249. Mettāyāti mettāsaṅkhātāya, mettāsahitāya vā. Cetovimuttiyāti cittasamādhāne.
analyzed: mettāya ati mettā saṅkhātāya mettā sahitāya vā cetaḥ vimuttiyā ati citta samādhāne

original: Āsevitāyāti ādarena sevitāya. Bhāvitāyāti vaḍḍhitāya. Bahulīkatāyāti punappunaṃ katāya.
analyzed: āsevitāya ati ādarena sevitāya bhāvitāya ati vaḍḍhitāya bahulīkatāya ati punappunam katāya

original: Yānīkatāyāti yuttayānaṃ viya katāya. Vatthukatāyāti adhiṭṭhānavatthuṃ viya katāya.
analyzed: yānīkatāya ati yutta yānam viya katāya vatthukatāya ati adhiṭṭhāna vatthum viya katāya

original: Anuṭṭhitāyāti adhiṭṭhitāya. Paricitāyāti pariciṇṇāya ciṇṇavasībhāvāya. Susamāraddhāyāti
analyzed: anuṭṭhitāya ati adhiṭṭhitāya paricitāya ati pariciṇṇāya ciṇṇavasībhāvāya su samāraddhāya ati

original: suṭṭhu sampāditāya. Pāṭikaṅkhāti icchitabbā avassaṃbhāvino. Sesaṃ parato āgamissati.
analyzed: suṭṭhu sampāditāya pāṭikaṅkhā ati icchitabbā avassaṃbhāvino sesam paratas āgamissati

original: 250. Dhātuvinibbhogoti sasambhārasaṅkhepādinā dhātūnaṃ vinibbhujanaṃ. Aparādho nāma

original: aparajjhantassa puggalassa rūpadhammamukhena gayhatīti katvā āha “kiṃ kesānaṃ kujjhasī”tiādi,
analyzed: aparajjhantassa puggalassa rūpa dhamma mukhena gayhati iti katvā āha kim kesānam kujjhasi itiādi

original: kesādivinimuttassa aparajjhanakassa puggalassa abhāvato. Idāni nibbattitaparamatthadhammavaseneva
analyzed: kesa ādi vinimuttassa aparajjhanakassa puggalassa abhāvataḥ idāni nibbattita paramattha dhamma vasena iva

original: vinibbhogavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pañcakkhandhe upādāya, dvādasāyatanāni

original: yathā āragge sāsapassa, ākāse ca cittakammassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, evamassa
analyzed: yathā āragge sāsapassa ākāse ca citta kammassa patiṭṭhāna ṭṭhānam natthi evam assa

original: “verī”ti parikappite puggale kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti, kesādīnaṃ akujjhitabbato,

original: tabbinimuttassa ca puggalassa abhāvato.
analyzed: tad vinimuttassa ca puggalassa abhāvato

original: 251. Saṃvibhāgoti āmisasaṃvibhāgo. Parassāti paccatthikassa. Bhinnājīvoti aparisuddhājīvo.
analyzed: saṃvibhāgaḥ ti āmisa saṃvibhāgaḥ parassa ati paccatthikassa bhinna ājīvaḥ ti aparisuddha ājīvaḥ

original: Tassevaṃ karototi evaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ karontassa tassa dāyakassa. Itarassāti paṭiggāhakassa.
analyzed: tassa ivam karoto ti evam saṃvibhāgam karontassa tassa dāyakassa itarassa ati paṭiggāhakassa

original: “Mama mātarā upāsikāya dinno”ti idaṃ “dhammiyalābho”ti etassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tena
analyzed: mama mātarā upāsikāya dinnaḥ ti idam dhammiya lābhaḥ ti etassa kāraṇa vacanam tena

original: pana tassa āgamanasuddhiṃ dasseti.
analyzed: pana tassa āgamana suddhim dasseti

original: Sabbatthasādhakanti “attattho parattho diṭṭhadhammiko attho samparāyiko attho”ti

original: evamādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ, hitānaṃ, payojanānañca nipphādakaṃ. Unnamanti dāyakā.
analyzed: evamādīnam sabbesam atthānam hitānam payojanānam ca nipphādakam unnamanti dāyakāḥ

original: Namanti paṭiggāhakā.
analyzed: namanti paṭiggāhakā

original: 252. Evanti yathāvuttehi kakacūpamovādānussaraṇādīhi attano ovadanākārehi. Vūpasantapaṭighassāti

analyzed: paṭisaṅkhāna balena vinodita āghātassa tasmim pi iti verī puggale pi verī gahaṇena iva ca ittha

original: appiyapuggalassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ verimhi mettāya siddhāya tasmimpi mettāsiddhito,
analyzed: appiya puggalassa api gahaṇam daṭṭhabbam verimhi mettāya siddhāya tasmim pi mettā siddhito

original: piyato pana atippiyasahāyakassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ āsannapaccatthikassa dubbinimocayabhāvadassanatthaṃ.

original: Mettāvasenāti mettāyanavasena. Samacittatanti hitūpasaṃhārena samānacittataṃ. Sīmāsambhedo
analyzed: mettā vasena ati mettāyana vasena hitu upasaṃhārena sīmā sambhedaḥ

original: Hitamajjhatteti piye, majjhatte ca. Catubbidheti catubbidhe jane, yattha katthacīti
analyzed: hita majjhattā iti piye majjhatte ca catubbidhā iti catubbidhe jane yattha katthaci iti

analyzed: adhippāyaḥ nānattanti piya majjhatta ādi nānākaraṇam hita cittaḥ uva kevalam sattesu

analyzed: hita cittaḥ eva ati pavuccati na pana mettāya nikāma lābhī iti vā kusalī iti vā pavuccati

original: Kasmā? Yasmā attādīsu passati nānattanti. Kasmā panāyaṃ hitacitto kusalīti na vuccatīti?
analyzed: kasmai yasmai atta ādīsu passati nānattanti kasmai pana ayam hita citto kusalī iti na vuccati iti

original: Sātisayassa kusalassa vasena kusalibhāvassa adhippetattā. Imassa ca puggalassa mettābhāvanā
analyzed: sa atisayassa kusalassa vasena kusali bhāvassa adhippeta ttā imassa ca puggalassa mettā bhāvanā

original: na visesavatī. Atha vā na nikāmalābhī mettāya yato attādīsu passati nānattaṃ. Kusalīti
analyzed: na visesavatī atha vā na nikāma lābhī mettāya yatas atta ādīsu passati nānattam kusalī iti

original: pavuccati, yasmā hitacittova pāṇinanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Gāmasīmādayo viya
analyzed: pavuccati yasmai hita cittaḥ iva evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ gāma sīmā ādayaḥ viya

analyzed: vuttam sambhedam dassetum samam pharati mettāya atiādi vuttam mahā visesaḥ ti mahantaḥ

original: bhāvanāya viseso atisayo. Purimena purimato attādinānattadassinā. Na nāyatīti na ñāyati.
analyzed: bhāvanāya visesaḥ atisayaḥ purimena purimataḥ na na

original: 253. Nimittanti yathā kasiṇakammaṭṭhānādīsu taṃtaṃkasiṇamaṇḍalādipariggahamukhena
analyzed: nimittam ti yathā kasiṇa kammaṭṭhāna ādīsu taṃ taṃ kasiṇa maṇḍala ādi pariggaha mukhena

analyzed: bhāvanā vasena laddham uggaha nimittam nissāya jhānassa gocara bhāvena paṭibhāga nimittam

analyzed: upatiṭṭhati na evam idha upaṭṭhitam nimittam nāma atthi yaḥ pana ayam yathā vutto sīmā sambhedo

analyzed: laddhaḥ u sva iva nimittam viyāti nimittam tasmin hi laddhe bhāvanāya nīvaraṇāni

original: Tenāha “nimittañca upacārañca laddhaṃ hotī”ti. Tameva nimittanti sīmāsambhedavasena
analyzed: tena āha nimittam ca upacāram ca laddham hoti iti tam eva sīmā sambheda vasena

original: pavattasamathanimittaṃ. Appakasireneva akiccheneva, pageva paripanthassa visodhitattā.
analyzed: pavatta samatha nimittam appa kasirena iva akicchena iva pagā iva paripanthassa visodhita ttā

original: Ettāvatāti ettakena bhāvanānuyogena. Anena yoginā. Pañcaṅgavippahīnantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva.
analyzed: ettāvatā iti ettakena bhāvanā anuyogena anena yoginā pañcaṅga vippahīna nti ādīnam padānam atthaḥ heṭṭhā vuttaḥ eva

original: “Paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ aññataravasenā”ti idaṃ vakkhamānāya vikubbanāya tesaṃ sādhāraṇatāya
analyzed: paṭhama jhāna ādīnam aññatara vasena ati idam vakkhamānāya vikubbanāya tesam sādhāraṇa tāya

original: vuttaṃ. Appanāppattacittasseva na upacāramattalābhino. Paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena

analyzed: vepulla ādi visesa pattassa odhisaḥ anodhisaḥ ca disā pharaṇa ādi vasena jhānassa pavijambhanā

original: vikubbanā vividhā kiriyāti katvā.
analyzed: vikubbanā vividhā kiriyā ati katvā

original: 254. Mettāsahagatenāti uppādato yāva bhaṅgā mettāya saha pavattena saṃsaṭṭhena sampayuttenāti
analyzed: mettā sahagatena ati uppādataḥ yāva bhaṅgāḥ mettāya saha pavattena saṃsaṭṭhena sampayuttena ati

analyzed: atthaḥ yasmā pana tam vutta nayena mettāya sahagatam ekuppāda ādi vidhinā sammat eva

original: āgataṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “mettāya samannāgatenā”ti. Ceto-saddo “adhicetaso”tiādīsu
analyzed: āgatam hoti tasmā vuttam mettāya samannāgatena ati cetaḥ saddaḥ adhicetasā utiādīsu

original: samādhipariyāyopi hotīti tato visesetuṃ “cetasāti cittenā”ti vuttaṃ. Etanti etaṃ

analyzed: padam disodhi pariggahaḥ satta ūdhi pariggaha mukhena iva hoti iti dassentaḥ āha ekissā disāya

original: paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāyā”ti. Disāsu hi ṭhitasattā disāgahaṇena gahitā.
analyzed: paṭhama pariggahitam sattam upādāya ati disāsu hi ṭhita sattā disā gahaṇena gahitā

original: Tenāha “ekadisāpariyāpannasattapharaṇavasena vutta”nti. Pharaṇañca sārammaṇassa dhammassa
analyzed: tena āha eka disā pariyāpanna satta pharaṇa vasena vuttan ti pharaṇam ca sārammaṇassa dhammassa

analyzed: attanaḥ ārammaṇassa phassanā paccakkhataḥ dassanam gahaṇam ārammaṇa karaṇam eva ati āha

original: “pharitvāti phusitvā ārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti. Brahmavihārādhiṭṭhitanti mettājhānupatthambhitaṃ.
analyzed: pharitvā iti phusitvā ārammaṇam katvā iti brahmavihāra dhiṭṭhitam ti mettā jhāna upatthambhitam

original: Tathāti niyamanaṃ. Taṃ aniyamāpekkhasambandhībhāvato upamākāraniyamanaṃ. Dutiyanti
analyzed: tathā iti niyamanam aniyama apekkha sambandhībhāvataḥ upamā ākāra niyamanam

original: upameyyadassanaṃ, upameyyañca nāma upamaṃ, tena sambandhañca vinā natthīti tadubhayampi
analyzed: upameyya dassanam upameyyañca nāma upamam tena sambandham ca vinā natthi iti tat ubhayam pi

original: dassetuṃ “yathā puratthimādīsū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tathā dutiyanti ettha pharitvā
analyzed: dassetum yathā puratthima ādīsu itiādi vuttam tattha tathā dutiyanti ettha pharitvā

analyzed: viharati iti ānetvā sambandhitabbam evam tatiyam catuttham ti ettha api tad anantaram ti

original: Pharaṇānukkamena hi tāsaṃ dutiyāditā, na sarūpato. Tenevāha “yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ disa”nti.

original: Itīti evaṃ yathāvuttaṃ catasso, evaṃ uddhaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatīti attho. Tenāha
analyzed: iti iti evam yathāvuttam catassaḥ evam uddham disam pharitvā viharati iti attho tena āha

original: iti-saddasseva atthadassanaṃ. Ettha ca “adho”ti iminā yathā nirayesu, nāgabhavanādīsu,

original: Nibbidāyāti vikkhambhanavasena nibbindanatthāya. Virāgāyāti virajjanatthāya. Nirodhāyāti

analyzed: atthaḥ ādīnavanti dosam tassa ati rūpassa āloko iti vaṇṇa visesaḥ eva ati tattha pavattam

original: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena, evaṃ sañjātidesaṭṭhenapi āyatana-saddena idha attho yujjatīti dassetuṃ
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena evam sañjā atidesa ṭṭhena api āyatana saddena idha atthaḥ yujjati iti dassetum

original: “tathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sañjāyati etthāti sañjāti, sañjāti eva deso sañjātideso.
analyzed: tathā tiādi vuttam tattha sañjāyati ettha ati sañjāti sañjāti eva desaḥ sañjātideso

original: Jhānaṃ appavattikaraṇena. Ārammaṇaṃ amanasikaraṇena. Ubhayampi vā ubhayatā yojetabbā.
analyzed: jhānam appavatti karaṇena ārammaṇam amanasikaraṇena ubhayam pi vā ubhaya tā yojetabbā

original: Jhānassapi hi anāvajjanaṃ, javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ amanasikaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: jhānassa api hi an āvajjanam javana paṭipādakena vā bhavaṅga manassa antaḥ akaraṇam amanasikaraṇam

original: ārammaṇassa ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena appavattanaṃ appavattikaraṇanti atthassa sambhavato
analyzed: ārammaṇassa ca ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena appavattanam appavatti karaṇanti atthassa sambhavato

original: ekajjhaṃ katvā sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā.
analyzed: ekajjham katvā sāmañña niddesena eka sesa nayena vā

original: Pubbe anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ attano pharaṇākāreneva
analyzed: pubbe anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena paṭhama āruppa viññāṇam attano pharaṇa ākārena iva

original: “ananta”nti manasi kātabbattā “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti vuttanti puna “manasikāravasena
analyzed: anantam ti manasi kātabba ttā anantam viññāṇam ti vuttam ti puna manasikāra vasena

original: vā ananta”nti vuttaṃ, sabbaso manasikaraṇavasenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “anavasesato
analyzed: vā anantam ti vuttam sabbaso manasikaraṇa vasena āti adhippāyaḥ tena āha anavasesato

original: manasi karonto ‘ananta’nti manasi karotī”ti. Jhānavibhaṅgepi ayamevattho vuttoti
analyzed: manasi karontaḥ anantam ti manasi karoti iti jhāna vibhaṅge pi ayam eva attho vutto ti

original: dassento “yaṃ pana vibhaṅge vutta”ntiādimāha. Tassā pāḷiyā evaṃ vā attho veditabbo
analyzed: dassentaḥ yam pana vibhaṅge vutta nti ādim āha tassā pāḷiyā evam vā atthaḥ veditabbo

original: – taṃyeva ākāsaṃ phuṭaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaviññāṇena manasi karotīti. Ayaṃ
analyzed: taṃyeva ākāsam phuṭam viññāṇam viññāṇam ca āyatana viññāṇena manasi karoti iti ayam

original: panattho yutto viya dissati, taṃyeva ākāsaṃ viññāṇena phuṭaṃ tena gahitākāraṃ manasi
analyzed: pana atthaḥ yuttaḥ viya dissati tam yeva ākāsam viññāṇena phuṭam tena gahita ākāram manasi

original: karoti. Evaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ pharatīti. Yaṃ hi ākāsaṃ paṭhamāruppasamaṅgī viññāṇena
analyzed: karoti evam tam viññāṇam anantam pharati iti yam hi ākāsam paṭhama āruppa samaṅgī viññāṇena

original: anantaṃ pharati, taṃ pharaṇākārasahitameva viññāṇaṃ manasi karonto dutiyāruppasamaṅgī
analyzed: anantam pharati tam pharaṇa ākāra sahitam eva viññāṇam manasi karontaḥ dutiya āruppa samaṅgī

original: anantaṃ pharatīti vuccati.
analyzed: anantam pharati iti vuccati

original: Manasikāravasena anantapharaṇākārena idha anantatā, na ākāsassa viya uppādantādiabhāvenāti
analyzed: manasikāra vasena ananta pharaṇa ākārena idha ananta tā na ākāsassa viya uppādanta ādi abhāvena ati

original: “nāssa antoti ananta”nti ettakamevāha. “Ruḷhīsaddo”ti iminā “viññāṇānañca”nti etassa
analyzed: na assa anto ti ananta nti ettakam eva āha ruḷhī saddo ti iminā etassa

original: padassa atthe viññāṇañca-saddo niruḷhoti dasseti, yathāvuttaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ dutiyāruppajjhānena
analyzed: padassa atthe viññāṇañca saddo niruḷhaḥ ti dasseti yathāvuttam vā viññāṇam dutiya āruppa jhānena

original: añcīyati vuttākārena ālambīyatīti viññāṇañcanti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ
analyzed: vutta ākārena ālambīyati iti evam pi ittha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo sesam

original: vuttatthamevāti āha “sesaṃ purimasadisamevā”ti.
analyzed: vuttattham eva iti āha sesam purima sadisam eva iti

original: Ākiñcaññāyatanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 283. Tatiyāruppakammaṭṭhāne yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ, taṃ vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ,
analyzed: tatiya āruppa kammaṭṭhāne yam heṭṭhā vutta sadisam tam vutta naya anusārena veditabbam

original: apubbameva vaṇṇayissāma. Tattha tassevāti yaṃ ārabbha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pavattaṃ,
analyzed: apubbam eva vaṇṇayissāma tattha tassa iva ati yam ārabbha viññāṇam ca āyatanam pavattam

original: tasseva. Kiṃ pana tanti āha “ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇassā”ti. Etena tato aññaṃ tatiyāruppajjhānassa
analyzed: tassa iva kim pana tat ti āha ākāsa anañcāyatana viññāṇassa ati etena tatas aññam tatiya āruppa jhānassa

original: ārammaṇaṃ natthīti dasseti. “Ārammaṇabhūtassā”ti iminā tassa anārammaṇabhūtaṃ dutiyāruppaviññāṇaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam natthi iti dasseti ārammaṇa bhūtassa ati iminā tassa anārammaṇa bhūtam dutiya āruppa viññāṇam

original: nivatteti. Abhāvoti natthitā. Suññatāti rittatā. Vivittākāroti viveko. Tīhi padehi
analyzed: nivattā iti abhāvo ti natthi tā suñña tā ati ritta tā vivitta ākāro ti viveko tīhi padehi

original: paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa apagamameva vadati. “Manasi kātabbo”ti vatvā manasikāravidhiṃ
analyzed: paṭhama āruppa viññāṇassa apagamam eva vadati manasi kātabbaḥ iti vatvā manasikāra vidhim

original: dassetuṃ “taṃ viññāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha amanasikaritvāti sabbena sabbaṃ manasi
analyzed: dassetum tam viññāṇam tiādi vuttam tattha a manasikaritvā ti sabbena sabbam manasi

original: akatvā acintetvā. Vā-saddo aniyamattho, tena tīsu pakāresu ekenapi atthasiddhīti dasseti.
analyzed: a katvā a cintetvā vā saddaḥ aniyama tthaḥ tena tīsu pakāresu ekena api attha siddhi iti dasseti

original: Tasmiṃ nimitteti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvasaṅkhāte jhānuppattinimitte.
analyzed: tasmim nimitta iti tasmim paṭhama āruppa viññāṇassa abhāva saṅkhāte jhāna uppatti nimitte

original: Ākāse phuṭeti ākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte. “Ākāsaphuṭe”ti vā pāṭho. Suññavivittanatthibhāveti
analyzed: ākāse phuṭā iti ākāsam pharitvā pavatte ākāsa phuṭā iti vā pāṭhaḥ suñña vivitta natthi bhāvā iti

original: suññabhāve, vivittabhāve, natthibhāve cāti yena ākārena bhāvitaṃ, tassa gahaṇatthaṃ
analyzed: suñña bhāve vivitta bhāve natthi bhāve ca ati yena ākārena bhāvitam tassa gahaṇa attham

original: vuttaṃ. Atha vā suññavivittanatthibhāveti suññavivittatāsaṅkhāte natthibhāve, tena
analyzed: vuttam atha vā suñña vivitta natthi bhāva iti suñña vivitta tā saṅkhāte natthi bhāve tena

original: vināsābhāvameva dasseti, na pure abhāvādike.
analyzed: vināsā bhāvam eva dasseti na pure abhāva ādike

original: Tasmiṃ hi appanācitteti ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānasampayutte appanāvasena pavatte citte,
analyzed: tasmin hi appanā citta iti ākiñcaññāyatana jhāna sampayutte appanā vasena pavatte citte

original: tasmiṃ vā paṭhamāruppassa apagamasaṅkhāte natthibhāve yathāvutte appanācitte uppanne.
analyzed: tasmin vā paṭhama āruppassa apagama saṅkhāte natthi bhāve yathā vutte appanā citte uppanne

original: So bhikkhu abhāvameva passanto viharatīti sambandho. Puriso katthaci gantvā āgantvā
analyzed: so bhikkhu abhāvam eva passantaḥ viharati iti sambandho puriso katthaci gantvā āgantvā

original: suññameva passati, natthibhāvameva passatīti yojanā. Taṃ ṭhānanti taṃ sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: suññam eva passati natthi bhāvam eva passati iti yojanā tam ṭhānam ti tam sannipāta ṭṭhānam

original: “Parikammamanasikārena antarahite”ti iminā ārammaṇakaraṇābhāvena tassa antaradhānaṃ
analyzed: parikamma manasikārena antarahitā iti iminā ārammaṇa karaṇa abhāvena tassa antaradhānam

original: na naṭṭhattāti dasseti. Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – yathā so puriso tattha sannipatitaṃ
analyzed: na naṭṭha ttā ati dasseti tatra idam opamma saṃsandanam yathā saḥ purisaḥ tattha sannipatitam

original: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā gato, tato sabbesu bhikkhūsu kenacideva karaṇīyena apagatesu

original: āgantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhikkhūhi suññameva passati, na bhikkhūnaṃ tatopi apagatakāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: āgantvā tam ṭhānam bhikkhūhi suññam eva passati na bhikkhūnam tatas pi apagata kāraṇam

original: evamayaṃ yogāvacaro pubbe viññāṇañcāyatanajjhānacakkhunā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ disvā

analyzed: pacchā na atthi iti parikamma manasikārena tasmin apagate tatiya āruppa jhāna cakkhunā tassa

original: natthibhāvameva passanto viharati, na tassa apagamanakāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisābhogābhāvatoti.
analyzed: natthi bhāvam eva passantaḥ viharati na tassa apagamana kāraṇam vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisa ābhoga abhāvato ti

original: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma ati ettha yat vattabbam tat heṭṭhā vutta naya anusārena veditabbam

original: 284. Natthitā pariyāyāsuññavivittabhāvāti “natthī”ti padassa atthaṃ vadantena suññavivittapadānipi
analyzed: natthitā pariyāya a suñña vivitta bhāvā ti natthi iti padassa attham vadantena suñña vivitta padāni pi

original: vuttoti dassetuṃ “yampi vibhaṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha taññeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetīti
analyzed: vuttaḥ ti dassetum yat pi vibhaṅga itiādi vuttam tattha tañca eva viññāṇam abhāveti iti

analyzed: viññāṇam pi abhāveti itiādinā vattabba tam labhati iti adhippāyena āha khayataḥ sammasanam

original: viya vutta”nti. Assāti pāṭhassa. Puna assāti viññāṇassa. Abhāvetīti abhāvaṃ karoti.
analyzed: viya vuttanti assa ati pāṭhassa puna assa ati viññāṇassa abhāveti iti abhāvam karoti

original: Yathā ñāṇassa na upatiṭṭhati, evaṃ karoti amanasikaraṇato. Tato eva vibhāveti vigatabhāvaṃ
analyzed: yathā ñāṇassa na upatiṭṭhati evam karoti amanasikaraṇato tatas eva vibhāveti vigata bhāvam

original: karoti, vināseti vā yathā na dissati, tathā karaṇato. Teneva antaradhāpeti tirobhāvaṃ
analyzed: karoti vināseti vā yathā na dissati tathā karaṇato tena iva antaradhāpeti tirobhāvam

original: gameti. Na aññathāti imissā pāḷiyā evamattho, na ito aññathā ayujjamānakattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: gameti na aññathā ti imissā pāḷiyā evamatthaḥ na itas aññathā ayujjamānaka ttā ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Assāti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvassa. Kiñcananti kiñcipi. Sabhāvadhammassa appāvasesatā
analyzed: assa ti paṭhama āruppa viññāṇa abhāvassa kiñcana nti sabhāva dhammassa appāvasesa tā

original: nāma bhaṅgo eva siyāti āha “bhaṅgamattampi assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthī”ti. Sati hi bhaṅgamattepi
analyzed: nāma bhaṅgaḥ eva siyā iti āha bhaṅga mattam pi assa avasiṭṭham natthi iti sati hi bhaṅga matte pi

original: tassa sakiñcanatā siyā. Akiñcananti ca viññāṇassa kiñci pakāraṃ aggahetvā sabbena
analyzed: tassa sa kiñcana tā siyā akiñcananti ca viññāṇassa kiñci pakāram aggahetvā sabbena

original: sabbaṃ vibhāvanamāha. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: sabbam vibhāvanam āha sesam vutta nayam eva

original: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 285. No ca santāti yathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā
analyzed: no ca yathā nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana samāpatti saṅkhāra avasesa sukhuma bhāva ppattiyā

original: savisesā santā, evamayaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti no ca santā tadabhāvato. Yā ayaṃ
analyzed: sa visesā santā evam ayam ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatti no ca santā tad abhāvataḥ yā ayam

original: khandhesu paccayayāpanīyatāya, rogamūlatāya ca rogasarikkhatā, dukkhatāsūlayogādinā
analyzed: khandhesu paccaya yāpanīya tāya roga mūla tāya ca roga sarikkha tā dukkha tā sūla yoga ādinā

original: gaṇḍasarikkhatā, pīḷājananādinā sallasarikkhatā ca, sā saññāya sati hoti, nāsatīti
analyzed: gaṇḍa sarikkha tā pīḷā janana ādinā salla sarikkha tā ca sā saññāya sati hoti na asati iti

original: vuttaṃ “saññā rogo, saññā gaṇḍo, saññā salla”nti. Sā cettha paṭukiccā pañcavokārabhavato
analyzed: vuttam saññā rogo saññā gaṇḍo saññā sallanti sā ca ittha paṭu kiccā pañca vokāra bhavato

original: oḷārikasaññā veditabbā. Na kevalaṃ saññā eva, atha kho vedanācetanādīnampi saṅgaho
analyzed: oḷārika saññā veditabbā na kevalam saññā eva atha kho vedanā cetanā ādīnam pi saṅgahaḥ

original: daṭṭhabbo. Saññāsīsena pana niddeso kato. Etaṃ santanti etaṃ asantabhāvakararogādisarikkhasaññāvirahato
analyzed: daṭṭhabbo saññā sīsena pana niddeso kato etam etam etam asanta bhāva kara roga ādi sarikkha saññā virahato

original: santaṃ. Tato eva paṇītaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti āha “nevasaññānāsaññā”ti? Tadapadesena taṃsampayuttajjhānamāha
analyzed: santam tatas eva paṇītam kim pana tat ti āha nevasaññā nāsaññā iti tad apadesena tad sampayutta jhānam āha

original: “ādīnava”nti. Ettha rogādisarikkhasaññādisabbhāvopi ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo, na āsannaviññāṇañcāyatanapaccatthikatāva.
analyzed: ādīnavanti ettha ādīnavaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ na āsanna viññāṇañca āyatana paccatthika tā vat

original: Uparīti catutthāruppe. Sā vāti sā eva. Vattitāti pavattitā nibbattitā vaḷañjitā.
analyzed: upari iti catuttha āruppe sā vāti sā eva vatti tā ati pavatti tā nibbatti tā vaḷañjitā

original: Tasmiṃ nimitteti tasmiṃ tatiyāruppasamāpattisaṅkhāte jhānanimitte. Mānasanti cittaṃ
analyzed: tasmin nimitta iti tasmin tatiya āruppa samāpatti saṅkhāte jhāna nimitte mānasanti cittam

original: “mano eva mānasa”nti katvā, bhāvanāmanasikāraṃ vā. Taṃ hi manasi bhavanti mānasanti
analyzed: manaḥ eva katvā bhāvanā manasikāram vā tam hi manasi bhavanti mānasanti

original: vuccati. Jhānasampayuttadhammānampi jhānānuguṇatāya samāpattipariyāyo labbhatīti
analyzed: vuccati jhāna sampayutta dhammānam pi jhāna anuguṇa tāya samāpatti pariyāyaḥ labbhati iti

original: āha “ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattisaṅkhātesu catūsu khandhesū”ti, ārammaṇabhūtesūti adhippāyo.
analyzed: āha ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatti saṅkhātesu catūsu khandhesu iti ārammaṇa bhūtesu iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 286. Yathāvuttaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvato āyatanaṃ kāraṇamassāti jhānaṃ
analyzed: yathā vuttam ākiñcaññam ārammaṇa paccaya bhāvataḥ āyatanam kāraṇam assa ati jhānam

original: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, ākiñcaññameva ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ jhānassa kāraṇanti ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññam eva ārammaṇa paccaya bhūtam jhānassa kāraṇanti ārammaṇaṃ

original: ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatananti evam vā attho daṭṭhabbo sesam ettha heṭṭhā vutta naya anusārena veditabbam

original: Yāya saññāya bhāvatoti yādisāya saññāya atthibhāvena. Yā hi sā paṭusaññākiccassa
analyzed: yāya saññāya bhāvato ti yādisāya saññāya atthi bhāvena yā hi sā paṭu saññā kiccassa

original: abhāvato saññātipi na vattabbā, saññāsabhāvānātivattanato asaññātipi na vattabbā,
analyzed: abhāvataḥ saññā tipi na vattabbā saññā sabhāva an ativattanataḥ asaññā tipi na vattabbā

original: tassā vijjamānattāti attho. Tanti taṃ jhānaṃ. Taṃ tāva dassetunti ettha tanti taṃ

original: 297. Tatthāti tasmiṃ pattagate āhāre. Lajjitabbaṃ hoti “ucchiṭṭhaṃ nu kho ayaṃ mayhaṃ

original: dātukāmo”ti āsaṅkeyyāti, sedo paggharamāno āhārassa vā uṇhatāya, bhikkhuno vā sapariḷāhatāyāti
analyzed: dātu kāmo ti āsaṅkeyya ati sedaḥ paggharamānaḥ āhārassa vā uṇha tāya bhikkhuno vā sa pariḷāha tāya ati

original: adhippāyo. Sukkhathaddhabhattampīti sukkhatāya thaddhampi bhattaṃ, pageva takkakañjikādinā
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ sukkha thaddha bhattam pi iti sukkha tāya thaddham pi bhattam pageva takka kañjika ādinā

original: upasittanti adhippāyo. Tena sedena kilinnatāya paṭikkūlataṃ vadati.
analyzed: adhippāyo tena sedena kilinna tāya paṭikkūla tam vadati

original: Tasminti piṇḍapāte. Sambhinnasobheti sabbaso vinaṭṭhasobhe. Vemajjhato paṭṭhāyāti
analyzed: tasmin ti piṇḍapāte sambhinna sobhe iti sabbasas vinaṭṭha sobhe vemajjhataḥ paṭṭhāya ati

original: jivhāya majjhato paṭṭhāya. Dantagūthako dantamalaṃ. Vicuṇṇitamakkhitoti ubhayehi
analyzed: jivhāya majjhataḥ paṭṭhāya danta gūthakaḥ danta malam ubhayehi

original: dantehi vicuṇṇito kheḷādīhi samupalitto. Evaṃbhūtassa cassa yāyaṃ pubbe vaṇṇasampadā,
analyzed: dantehi vicuṇṇitaḥ kheḷa ādīhi samupalittaḥ evaṃbhūtassa ca ssa yā ayam pubbe vaṇṇa sampadā

original: gandhasampadā, abhisaṅkhārasampadā ca, sā ekaṃsena vinassati, raso pana nasseyya
analyzed: gandha sampadā abhisaṅkhāra sampadā ca sā ekaṃsena vinassati rasaḥ pana nasseyya

original: vā na vāti āha “antarahitavaṇṇagandhasaṅkhāraviseso”ti. Suvānadoṇiyanti sārameyyānaṃ
analyzed: vā na vā iti āha antara hita vaṇṇa gandha saṅkhāra visesaḥ iti suvāna doṇiyanti

original: bhuñjanakaambaṇe. Suvānavamathu viyāti vantasunakhachaḍḍanaṃ viya. Cakkhussa āpāthaṃ
analyzed: bhuñjana kaambaṇe suvāna vamathu viyā ati vanta su nakha chaḍḍanam viya cakkhussa āpātham

original: atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotīti ukkaṃsagataṃ tassa paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
analyzed: atīta ttā ajjhoharitabbo hoti iti ukkaṃsa gatam tassa paṭikkūla bhāvam vibhāveti

original: 298. Paribhoganti ajjhoharaṇaṃ. Esa āhāro anto pavisamāno bahalamadhukatelamakkhito
analyzed: paribhoganti ajjhoharaṇam esaḥ āhāraḥ antar pavisamānaḥ bahala madhuka tela makkhito

original: viya paramajeguccho hotīti sambandho. Antoti koṭṭhassa abbhantare. Nidhānamanupagato
analyzed: viya parama jegucchaḥ hoti iti sambandho antar ti koṭṭhassa abbhantare nidhānam anupagataḥ

original: āmāsayaṃ appattoyeva āhāro pittādīhi vimissito hotīti āha “pavisamāno”ti. Āmāsayapakkāsayavinimutto
analyzed: āma āsayam appatto yeva āhāraḥ pitta ādīhi vimissitaḥ hoti iti āha pavisamānaḥ ti āma āsaya pakka āsaya vinimuttaḥ

original: koyamāsayo nāmāti āsaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha “yasmā”tiādi. Pittamevāsayo pittāsayo. Adhiko
analyzed: kaḥ ayam āsayaḥ nāma ati āsaṅkam sandhāya āha pittam eva āsayaḥ pitta āsayaḥ

original: hotīti vuttaṃ mandapuññabāhullato lokassa. Evaṃ āsayatoti jeguccho hutvā anto paviṭṭho
analyzed: hoti iti vuttam manda puñña bāhullato lokassa evam āsayataḥ ti jegucchaḥ hutvā antar paviṭṭhaḥ

original: jegucchatarehi pittādīhi vimissito ativiya jeguccho hotīti evaṃ āsayato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
analyzed: jegucchatarehi pitta ādīhi vimissitaḥ ativiya jegucchaḥ hoti iti evam āsayataḥ paṭikkūla tā paccavekkhitabbā

original: 299. Nidhānatoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Soti āhāro. Dasavassikenāti jātiyā dasavassena sattena. Okāseti āmāsayasaṅkhāte padese.
analyzed: nidhānato ti ettha api esā iva nayaḥ saḥ ti āhāraḥ dasavassikena ati jātiyāḥ dasa vassena sattena okāse āmāsaya saṅkhāte padese

original: 300. Evarūpeti edise, dasavassāni yāva vassasataṃ adhotavaccakūpasadiseti attho.
analyzed: evarūpā iti edise dasa vassāni yāva vassa satam adhotavaccakūpa sadisā iti attho

original: Nidhānanti nidhātabbataṃ. Yathāvuttappakāreti sace pana “dasavassikenā”tiādinā yathāvutto
analyzed: nidhānam ti nidhātabba tam yathāvutta ppakāra iti sace pana dasa vassikena āti ādinā yathāvuttaḥ

original: pakāro etassāti yathāvuttappakāro, tasmiṃ. Paramandhakāratimiseti ativiya andhakaraṇamahātamasi.
analyzed: pakāraḥ etassa ati yathā vutta ppakāraḥ tasmin param andhakāra timise ti andha karaṇa mahā tamasi

original: Atiduggandhajegucche padese paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho.
analyzed: ati duggandha jegucche padese parama jeguccha bhāvam upagantvā tiṭṭhati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Kattha kiṃ viyāti āha “yathā nāmā”tiādi. Kālameghena abhivuṭṭhe āvāṭe bahuso vassanena
analyzed: kattha kim viya iti āha yathā nāma atiādi kāla meghena abhivuṭṭhe āvāṭe bahusas vassanena

original: ekaccaṃ asucijātaṃ uppilavitvā vigaccheyyāti akālamegha-ggahaṇaṃ. Tiṇapaṇṇakilañjakhaṇḍa-ggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: ekaccam asuci jātam uppilavitvā vigaccheyya ati akāla megha ggahaṇam tiṇa paṇṇa kilañja khaṇḍa ggahaṇam

original: na asubhassāpi asubhena sammissatāya asubhabhāvappattidassanatthaṃ. Kāyaggisantāpakuthitakuthanasañjātapheṇapubbuḷakācitoti
analyzed: na asubhassa api asubhena sammissa tāya asubha bhāva ppatti dassana tham kāya aggi santāpa kuthita kuthana sañjāta pheṇa pubbuḷaka ācitā ti

original: gahaṇitejena pakkuthitanippakkatāya samuppannapheṇapubbuḷanicito. Aparipakkatoti aparipakkabhāvato.
analyzed: gahaṇi tejena pakkuthita nippakka tāya samuppanna pheṇa pubbuḷa nicitaḥ a paripakka to ti a paripakka bhāvataḥ

original: 301. Suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viyāti yathā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo vidhinā tāpiyamānā
analyzed: suvaṇṇa rajata ādi dhātuyaḥ viyāti yathā suvaṇṇa rajata ādi dhātuyaḥ vidhinā

original: suvaṇṇarajatādike muñcantiyo suvaṇṇarajatādibhāvaṃ upagacchantīti vuccanti, na evamayaṃ.
analyzed: suvaṇṇa rajata ādike suvaṇṇa rajata ādi bhāvam upagacchanti iti vuccanti na evam ayam

original: Ayaṃ pana āhāro kāyagginā paripakko pheṇapubbuḷake muñcanto saṇhaṃ karonti etthāti
analyzed: ayam pana āhāro kāya agginā paripakko pheṇa pubbuḷake muñcantaḥ saṇham karonti ettha ati

original: “saṇhakaraṇī”ti laddhanāmake nisade pisitvā nāḷike khuddakaveḷunāḷikāyaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānamattena
analyzed: saṇhakaraṇī iti laddha nāmake nisade pisitvā nāḷike khuddaka veḷu nāḷikāyam vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna mattena

original: pakkhippamānapaṇḍumattikā viya karīsabhāvaṃ upagantvā pakkāsayaṃ pūreti, muttabhāvaṃ
analyzed: pakkhippamāna paṇḍu mattikā viya karīsa bhāvam upagantvā pakka āsayam pūreti mutta bhāvam

original: upagantvā muttavatthiṃ pūretīti yojanā. Gahaṇiyā indhanabhāgo viya kimibhakkhabhāgo
analyzed: upagantvā mutta vatthim pūreti iti yojanā gahaṇiyāḥ indhana bhāgaḥ viya kimi bhakkha bhāgaḥ

original: ca apākaṭova. Rasabhāgo phalato pakāsīyati, aparipakkasabhāgā ca teti te anāmasitvā
analyzed: ca apākaṭaḥ uva rasa bhāgaḥ phalataḥ pakāsīyati aparipakka sabhāgā ca te iti te an āmasitvā

original: karīsamuttabhāgā evettha dassitā.
analyzed: eva ittha dassitā

original: 302. Paṭikkūlassa nāma phalena paṭikkūleneva bhavitabbanti dassento “sammā paripaccamāno”tiādimāha.
analyzed: paṭikkūlassa nāma phalena paṭikkūlena iva bhavitabbanti dassentaḥ sammā paripaccamānaḥ tiādim āha

original: Nakhadantādīnīti ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ tacādīni eva dvattiṃsākārapāḷiyaṃ āgatāni,
analyzed: nakha danta ādīni iti ādi saddena na kevalam taca ādīni eva dvattiṃsa ākāra pāḷiyam āgatāni

original: atha kho akkhigūthakaṇṇagūthadantamalajallikāsambhavādīni dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsavinimuttāni
analyzed: atha kho akkhi gūtha kaṇṇa gūtha danta mala jallikā sambhava ādīni dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsa vinimuttāni

original: asubhāni saṅgaṇhanto “nānākuṇapānī”ti āhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: asubhāni saṅgaṇhantaḥ nānā kuṇapāni iti āha ati daṭṭhabbam

original: 303. Nissandamānoti vissavanto, paggharantoti attho. Ādinā pakārenāti ettha ādi-saddena
analyzed: nissandamāno ti vissavantaḥ paggharantaḥ ti attho ādinā pakārena ati ettha ādi saddena

original: nāsikāya siṅghāṇikā, mukhena kheḷo, kadāci pittaṃ, semhaṃ, lohitaṃ vamati, vaccamaggena
analyzed: nāsikāya siṅghāṇikā mukhena kheḷo kadāci pittam semham lohitam vamati vaccamaggena

original: uccāro, passāvamaggena passāvo, sakalakāye lomakūpehi sedajallikāti evaṃpakāraṃ asuciṃ
analyzed: uccāraḥ passāva maggena passāvaḥ sakala kāye lomakūpehi evaṃpakāram asucim

original: saṅgaṇhāti. “Paṭhamadivase”ti idaṃ nissandadivasāpekkhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha “dutiyadivase
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti paṭhama divasa iti idam nissanda divasa apekkhāya vuttam tena āha dutiya divase

original: nissandento”ti. Vikuṇitamukhoti jigucchāvasena saṅkucitamukho. Tenāha “jegucchī”ti.
analyzed: nissandentaḥ iti vikuṇita mukhaḥ iti jigucchā vasena saṅkucita mukhaḥ tena āha jegucchī iti

original: Maṅkubhūtoti vimanakajāto “imampi nāma posemī”ti. Rattoti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena
analyzed: maṅku bhūtaḥ iti vimanaka jātaḥ imam pi nāma posemi iti rattaḥ ti vattham viya raṅga jātena

original: cittassa vipariṇāmākārena chandarāgena ratto. Giddhoti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena
analyzed: cittassa vipariṇāma ākārena chanda rāgena rattaḥ giddhaḥ ti abhikaṅkhana sabhāvena abhigijjhanena

original: giddho gedhaṃ āpanno. Gadhitoti dummocanīyabhāvena ganthito viya tattha paṭibaddho.
analyzed: giddhaḥ gedham āpannaḥ gadhito ti dummocanīya bhāvena ganthitaḥ viya tattha paṭibaddho

original: Mucchitoti rasataṇhāya mucchaṃ mohaṃ āpanno. Virattoti vigatarāgo. Aṭṭīyamānoti dukkhiyamāno.
analyzed: mucchitaḥ iti rasa taṇhāya muccham moham āpannaḥ virattaḥ iti vigata rāgaḥ aṭṭīyamānaḥ iti dukkhiyamānaḥ

original: Harāyamānoti lajjamāno. Jigucchamānoti hīḷento.
analyzed: harāyamānaḥ uti lajjamānaḥ jigucchamānaḥ uti hīḍentaḥ

original: Navadvārehīti pākaṭānaṃ mahantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, lomakūpavivarehipi sandatevāti.
analyzed: nava dvārehi iti pākaṭānam mahantānam vasena vuttam

original: Nilīyatīti attānaṃ adassento nigūhati, saṅkucati vā. Evanti ekena dvārena pavesanaṃ
analyzed: nilīyati iti attānam a dassentaḥ nigūhati saṅkucati vā evam ti ekena dvārena pavesanam

original: anekehi dvārehi anekadhā nikkhāmanaṃ, pakāsanaṃ pavesanaṃ, nigūḷhaṃ nikkhāmanampīti
analyzed: anekehi dvārehi anekadhā nikkhāmanam pakāsanam pavesanam nigūḍham nikkhāmanam pi iti

original: somanassajātena pavesanaṃ, maṅkubhūtena nikkhāmanaṃ, sārattena pavesanaṃ, virattena
analyzed: somanassa jātena pavesanam maṅku bhūtena nikkhāmanam sārattena pavesanam virattena

original: nikkhāmananti imehi pakārehi.
analyzed: nikkhāmananti imehi pakārehi

original: 304. Paribhogakālepīti pi-saddena paviṭṭhamattopi nāma pavesadvāraṃ jegucchaṃ karoti,
analyzed: paribhoga kāle pi iti pi saddena paviṭṭha mattaḥ api nāma pavesa dvāram jeguccham karoti

original: pageva laddhaparivāso paripākappatto itaradvārānīti dasseti. Esa āhāro. Gandhaharaṇatthanti
analyzed: pagā iva laddha parivāsaḥ paripāka patto itara dvārāni iti dasseti esaḥ āhāraḥ gandha haraṇa ttham ti

original: vissagandhāpanayanatthaṃ. Kāyaggināti gahaṇitejānugatena kāyusmānā. Pheṇuddehakanti
analyzed: vissa gandha apanayana tham kāya agginā ati gahaṇi teja anugatena pheṇu dehakam ti

original: pheṇāni uṭṭhapetvā uṭṭhapetvā. Paccitvāti paripākaṃ gantvā. Uttaramānoti uppilavanto.
analyzed: pheṇāni uṭṭhapetvā uṭṭhapetvā paccitvā ati paripākam gantvā uttaramāno ti uppilavantaḥ

original: Semhādīti ādi-saddena pittādike saṅgaṇhāti. Karīsādīti ādi-saddena sedajallikādike.
analyzed: semha ādi iti ādi saddena pitta ādike saṅgaṇhāti karīsa ādi iti ādi saddena seda jallikā ādike

original: Imāni dvārāni mukhādīni. Ekaccanti passāvamaggaṃ sandhāya vadati. Cokkhajātikā pana
analyzed: imāni dvārāni mukha ādīni ekaccanti passa avamaggam sandhāya vadati cokkha jātikā pana

original: mukhādīnipi dhovitvā hatthaṃ puna dhovantiyeva. Puna ekaccanti vaccamaggaṃ. Dvattikkhattunti
analyzed: mukha ādīni pi dhovitvā hattham puna dhovantiyā iva puna vacca maggam

original: dvikkhattuṃ, tikkhattuṃ vā. Ettha ca āhāratthāya gamanapariyesanānaṃ paṭikkūlatā
analyzed: dvi khattum ti khattum vā ettha ca āhāra atthāya gamana pariyesanānam paṭikkūla tā

original: āhāre paṭikkūlatā vuttā. Paribhogassa tannissayato, āsayanidhānānaṃ taṃsambandhato,
analyzed: āhāre paṭikkūla tā vuttā paribhogassa tad nissayataḥ āsaya nidhānānam tad sambandhataḥ

original: itaresaṃ tabbikāratoti ayampi viseso veditabbo. Kimibhakkhabhāvopi hissa vikārapakkheyeva ṭhapetabboti.
analyzed: itaresam tad bikārato ti ayam pi visesaḥ veditabbaḥ kimibhakkha bhāvaḥ api hissa vikāra pakkhe yā iva ṭhapetabbaḥ ti

original: 305. Taṃ nimittanti yathāvuttehi ākārehi punappunaṃ manasi karontassa paṭikkūlākāravasena
analyzed: tam nimittam ti yathā vuttehi ākārehi punappunam manasi karontassa paṭikkūla ākāra vasena

original: upaṭṭhitaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārasaññitaṃ bhāvanāya nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, na uggahapaṭibhāganimittaṃ.
analyzed: upaṭṭhitam kabaḷīkāra āhāra saññitam bhāvanāya nimittam ārammaṇam na uggaha paṭibhāga nimittam

original: Yadi hi tattha uggahanimittaṃ uppajjeyya, paṭibhāganimittenapi bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā
analyzed: yadi hi tattha uggaha nimittam uppajjeyya paṭibhāga nimittena api bhavitabbam tathā

original: ca sati appanāppattena jhānena bhavitabbaṃ, na ca bhavati, kasmā? Bhāvanāya nānākārato,
analyzed: ca sati appanā appattena jhānena bhavitabbam na ca bhavati kasmā bhāvanāya nānākārato

original: sabhāvadhammabhāvena ca kammaṭṭhānassa gambhīrabhāvato. Tenāha “kabaḷīkārāhārassa
analyzed: sabhāva dhamma bhāvena ca kammaṭṭhānassa gambhīra bhāvato tena āha kabaḷīkāra āhārassa

original: sabhāvadhammatāya gambhīrattā”ti. Ettha hi yadipi paṭikkūlākāravasena bhāvanā pavattati.
analyzed: sa bhāva dhamma tāya gambhīra ttā ati ettha hi yadi api paṭikkūla ākāra vasena bhāvanā pavattati

original: Ye pana dhamme upādāya kabaḷīkārāhārapaññatti, te eva dhammā paṭikkūlā, na paññattīti
analyzed: ye pana dhamme upādāya kabaḷīkāra āhāra paññatti te eva dhammā paṭikkūlāḥ na paññatti iti

original: paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇamukhenapi sabhāvadhammeyeva ārabbha bhāvanāya pavattanato, sabhāvadhammānañca
analyzed: paṭikkūla ākāra ggahaṇa mukhena api ārabbha bhāvanāya pavattanataḥ sabhāva dhammānam ca

original: sabhāveneva gambhīrabhāvato na tattha jhānaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti. Gambhīrabhāvato hi
analyzed: sa bhāvena iva gambhīra bhāvataḥ na tattha jhānam appetum sakkoti gambhīra bhāvato hi

original: purimasaccadvayaṃ duddasaṃ jātanti. Yadi upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samādhiyati, kathaṃ
analyzed: purima sacca dvayam duddasam yadi upacāra samādhinā cittam katham

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ “saññā” icceva voharīyatīti āha “paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena panā”tiādi.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam saññā icca iva voharīyati iti āha paṭikkūla ākāra ggahaṇa vasena pana atiādi

original: Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “imañca panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Rasataṇhāyāti
analyzed: idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃsam dassetuṃ iman ca pana atiādi vuttam rasa taṇhāya ati

original: madhurādirasavisayāya taṇhāya. Patilīyatīti saṅkucati anekākāraṃ tattha paṭikkūlatāya
analyzed: madhura ādi rasa visayāya taṇhāya patilīyati iti saṅkucati aneka ākāram tattha paṭikkūla tāya

original: saṇṭhitattā. Patikuṭatīti apasakkati na visarati. Pativattatīti nivattati. Kantāranittharaṇatthikoti
analyzed: saṇṭhita ttā patikuṭati iti apasakkati na visarati pativattati iti nivattati kantāra nittharaṇatthikā ti

original: mahato dubbhikkhakantārassa nittharaṇappayojano. Vigatamadoti mānamadādīnaṃ abhāvena
analyzed: mahataḥ dubbhikkha kantārassa nittharaṇa ppayojanaḥ vigata madaḥ ti māna mada ādīnam abhāvena

original: nimmado, madābhāvaggahaṇeneva cassa davamaṇḍanavibhūsanādīnampi abhāvo gahitoyevāti
analyzed: nimmadaḥ mada abhāva ggahaṇena iva ca ssa dava maṇḍana vibhūsana ādīnam pi abhāvaḥ

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kabaḷīkārāhārapariññāmukhenāti vuttanayena paṭikkūlākārato kabaḷīkārāhārassa
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam kabaḷīkāra āhāra pariññā mukhena ati vutta nayena paṭikkūla ākārataḥ kabaḷīkāra āhārassa

original: paricchijja jānanadvārena. Pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgoti anativattanaṭṭhena pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
analyzed: paricchijja jānana dvārena pañca kāmaguṇikaḥ rāgaḥ ti an ativattana ṭṭhena pañcasu kāmaguṇesu

original: niyutto, tappayojano vā rāgo. Pariññaṃ samatikkamaṃ gacchati. Rasataṇhāya hi sammadeva
analyzed: niyuttaḥ tad payojanaḥ vā rāgaḥ pariññam samatikkamam gacchati rasa taṇhāya hi sammat eva

original: vigatāya rūpataṇhādayopi vigatā eva honti bhojane mattaññutāya ukkaṃsagamanato. Sati
analyzed: vigatāya rūpa taṇhā ādayaḥ api vigatāḥ eva honti bhojane mattaññu tāya ukkaṃsa gamanataḥ sati

original: ca visayisamatikkame visayo samatikkanto eva hotīti āha “so pañcakāmaguṇapariññāmukhena
analyzed: ca visayi samatikkame visayo samatikkantaḥ eva hoti iti āha saḥ pañca kāmaguṇa pariññā mukhena

original: rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātī”ti. Rūpāyatanādīsu hi pariññaṃ gacchantesu tannissayabhūtāni,
analyzed: rūpa kkhandham parijānāti iti rūpa āyatana ādīsu hi pariññam gacchantesu tad nissaya bhūtāni

original: taggāhakā pasādā ca sukheneva pariññaṃ gacchantīti. Aparipakkādīti ādi-saddena āsayanidhānānampi
analyzed: tad gāhakā pasādā ca sukhena iva pariññam gacchanti iti aparipakka ādi iti ādi saddena

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha aparipakkaṃ tāva udariyameva. Āsayaggahaṇena pittasemhapubbalohitānaṃ,
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo tattha aparipakkam tāva udariyam eva āsaya ggahaṇena pitta semha pubba lohitānam

original: paripakkaggahaṇena karīsamuttānaṃ, phalaggahaṇena kesādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ pariggaho siddho

original: hotīti āha “kāyagatāsatibhāvanāpi pāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti. Asubhasaññāyāti asubhabhāvanāya,
analyzed: hoti iti āha kāya gata asati bhāvanā api pāripūrim gacchati iti asubha saññāya ati asubha bhāvanāya

original: aviññāṇakaasubhabhāvanānuyogassāti attho. Anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇena

original: kāyassa asuciduggandhajegucchabhāvasallakkhaṇato. Imaṃ pana paṭipattinti imaṃ āhāre
analyzed: kāyassa asuci duggandha jeguccha bhāva sat lakkhaṇato imam pana paṭipattim ti imam āhāre

original: paṭikkūlasaññābhāvanaṃ. Amatapariyosānatanti nibbānaniṭṭhitaṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññābhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: paṭikkūla saññā bhāvanam amata pariyosāna tanti nibbāna niṭṭhitam āhāre paṭikkūla saññā bhāvanā saṅkhātam

original: upacārajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nibbānādhigamanti attho.

original: Āhārepaṭikkūlabhāvanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: āhāre paṭikkūla bhāvanā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Catudhātuvavatthānabhāvanāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: catu dhātu vavatthāna bhāvanā vaṇṇanā

original: 306. “Ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhassa catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto”ti

original: katvā vuttaṃ. Tattha satipi visayabhedena vavatthānassa bhede vavatthānabhāvasāmaññena
analyzed: katvā vuttam tattha sati pi visaya bhedena vavatthānassa bhede vavatthāna bhāva sāmaññena

original: atthasiddhiyaṃ tassa ekavisayatāvāti “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttaṃ. Yathā hi dvattiṃsākāre
analyzed: tassa eka visaya tā vā ati ekam vavatthānam ti vuttam yathā hi dvattiṃsa ākāre

original: kammaṃ karontassa yogino yadipi pubbabhāge visuṃ visuṃ koṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattati,
analyzed: kammam karontassa yoginaḥ yadi pi pubba bhāge visum visum koṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattati

original: aparabhāge pana ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse atthasiddhi hoti, na sabbesu,

original: evamidhāpīti. Tattha siyā – yathā paṭikkūlabhāvasāmaññena dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhāne

original: abhedato manasikāro pavattati, evaṃ idha dhātubhāvasāmaññena abhedato manasikāro
analyzed: abhedataḥ manasikāro pavattati evam idha dhātu bhāva sāmaññena abhedataḥ manasikāro

original: pavattatīti “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttanti? Nayidamevaṃ. Tattha hi paṇṇattisamatikkamato

original: paṭṭhāya paṭikkūlavaseneva sabbattha manasikāro pavattetabbo, idha pana sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇato

original: dhātuyo manasi kātabbā, na dhātubhāvasāmaññato. Tenevāha “sabhāvūpalakkhaṇavasena
analyzed: dhātuyaḥ manasi kātabbāḥ na dhātu bhāva sāmaññato tena iva āha sabhāva upalakkhaṇa vasena

original: sanniṭṭhāna”nti. Kiṃ vā etena papañcena, aññehi ekūnacattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: sanniṭṭhānam ti kim vā etena papañcena aññehi ekūnacattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānehi a saṃsaṭṭham

original: catudhātuvavatthānaṃ nāma ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti dassetuṃ “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttanti
analyzed: catu dhātu vavatthānam nāma ekam kammaṭṭhānan ti dassetum ekam vavatthānan ti vuttan ti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu catudhātuvavatthānaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam catu dhātu vavatthānassa bhāvanā niddeso ti kasmā vuttam nanu catu dhātu vavatthānam

original: bhāvanāva? Saccaṃ bhāvanāva, sakiṃ pavattaṃ pana vavatthānaṃ, tassa bahulīkāro bhāvanāti

original: vacanabhedena vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ pana bhāvanā niddisīyati tassā vacīgocarātikkantabhāvatoti?
analyzed: vacana bhedena vuttam katham pana bhāvanā niddisīyati tassāḥ vacī gocara atikkanta bhāvato ti

original: Nāyaṃ doso bhāvanatthe bhāvanāvohārato. Bhāvanattho hi kammaṭṭhānapariggaho idha
analyzed: na ayam dosaḥ bhāvanā tthe bhāvanā avohārataḥ bhāvanā atthaḥ hi kammaṭṭhāna pariggahaḥ idha

original: “bhāvanā”ti adhippeto.
analyzed: bhāvanā ati adhippeto

original: Sabhāvūpalakkhaṇavasenāti kakkhaḷattādikassa salakkhaṇassa upadhāraṇavasena. Idaṃ
analyzed: sabhāva upalakkhaṇa vasena ati kakkhaḷa tta ādikassa sa lakkhaṇassa upadhāraṇa vasena idam

original: hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇādikammaṭṭhānaṃ viya na paṇṇattimattasallakkhaṇavasena,

original: viya saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena pavattati, atha kho pathavīādīnaṃ

original: na yevāpanakavinicchayo, nāpi vitakkādivinicchayo. Dhātumanasikāroti dhātūsu manasikāro,

analyzed: vakārassa bakāram ikārassa ca īkāram katvā tam eva hi bhāga attham dassetum koṭṭhāsam

original: paccekaṃ thaddhatādīnaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vavatthāpanavasena bhāvanā.
analyzed: paccekam thaddhata ādīnam catunnam catunnam lakkhaṇānam vavatthāpana vasena bhāvanā

original: Evaṃ catūhi ākārehi uddiṭṭhaṃ bhāvanānayaṃ niddisituṃ “kathaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato
analyzed: evam catūhi ākārehi uddiṭṭham bhāvanā nayam niddisitum katham sa sambhāra saṅkhepato

original: bhāvetī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Ettha ca yathā tikkhapañño puggalo tikkhatāya paropariyattasabbhāvato
analyzed: bhāva iti itiādi āraddham ettha ca yathā tikkha paññaḥ puggalo tikkhatāya

original: tikkhindriyamudindriyatāvasena duvidhoti. Tattha tikkhindriyassa vasena saṅkhepato
analyzed: tikkha indriya mud indriya tā vasena duvidhaḥ ti tattha tikkha indriyassa vasena saṅkhepato

original: paṭhamanayo vutto, mudindriyassa vasena dutiyo. Evaṃ nātitikkhapaññopi puggaloti.
analyzed: paṭhama nayaḥ vuttaḥ mud indriyassa vasena dutiyaḥ evam na ati tikkha paññaḥ api puggalaḥ ti

original: Tattha yo visadindriyo puggalo, tassa vasena sasambhārasaṅkhepato, salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato
analyzed: tattha yaḥ visat indriyaḥ puggalo tassa vasena sa sambhāra saṅkhepataḥ sa lakkhaṇa saṅkhepataḥ

original: ca bhāvanānayo niddiṭṭho. Yo pana nātivisadindriyo, tassa vasena sasambhāravibhattito,
analyzed: ca bhāvanā nayaḥ niddiṭṭho yaḥ pana na ati visat indriyo tassa vasena sa sambhāra vibhattito

original: salakkhaṇavibhattito ca bhāvanānayo niddiṭṭhoti veditabbo. Tassa evaṃ vavatthāpayato
analyzed: sa lakkhaṇa vibhattitaḥ ca bhāvanā nayaḥ niddiṭṭho ti veditabbaḥ tassa evam vavatthāpayato

original: eva dhātuyo pākaṭā honti savisesaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggahitattā. Bhāvanāvidhānaṃ panettha
analyzed: eva dhātuyaḥ pākaṭāḥ honti sa visesam dhātūnam pariggahita ttā bhāvanā vidhānam pana ittha

original: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 310. Yassāti nātivisadindriyaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya vadati. Evaṃ bhāvayatoti sasambhārasaṅkhepato
analyzed: yassa iti na ati visat indriyam puggalam sandhāya vadati evam bhāvayatā iti sa sambhāra saṅkhepataḥ

original: bhāventassa. Yena vidhinā uggahetvā kusalo hoti, so sattavidho vidhi “uggahakosalla”nti
analyzed: bhāventassa yena vidhinā uggahetvā kusalaḥ hoti so sattavidhaḥ vidhi uggaha kosallanti

original: vuccati, tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ. Evaṃ manasikārakosallampi veditabbaṃ. Dvattiṃsākāreti
analyzed: vuccati tat nibbattam vā ñāṇam evam manasikāra kosallam pi veditabbam dvattiṃsa ākārā iti

original: dhātumanasikāravasena pariggahite kesādike dvattiṃsavidhe koṭṭhāse. “Dvattiṃsākāre”ti
analyzed: dhātu manasikāra vasena pariggahite kesa ādike dvattiṃsavidhe koṭṭhāse dvattiṃsa ākāra iti

original: ca idaṃ tejavāyukoṭṭhāsesu vaṇṇādivasena vavatthānassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. Sabbaṃ tattha
analyzed: ca idam teja vāyu koṭṭhāsesu vaṇṇa ādi vasena vavatthānassa abhāvataḥ vuttam sabbam tattha

original: vuttavidhānaṃ kātabbanti “vacasā manasā”tiādinā vuttauggahakosalluddesato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: vutta vidhānam kātabbanti vacasā manasā ati ādinā vutta oggaha kosalla uddesataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: yāva “anupubbamuñcanādivasenā”ti padaṃ, tāva āgataṃ sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ kātabbaṃ
analyzed: yāva anupubba muñcana ādi vasena ati padam tāva āgatam sabbam bhāvanā vidhānam kātabbam

original: sampādetabbaṃ. Vaṇṇādivasenāti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena. Ayañca vaṇṇādivasena
analyzed: sampādetabbam vaṇṇa ādi vasena ati vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna disā ukāsa pariccheda vasena ayam ca vaṇṇa ādi vasena

original: manasikāro dhātupaṭikkūlavaṇṇamanasikārānaṃ sādhāraṇo pubbabhāgoti nibbattitadhātumanasikārameva
analyzed: manasikāraḥ dhātu paṭikkūla vaṇṇa manasikārānam sādhāraṇaḥ pubbabhāgaḥ ti nibbattita dhātu manasikāram eva

original: dassetuṃ “avasāne evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum avasāne evam manasikāraḥ pavattetabbaḥ iti vuttam

original: 311. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammāti ete “sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ
analyzed: aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammā ti ete sīsa kaṭāha paliveṭhana cammaṃ

original: kesā”ti evaṃ vohariyamānā bhūtupādāyadhammā “mayi kesā jātā, mayamettha jātā”ti evaṃ
analyzed: kesā iti evam vohariyamānāḥ bhūta upādāya dhammāḥ mayi kesāḥ jātāḥ mayam ettha jātā ati evam

original: aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇasuññā. Iminā kāraṇassa ca phalassa ca abyāpāratāya
analyzed: aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa suññā iminā kāraṇassa ca phalassa ca a byāpāra tāya

original: dhātumattataṃ sandasseti, tena ca ābhogapaccavekkhaṇānampi evameva abyāpāratā dīpitāti
analyzed: dhātumat tatam sandasseti tena ca ābhoga paccavekkhaṇānam pi evam eva abyāpāra tā dīpitā ati

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi tāni, tesaṃ kāraṇāni ca tathā tathā ābhujitvā, paccavekkhitvā ca
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam na hi tāni tesam kāraṇāni ca tathā tathā ābhujitvā paccavekkhitvā ca

original: uppajjanti, paccayabhāvaṃ vā gacchantīti. Itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Acetanoti
analyzed: uppajjanti paccaya bhāvam vā gacchanti iti iti iti vutta ppakāra parāmasanam acetanoti

original: na cetano, cetanārahito vā. Abyākatoti abyākatarāsipariyāpanno. Suññoti attasuñño.
analyzed: na cetano cetanā rahitaḥ vā abyākatoti abyākata rāsi pariyāpanno suñño ti atta suñño

original: Tato eva nissatto. Thaddhalakkhaṇādhikatāya thaddho. Tato eva pathavīdhātūti evaṃ
analyzed: tatas eva nissatto thaddha lakkhaṇa adhikatāya thaddho tatas eva pathavī dhātu uti evam

original: manasikāro pavattetabboti sambandho. Evaṃ sabbattha.
analyzed: manasikāraḥ pavattetabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ evam sabbattha

original: 312. Suññagāmaṭṭhāneti ettha suññagāmaggahaṇaṃ paramatthato vedakavirahadassanatthaṃ kāyassa.
analyzed: suñña gāma ṭṭhāne ti ettha suñña gāma gahaṇam paramatthataḥ vedaka viraha dassana ttham kāyassa

original: 313. Madhukaṭṭhiketi madhukabījāni.
analyzed: madhukaṭṭhikā iti madhuka bījāni

original: 314. Gehathambhānaṃ ādhārabhāvena ṭhapitasilāyo pāsāṇaudukkhalakānīti adhippetāni.
analyzed: geha thambhānam ādhāra bhāvena ṭhapita silāyaḥ pāsāṇa audukkhalakāni iti adhippetāni

original: 315. Duggandhādibhāve cassa sadisabhāvadassanatthaṃ allagocammaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: duggandha ādi bhāve ca ssa sadisa bhāva dassana attham alla go camma ggahaṇam

original: 316. Yebhuyyena maṃsapesīnaṃ bahalatāya mahāmattikaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yebhuyyena maṃsa pesīnam bahala tāya mahā mattika ggahaṇam

original: 317. Kuṭṭadārūsūti dārukuṭṭikāya kuṭiyā bhittipādabhūtesu kaṭṭhesu.
analyzed: kuṭṭa dārūsu iti dāru kuṭṭikāya kuṭiyāḥ bhitti pāda bhūtesu kaṭṭhesu

original: 318. Paṇhikaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādhārabhāvo viya gopphakaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādheyyabhāvopi asamannāhārasiddhoti
analyzed: ādhāra bhāvaḥ viya gopphaka ṭṭhi ādīnam ādheyya bhāvaḥ api

original: dassanatthaṃ “paṇhikaṭṭhigopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita”ntiādiṃ vatvā puna “sīsaṭṭhigīvaṭṭhike
analyzed: dassana attham paṇhika ṭṭhi gopphaka ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhita nti ādim vatvā puna sīsa ṭṭhi gīvaṭṭhike

original: patiṭṭhita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: patiṭṭhita ntiādi vuttam

original: 319. Sinnavettaggādīsūti seditavettakaḷīrādīsu.
analyzed: sinna vetta gga ādīsu iti sedita vetta kaḷīra ādīsu

original: 321. Uraṭṭhisaṅghāṭo pañjarasadisatāya “uraṭṭhipañjara”nti vutto. Tassa athirabhāvadassanatthaṃ jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ nidassanabhāvena gahitaṃ.
analyzed: uraṭṭhi saṅghāṭaḥ pañjara sadisa tāya uraṭṭhi pañjaram ti vutto tassa athira bhāva dassana attham jiṇṇa sandamānika pañjaram nidassana bhāvena gahitam

original: 322. Yamakamaṃsapiṇḍeti maṃsapiṇḍayugaḷe.
analyzed: yamaka maṃsa piṇḍa iti maṃsa piṇḍa yugaḷe

original: 323. Kilomakassa setavaṇṇatāya “pilotikapaliveṭhite”ti pilotikaṃ nidassanabhāvena
analyzed: kilomakassa seta vaṇṇa tāya pilotika paliveṭhitā iti pilotikam nidassana bhāvena

original: vuttaṃ. Evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānātīti ettha na vakkahadayāni
analyzed: vuttam evam eva na vakka hadayāni sakala sarīre ca maṃsam jānāti iti ettha na vakka hadayāni

original: jānanti “mayaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchannānī”ti, na sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ
analyzed: jānanti mayam paṭicchanna kilomakena paṭicchannāni iti na sakala sarīre ca maṃsam

original: jānāti “ahaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchanna”nti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: jānāti aham paṭicchanna kilomakena paṭicchanna nti yojetabbam

original: 324. Koṭṭhamatthakapassanti kusūlassa abbhantare matthakapassaṃ.
analyzed: koṭṭha matthaka passanti kusūlassa abbhantare matthaka passam

original: 325. Dvinnaṃ thanānamantareti dvinnaṃ thanappadesānaṃ vemajjhe, thanappadeso ca abbhantaravasena veditabbo.
analyzed: dvinnam thanānam antareti dvinnam thana ppadesānam vemajjhe thana ppadeso ca abbhantara vasena veditabbo

original: 327. Ekavīsatiantabhogeti ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu obhaggobhagge antamaṇḍale.
analyzed: ekavīsati anta bhoga iti ekavīsatiyāḥ ṭhānesu obhagga ubhagge anta maṇḍale

original: 328. Āmāsaye ṭhito paribhuttāhāro udariyanti adhippetanti āha “udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyita”nti.
analyzed: āma āsaye ṭhitaḥ paribhutta āhāraḥ udariyanti adhippetanti āha udariyam udare ṭhitam asita pīta khāyita sāyitanti

original: 331. Abaddhapittaṃ saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ viya, kāyusmā viya ca kammajarūpapaṭibaddhavuttikanti
analyzed: abaddha pittam saṃsaraṇa lohitam viya viya ca kamma ja rūpa paṭibaddha vuttikam

original: āha “ābaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti. Paṭibaddhatāvacanena
analyzed: āha ābaddha pittam jīvitindriya paṭibaddham sakala sarīram byāpetvā paṭibaddha tā vacanena

original: cassa jīvitindriye sati sabbhāvameva dīpeti, na jīvitindriyassa viya ekantakammajatanti
analyzed: ca ssa jīvita indriye sati sabbhāvam eva dīpeti na jīvita indriyassa viya ekanta kamma jatanti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pittakosaketi mahākosāṭakīkosasadise pittādhāre. Yūsabhūtoti rasabhūto.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam pitta kosake iti mahā kosāṭakī kosa sadise pitta ādhāre yūsa bhūtaḥ ti rasa bhūtaḥ

original: 332. Ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ chaḍḍanaṭṭhānaṃ candanikā, tassaṃ candanikāyaṃ.
analyzed: ucchiṭṭha udaka gabbha mala ādīnam chaḍḍana ṭhānam candanikā tassam candanikāyam

original: 333. Pubbāsayo mandapaññānaṃ kesañcideva hotīti katvā asabbasādhāraṇanti adhippāyenāha “pubbo anibaddhokāso”ti.
analyzed: pubba āsayaḥ manda paññānam kesañcid eva hoti iti katvā asabba sādhāraṇam ti adhippāyena āha pubbaḥ anibaddha ukāsaḥ ti

original: 334. Pittaṃ viyāti abaddhapittaṃ viya. Sakalasarīranti jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: pittam viyāti abaddha pittam viya sakala sarīram jīvitindriya paṭibaddham sabbam

original: sarīrappadesaṃ. Vakkahadayayakanapapphāsāni tementanti ettha yakanaṃ heṭṭhābhāgapūraṇena,
analyzed: sarīra ppadesam vakka hadaya yakana papphāsāni ettha yakanam heṭṭhā bhāga pūraṇena

original: itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇena ca temetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni
analyzed: itarāni tesam upari thokam thokam paggharaṇena ca daṭṭhabbam heṭṭhā leḍḍu khaṇḍa ādīni

original: temayamāneti temakatemitabbānaṃ abyāpāratāsāmaññanidassanatthaṃ eva upamā daṭṭhabbā,
analyzed: temayamānā iti temaka temitabbānam a byāpāra tā sāmañña nidassana attham eva upamā daṭṭhabbā

original: na ṭhānasāmaññanidassanatthaṃ. Sannicitalohitena hi temetabbānaṃ kesañci heṭṭhā,
analyzed: na ṭhāna sāmañña nidassana attham sannicita lohitena hi temetabbānam kesañci heṭṭhā

original: kassaci upari ṭhitatā kāyagatāsatiniddese dassitāti. Yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: kassaci upari ṭhita tā kāya gata asati niddese dassitā ati yakanassa heṭṭhā bhāga ṭṭhānam

original: “mayi lohitaṃ ṭhita”nti na jānāti, vakkādīni “amhe temayamānaṃ lohitaṃ ṭhita”nti
analyzed: mayi lohitam na jānāti vakka ādīni amhe temayamānam lohitam ṭhitanti

original: na jānantīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
analyzed: na jānanti iti evam yojanā veditabbā

original: 336. Patthinnasinehoti thinabhāvaṃ ghanabhāvaṃ gatasineho. Sakalasarīre maṃsanti
analyzed: patthinna sineho ti thina bhāvam ghana bhāvam gata sineho sakala sarīre maṃsanti

original: yojanā, tañca thūlasarīraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Medassa satipi patthinnatāya ghanabhāve
analyzed: yojanā tat ca thūla sarīram sandhāya vuttam medassa sati pi patthinna tāya ghana bhāve

original: maṃsassa viya na baddhatāti vuttaṃ “patthinnayūso”ti. Tenevassa āpokoṭṭhāsatā.
analyzed: maṃsassa viya na baddha tā ti vuttam patthinna yūso ti tena iva assa āpokoṭṭhāsa tā

original: 337. Udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesūti nātipariṇatānaṃ sajalakānaṃ aggato chinnānaṃ tālasalāṭukānaṃ vivarāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: udaka puṇṇesu taruṇa tāla ṭṭhi kūpakesu iti na ati pariṇatānam sa jalakānam aggataḥ chinnānam tāla sa lāṭukānam vivarāni sandhāya vuttam

original: 338. Vasāya attano ādhāre abhibyāpanamukhena abyāpāratāsāmaññaṃ vibhāvetabbanti ācāmagatatelaṃ nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vasāya attanaḥ ādhāre abhibyāpana mukhena abyāpāra tā sāmaññam vibhāvetabbanti ācāma gata telam nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: 339. Kheḷuppattipaccaye ambilaggamadhuraggādike.
analyzed: kheḷuppatti paccaye ambi lagga madhu ragga ādike

original: 343. Kesādīsu manasikāraṃ pavattetvā tejokoṭṭhāsesu pavattetabbo manasikāroti vibhattiṃ
analyzed: kesa ādīsu manasikāram pavattetvā tejaḥ koṭṭhāsesu pavattetabbaḥ manasikāraḥ iti vibhattim

original: pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ. Yena santappatīti yena kāyo santappati, ayaṃ santappanakicco.
analyzed: pariṇāmetvā yojetabbam yena santappati iti yena kāyaḥ santappati ayam santappana kicco

original: Tejoti tassa pariggaṇhanākāro eva paccāmaṭṭho. Yena jīrīyatītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: tejaḥ ti tassa pariggaṇhana ākāraḥ eva paccāmaṭṭhaḥ yena jīrīyati iti ādīsu pi esa iva nayo

original: 344. Assāsapassāsavasenāti antopavisanabahinikkhamananāsikāvātabhāvena. “Evaṃ pavattamanasikārassā”ti
analyzed: assāsa passāsa vasena ati anta upavisana bahinikkhamana nāsikā vāta bhāvena evam pavatta manasikārassa ati

original: iminā vuttākārena sasambhāravibhattito pavattakammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa. Dhātuyo pākaṭā
analyzed: iminā vutta ākārena sa sambhāra vibhattitaḥ pavatta kammaṭṭhāna manasikārassa dhātuyaḥ pākaṭā

original: hontīti vitthārato pariggahitattā dhātuyo vibhūtā honti. Idhāpi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ heṭṭhā
analyzed: honti iti vitthārato dhātuyaḥ vibhūtāḥ honti idha api bhāvanā vidhānam heṭṭhā

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 345. Tatthevāti tesuyeva vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu. Paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ vitthambhanalakkhaṇanti etthāpi “tatthevā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: tattha iva ati tesu yeva vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu paripācana lakkhaṇam vitthambhana lakkhaṇam ti ettha api tattha eva ati ānetvā sambandhitabbam

original: Puna tatthevāti tesuyeva dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesūti attho. Ettha ca kesādikoṭṭhāsānaṃ
analyzed: puna tattha iva ati tesu yeva dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu iti attho ettha ca kesa ādi koṭṭhāsānam

original: saṃviggahatāya tattha vijjamānā āpodhātuādayo nhāniyacuṇṇādīsu udakādayo viya suviññeyyāti
analyzed: saṃvigga hatāya tattha vijjamānāḥ āpodhātu ādayaḥ nhāniya cuṇṇa ādīsu udaka ādayaḥ viya su viññeyyā ati

original: “tattheva ābandhanalakkhaṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tattha iva ābandhana lakkhaṇa ntiādi vuttam

original: Santappanāditejokoṭṭhāsesu pana vāyodhātuādayo na tathā suviññeyyāti katvā “tena
analyzed: santappana ādi tejaḥ koṭṭhāsesu pana vāyo dhātu ādayaḥ na tathā su viññeyyā ati katvā tena

original: avinibhutta”nti vuttaṃ, na tatthevāti. Yadi evaṃ, vāyukoṭṭhāsesu kathaṃ tatthevāti?
analyzed: a vinibhuttam ti vuttam na tattha eva ati yadi evam vāyu koṭṭhāsesu katham tattha eva ati

original: Vāyukoṭṭhāsāpi hi uddhaṅgamavātādayo piṇḍākāreneva pariggahetabbataṃ upagacchanti,
analyzed: vāyu koṭṭhāsāḥ api hi uddhaṅgama vāta ādayaḥ piṇḍa ākārena iva pariggahetabbatam upagacchanti

original: na pana santappanāditejokoṭṭhāsāti nāyaṃ doso. Tattha tenāti tena tejena. Avinibhuttanti
analyzed: na pana santappana ādi tejaḥ koṭṭhāsā ti na ayam doso tattha tena ati tena tejena a vinibhuttam ti

original: avinābhūtaṃ, taṃtaṃkalāpagatavasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vavatthāpayatoti vuttākārena

original: salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo vavatthāpentassa. Vuttanayenāti “tassevaṃ vāyamamānassā”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena.
analyzed: sa lakkhaṇa saṅkhepataḥ dhātuyaḥ vavatthāpentassa vutta nayena ati tassa ivam vāyamamānassa atiādinā heṭṭhā vutta nayena

original: 346. Evampi bhāvayatoti salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo pariggahetvā bhāventassāpi.
analyzed: evam pi bhāvayato ti sa lakkhaṇa saṅkhepataḥ dhātuyaḥ pariggahetvā bhāventassa api

original: Pubbe vuttanayenāti sasambhāravibhattito bhāvanāyaṃ vuttena nayena. Evanti yathā

original: kese, evaṃ. Sabbakoṭṭhāsesūti ekacattālīsabhedesu sesasabbakoṭṭhāsesu evamettha aṭṭhasaṭṭhidhātusatassa
analyzed: kese evam sabba koṭṭhāsesu iti ekacattālīsa bhedesu sesa sabba koṭṭhāsesu evam ettha aṭṭha saṭṭhi dhātu satassa

original: pariggaho vutto hoti. Bhāvanāvidhānaṃ panettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

original: Idāni vacanatthādimukhenapi dhātūsu manasikāravidhānaṃ dassetuṃ “vacanatthato”tiādi

original: hoti vacanadvārena tadatthassa ādito gahetabbato, tasmā vacanatthatopi dhātūnaṃ manasikātabbatā

analyzed: yasmā tā piṇḍaso pavattanti na paccekam tasmā kalāpataḥ api manasikātabba tā vuttā

original: Te pana kalāpā paramāṇuparimāṇā hontīti tappariyāpannānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ ekasmiṃ

analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ manasikāraḥ vuttaḥ lakkhaṇa āditaḥ dhātuyaḥ pariggaṇhantena sa lakkhaṇa vibhattitaḥ

original: kammaṭṭhānābhinivese yasmā dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena dhātūsu pariggayhamānāsu

analyzed: samuṭṭhānataḥ manasikāraḥ vutto

original: Evaṃ pariññātasamuṭṭhānānampi tāsaṃ saddānusārena vinā visesasāmaññapariggaho kātabboti

original: padesena avinibhuttāti ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ vinibbhogāvinibbhogato

original: ayampi viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ sabhāgavisabhāgato manasikāro vutto. Sabhāgavisabhāgāpi

original: dhātuyo. Apica “nijjīvaṭṭho dhātuṭṭho”ti vuttovāyamattho. Tathā hi bhagavā “chadhāturoyaṃ

analyzed: dhātuyaḥ pariggahetvā ṭhitassa heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

analyzed: ākārehi iti pakārehi atha vā ākarīyanti dissanti ettha ākārā koṭṭhāsā

analyzed: dve aṭṭhakā catu samuṭṭhānesu utu citta āhāra samuṭṭhānā tayo tayo aṭṭhakā utu citta samuṭṭhānesu

original: Sāvāti pathavīdhātuyeva. Āpodhātuyā anugatā āpodhātuyā tattha appadhānabhāvaṃ, pathavīdhātuyā

original: Tathā uddhaṅgatikā tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo vutto. Tiriyaṃ

original: Ekekena mukhenāti “patthaṭattā pathavī”tiādinā vibhattesu terasasu ākāresu ekekena

original: dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanamukhena. Svāyanti so ayaṃ upacārasamādhi. Kathaṃ panassa vavatthānapariyāyoti
analyzed: dhātūnam pariggaṇhana mukhena su āyanti saḥ ayam upacāra samādhi katham panassa vavatthāna pariyāyaḥ ti

original: āha “catunnaṃ dhātūna”ntiādi.

original: 360. Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “idañca panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Suññataṃ

original: Yathāvuttavikappanāpajjanaṃ hi bhayabheravasahanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Ugghāto uppilāvitattaṃ.

original: Nigghāto dīnabhāvappatti. Mahāpañño ca pana hoti dhātuvasena kāye sammadeva ghanavinibbhogassa

362. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto attabhāvo, tattha sukhavihāro diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro.
